instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'For the Chervil Cure:.', 'Mix together chervil and lemon zest, rub into the salmon fillets.', 'Press salt, pepper, brown sugar on top and cover and refrigerated for 2 hours to allow flavours to infuse.', 'For the Potatoes:.', 'Bake at 350F for about 1 hour till cooked.', 'Scoop out the flesh and mash with the butter and cream then mix in the arugula.', 'For the Salsa:.', 'Stir avocado, kiwis, green onion, chervil, Thai, lemon juice and avocado oil together.', 'Sear the salmon fillets on a hot pan in a little oil until coloured on both sides.', 'If they still aren’t cooked through finish cooking in an oven.', 'Salmon should be served slightly underdone in the center.', 'Blanch the snow peas in boiling salted water.', 'Place a 7 cm ring onto each plate and press the arugula mash firmly into it. Remove the ring and place the salmon resting on the mash.', 'Serve with the kiwifruit and avocado salad and the snow peas.']

name: Microwave Chocolate Steam Pudding
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons golden syrup', '1/4 cup sugar', '56 g butter', '1 cup water', '1 cup plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 teaspoons cream of tartar', '2 tablespoons cocoa', '3/4 cup sugar', ' milk, 1 small amount (probably less than half a cup)']
instructions: ["SAUCE: In a microwave safe container combine all the sauce ingredients and cook on high til it's all melted together. Usually takes a couple of minutes to melt it all.", "PUDDING: While the sauce is microwaving, get a large, microwave-safe bowl (I often use a casserole dish) and throw in all the Pudding ingredients except the milk then gradually add the milk while stirring until it forms a soft, moist dough. It's important to use a large bowl because the dough will rise quite a bit as it cooks.", 'COMBINE FOR DELICIOUSNESS: Pour all the sauce over the dough then put it in the microwave a cook on high for 7 minutes.', "SERVE: You can have this on it's own but I like to have it either with fresh cream or vanilla ice cream. I'll use a Kiwi (New Zealand) saying meaning you'll like this - "Sweet As!" Enjoy!"]

name: To Die for Coconut Pie! (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 cup caster sugar', '100 g unsalted butter, softened ', '100 g slivered almonds', '1 cup desiccated coconut', '2 tablespoons lemon rind', '2 tablespoons orange rind', '1/2 cup lemon juice', '1/2 cup orange juice', '1 cup coconut milk', '1/2 cup plain flour, sifted ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180 degrees.\r', 'Place the eggs, sugar, butter, almonds, coconut, lemon and orange rind and juice, coconut milk and flour in a food processor or blender and mix until well combined. It should be reasonably runny.\r', 'Pour into a buttered 28cm pie plate. Bake for 1 hour until lightly browned. \r', 'Set aside to cool.\r', 'Serve with cream, yoghurt or ice-cream, warm or chilled.']

name: Edmonds Yoyos
ingredients: ['175 g butter, softened ', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 1/2 cups high grade flour', '1/2 cup custard powder', '50 g butter, softened ', '1/2 cup icing sugar', '2 tablespoons custard powder']
instructions: ['Cookies:.\r', 'preheat oven to 180C or 350°F.\r', 'cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy and add vanilla essence.\r', 'sift the flour and custard powder and mix sifted ingredients into butter mix.\r', 'roll small teaspoons of dough into balls and place on greased tray. flatten balls slightly with a fork.\r', 'bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes. remove from the oven and allow to cool.\r', 'Filling:.\r', 'Beat all filling ingredients together until combined.\r', 'Assembly:.\r', 'Sandwich two cookies together with a little butter filling and serve.']

name: Lentil Tomato Pie
ingredients: ['200 g flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '100 g butter, roughly chopped ', '2 1/2 tablespoons cold water', '1 large onion', '50 g butter', '175 g split red lentils', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '350 ml vegetable stock', '2 tomatoes, peeled and chopped ', '75 g grated cheese', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 egg', ' sea salt', ' fresh ground black pepper']
instructions: ['Pie Crust:.\r', 'put the flour, salt, butter and water into a food processor and blend just until dough forms. alternatively, rub the butter onto the dry ingredients in a bowl until mixture resembles breadcrumbs and mix in just enough water to make a dough.\r', 'knead lightly on a floured surface and roll out two thirds, reserving the remainder for the top. Use it to line a 20cm quiche dish.\r', 'roll remainder to fit the top of the dish and set aside.\r', 'Filling:.\r', 'peel and chop the onion and fry in the butter in a large saucepan until golden. about 5 minutes.\r', 'add the split peas and garlic and stir briefly before adding the stock.\r', 'bring to boil and simmer for 20 mins until lentils are tender and pale golden.\r', 'remove from heat and add the tomatoes, cheese, basil lemon juice and egg as well as salt and pepper to taste.\r', 'mix and let cool.\r', 'Assembly:.\r', 'preheat oven to 200C or 400F.\r', 'spread the lentil mixture into the pastry case and dampen the edges of the pie with a little water before placing the pastry top.\r', 'press down lightly and brush the top with a little egg if desired. prick the top gently with a fork or cut slits in the top.\r', 'bake pie in preheated oven for 40 mins until brown and crisp.']

name: Chocolate Pineapple Lump Pudding (Raw) (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['1 cup cashew nuts', '1/2 cup soft dates (or soaked)', '2 avocados', ' coconut water, as needed ', ' cacao', '1/2 cup dried pineapple, chopped ']
instructions: ['Blend all but the dried pinnaple until delicious and creamy.', 'Add the chopped dried pineapple.', 'Leave refrigerated for at least 3 hours.', 'After cooled the pineapple is lovely and chewy, just like pineapple lumps!']

name: Risotto With Peas, Artichokes, Basil and Goat's Cheese
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 liter chicken stock (or vegetable)', '1 small onion, finely chopped ', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped ', '300 g risotto rice (arborio)', '1/2 cup fresh peas (or frozen)', '4 artichokes, quartered ', '1 bunch basil, leaves picked ', "100 g goat's cheese (or cow's milk feta)", ' salt, to taste ', ' fresh ground black pepper, to taste ']
instructions: ['Heat the olive oil and butter together in a large pan. Meanwhile, put the stock in a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer.', 'Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook until golden. Add the rice and continue to cook for another 2 minutes, stirring.', 'Ladle a little stock into the pan, stir well and when absorbed, continue until all the stock has been added. Add the peas and artichokes. After 20 minutes, test the rice. It should be a little firm to the bite but not chalky. If you need to add more liquid, use hot water.', 'Tear the basil leaves and add with the goat cheese, stir through and season.']

name: Coconut Bundt Cake With Roasted Peaches- Gillan Estate, New Zeal
ingredients: ['1 1/4 cups cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez)', '1 cup sweetened flaked coconut', '2/3 cup plain yogurt', '2/3 cup canola oil', '1/2 cup fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon freshly grated lemon zest', '4 cups all-purpose flour', '2 cups sugar (original recipe calls for 2 1/2 cups)', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '6 -8 peaches, peeled, halved, pitted (original recipe calls for 16 apricots)', '2/3 cup packed dark brown sugar', '1/4 cup water', '3 tablespoons sliced almonds', ' lightly sweetened whipped cream']
instructions: ['Cake:.', 'Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Butter and flour 12-cup Bundt pan.', 'Whisk first 6 ingredients in large bowl to blend. Mix flour, sugar and baking powder in medium bowl. Whisk flour mixture about 1 cup at a time into coconut mixture (batter will be thick).', 'Spoon batter into prepared pan. Bake until tester inserted near center comes out clean, about 50-60 minutes (original recipe stated 1.5 hours but my cake was done in 50 minutes). Cool cake in pan on rack 15 minutes. Turn cake out onto rack and cool completely. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and let stand at room temperature.).', 'Slice cake; serve with peaches and whipped cream.', 'Roasted Peaches:.', 'Preheat oven to 400°F', 'Toss all ingredients in 13x9x2-inch glass baking dish. Bake until sugar melts and peaches are heated through, stirring occasionally, about 20 minutes.']

name: Fat Free Loaf (With Dates and Carrot-Yummy!)
ingredients: ['180 g pitted dates (chopped with scissors- each date 3-4 x)', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1 cup water', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda (baking soda)', '1 carrot, grated (medium- large)', '1 1/2 cups self raising flour (or 1 tsp baking powder per cup of normal flour)', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon cardamom (optional)', '1 grated apple, also goes well (as well as the carrot)']
instructions: ['Combine dates, brown sugar, bicarb soda and water in a pot. Bring to boil, simmer for 1-2 mins (stir a few times) then turn off heat and leave to cool.', 'Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius Grease a 22x 11cm tin (or use baking paper).', "Add carrot to date mix (I just grate straight into pot) a 1/2 or whole apple is also nice grated in too (I don't wait until date mix is totally cool).", "Sift flour and spices together and add to mix. (I don't- I just chuck it all into the pot! Saves on dishes).", 'Mix well and spoon into loaf tin. You can add extra water if too dry to mix well.', 'Bake for 40-50 minutes Use a skewer to check if middle cooked.', 'Note- if using gluten free flour (not self raising) add 2- 2.5 teaspoons of baking powder + 1 tsp (optional) of guar gum.']

name: Pan Seared Lamb Medallions
ingredients: ['1 1/3 lbs lamb medallions or 1 1/3 lbs lamb steaks, visible fat trimmed ', '1/4 cup rosemary, chopped ', '1 tablespoon cumin', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon fresh ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 cup chicken stock']
instructions: ['Place lamb in a bowl. Mix all other ingredients together except salt, olive oil, stock and butter. Massage the lamb and marinate at room temperature for 15-30 minutes.', 'Heat pan over medium high heat. Add olive oil and butter. When it just starts to smoke a little, sear lamb for 3 to 4 minutes on each side for medium doneness. Baste continuously with pan oil and butter when searing. Set lamb aside and drain oil.', 'Deglaze pan with chicken stock to make pan jus. Pour jus over lamb when serving.']

name: Sultana, Tea and Ginger Cake
ingredients: ['1 cup sultana', '1 teaspoon earl grey tea (leaves)', ' water (to cover the sultanas)', '250 g butter, softened ', '2 cups caster sugar', '3 eggs', '2 cups self-raising flour', '1/4 cup crystallized ginger, slivered ', '2 cups icing sugar, sieved (sifted)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 teaspoons butter, softened ', ' boiling water']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C \r', 'Grease or line a 9 x 9 cake tin.\r', 'Put the sultanas in a small saucepan with the tea. Cover with water, bring to a boil then simmer for 10 minutes. \r', 'Drain, then beat in the 250g butter.\r', 'Beat the sugar and eggs until well combined then add the sultana mixture. \r', 'Fold in the flour and crystalized ginger then spoon into the tin and bake for approximately 1 hour or until an inserted skewer comes out clean.\r', 'Make the icing by putting the icing sugar, vanilla, ground ginger and butter in a bowl. \r', 'Mix then slowly pour in enough boiling water to be able to mix the icing to a drizzling consistency.\r', 'Drizzle over the cake.']

name: Kumera, Smoked Chicken and Egg Salad
ingredients: ['3 large kumara, scrubbed ', '4 tablespoons cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons honey', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped ', '4 tablespoons flat leaf parsley, chopped ', '1/2 cup gherkin, sliced into rounds ', '4 eggs, hardboiled and cut into half ', '2 smoked chicken breasts, skin removed and thinly sliced ', '4 radishes, sliced into rounds ', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['Put kumera in a pot, add apinch of salt and cover with cold water. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat to a simmer and cook till tender, approx 15 - 20 minutes. Drain, run ender cold water and rub the skin off the kumera.\r', 'Cut the kumera into pieces and place in a bowl. Sprinkle with the vinegar and set aside to cool.\r', 'In another bowl combine the honey, oil, onion, parsley and gherkins. Fold this into the kumeras, trying not to break up the kumera too much, then gently fold in the eggs, chicken and radishes Season to taste and cover and chill for a couple of hours before serving.']

name: Lamb Kebabs
ingredients: ['300 g lamb, diced into 1 - 2cm pieces ', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped ']
instructions: ['Place meat into a resealable plastic bag.\r', 'Heat lemon juice, honey, vegetable oil and garlic till the honey has melted - I do this in the microwave, setting the timer for about 20 seconds. Stir well, and allow to cool before pouring the marinade over the lamb. Leave to marinade for at least 20 minutes - longer if you have the time.\r', 'Thread lamb onto swekers and cook on barbecue or grill pan for approx 2 - 3 minutes per side and serve. The lamb should be pink on the inside, but not red.']

name: Marmite Tuna Bruschetta
ingredients: ['1 French bread, sliced 1/2-inch thick ', '1/2 teaspoon margarine (or butter-for each slice of bread)', '1/2 tablespoon marmite (or Vegemite-for each slice of bread-more or less to taste)', '1 (6 ounce) can tuna (in olive oil)', '2 tomatoes, sliced 1/4-inch thick ', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 pinch salt', ' fresh ground black pepper', ' fresh basil (to garnish, or use parsley or herb of choice)']
instructions: ['Slice the bread in 1/2" slices and place on baking sheet. Toast bread under broiler until just turning golden brown, about 2-3 minutes.', 'Spread a little butter and marmite on the toasted bread slices and bake the bread and place under the broiler one more minute to heat.', 'Drain the tuna and mash lightly. Set aside.', 'Slice tomatoes and mix with olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste.', 'To serve, place one slice of tomato on top of toast. Top with tuna mixture and place a leaf of basil(or herb of choice) over the tuna. Enjoy!']

name: Cardamom Honey Chicken Recipe
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons sherry wine', '1 teaspoon cardamom seed, ground ', '1 teaspoon peppercorn, ground ', '6 chicken breasts or 1 whole chicken, cut into parts ', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lemon, thinly sliced ', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['If a recipe calls for ground cardamom, it is best to start with whole pods. Break open the pods to release the tiny brown and black cardamom seeds. Use a spice grinder or mortar and pestle to grind the seeds.', 'Preheat oven to 390°F Warm the honey, stir in the sherry, cardamom and peppercorns. Place marinade and chicken in a large bowl, coat chicken with marinade. Cover with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes.', 'Heat olive oil in a large frying pan at medium high heat. Sear the chicken, skin side down, until golden.', 'Place lemon slices in a roasting pan. Lay the chicken pieces on top. Brush with the marinade. Season generously with salt and pepper. Place in the oven and bake until done, approximately 15 minutes for breasts, 20 minutes for thighs, wings, and drumsticks. Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes before serving. Pour out drippings from the pan into a gravy boat for gravy.']

name: Wellington Lamb Burgers
ingredients: ['1 lb ground lamb', '1 medium onion, grated ', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons horseradish sauce', '1 lemon, zest of ', ' salt & freshly ground black pepper', '2 large eggs, hard-boiled ', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped ']
instructions: ['Blend the ground lamb with the onion, nutmeg, horseradish sauce and lemon zest. \r', 'Add plenty of seasoning then divide the mixture into four.\r', 'Shell and mash the eggs and blend with the mayonnaise, parsley and seasoning.\r', 'Divide each piece of minced lamb in half and fatten into a burger. \r', 'Place a quarter of the egg mixture onto each, cover with the other half and mold together to make four large burgers.\r', 'Cook under a preheated grill or barbecue for about 10 minutes on each side or until cooked through.\r', 'Serve in large burger rolls with salad.']

name: Rolled Pavlova (New Zealand & Australia)
ingredients: ['3 egg whites', '1 cup fine sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 teaspoon vinegar', '1 tablespoon cornflour (cornstarch)', '1 1/2 tablespoons fine sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons macadamia nuts', '1 1/2 tablespoons skinned hazelnuts', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 cup whipped cream', '2 tablespoons coffee or 2 tablespoons pureed berries', '2 tablespoons icing sugar']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a sponge roll tin with baking paper.', 'Beat the egg whites until stiff. Gradually beat in the sugar, a spoonful at a time, until the sugar has dissolved.', 'Fold in the vanilla, cornflour and vinegar and spoon into the prepared tray.', 'Put the crust ingredients into a food processor and process until the consistency of breadcrumbs. Sprinkle over the meringue.', 'Bake for 10-15 minutes.', 'Lift the Pavlova on its baking paper onto a rack to cool.', "Whip the cream with the coffee, spread over the Pavlova, and roll up, removing the baking paper as you go. Don't worry if the Pavlova cracks a little - sprinkle with icing sugar.", 'To serve, cut into slices.']

name: Fresh Coconut Ceviche
ingredients: ['1/2 fresh coconut', '1/2 cup fresh coriander, chopped ', '1/4 cup chives, chopped ', '1 lime, juice and zest of', '2 Thai red chili peppers, chopped ', '1 (398 ml) can good quality coconut milk or 1 (398 ml) can pure creamed coconut', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped ', '2 lbs of white fish, such as Tilapia or 2 lbs perch', ' good quality crab claw meat', '1 cup fresh lemon juice']
instructions: ['Remove the coconut from the sheel and place in food processor in chunks.', 'Add the coriander, chives, lime zest and juice, and Thai chilies to the food processor and pulse all together.', 'Add the coconut milk and red onion to the food processor, pulse,', 'Set aside and refrigerate.', 'Finely chop fish and crab meat, add 1 cup of lemon juice, enough to cover fish. Refrigerate for approximately 45 minutes, or until the fish is opaque.', 'Drain the seafood mixture well and add to the coconut mixture.', 'Serve chilled, using the coconut shell as decoration.']

name: Kiwi Relish
ingredients: ['2 garlic cloves', '2 scallions', '1 teaspoon green peppercorns in brine, crushed ', '2 tablespoons wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon Thai sweet chili sauce', '2 -4 tablespoons cilantro leaves, chopped ', '4 kiwi fruits, halved and peeled ']
instructions: ['Peel the garlic and put it in the food processor with the roughly chopped scallions and the drained green peppercorns. Process till finely chopped.\r', 'Add the vinegar and sweet chili sauce and pulse to combine, then add the cilantro leaves and kiwi fruit Pulse until the kiwifruit and cilantro are fairly finely and evenly chopped .\r', 'Leave to stand for an hour or so for best flavour, but serve sooner if needed.']

name: Gingernut Biscuits
ingredients: ['6 ounces flour', '1 pinch salt', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '3 ounces butter', '3 ounces golden syrup (warmed)', '3 ounces brown sugar']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 325°F', 'Sift the flour, salt, baking soda, spices, and baking powder together.', 'Rub in the butter.', 'Stir in the brown sugar.', 'Add the warmed Golden Syrup and mix well.', 'Place 1 tbsp dollops on a greased cookie sheet and bake for about 8 minutes. Allow to cool for a minute, then transfer to wire rack to cool the rest of the way.']

name: Avocado and Kiwi Salsa
ingredients: ['1 avocado', '3 kiwi fruits', '1 green onion, chopped ', '1 tablespoon chervil, chopped ', '1 tablespoon sweet chili sauce, Thai ', '1 lemon, juice of ', '1 tablespoon avocado oil']
instructions: ['Peel the avocado and kiwifruit.\r', 'Dice the flesh of both before tipping into a mixing bowl. \r', 'Stir in the chopped green onion, chervil, chilli sauce, lemon juice and avocado oil.\r', 'Season to taste and serve.']

name: Kumara or Sweet Potato Pie (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '100 g butter, cubed ', '2 tablespoons ice-cold water', '900 g sweet potatoes or 900 g kumara, peeled and cut into chunks ', '1 cup of loose dark brown sugar', '1 cup milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground cloves', '1/4 cup butter', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', ' whipping cream (optional)', ' vanilla ice cream (optional)']
instructions: ['In a large bowl sift together the flour and icing sugar. Add the butter and use your fingertips to gently rub and combine until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs of different sizes but none larger than a pea.', 'Add the ice-cold water and gently mix with your hands until mixture comes together. Roll into a ball and wrap in plastic. Refrigerate while you steam the sweet potato.', 'Steam sweet potato chunks until tender.', 'Place chunks into a blender or food processor along with milk, sugar, butter, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves. Blend until smooth. Let the mixture cool a little before adding the eggs and vanilla essence and then blend again to combine. Set aside.', 'Pre-heat the oven to 350F (180C).', 'Remove pie dough from fridge and place on a floured surface. Roll out to fit larger than the pie tin. Place dough in tin and press down onto base and up the sides with your fingers to make the shell. Trim the sides and then press down with a fork or your fingers.', 'Line pastry shell with baking paper and fill with pie weights. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes until partially cooked. Remove from oven and remove pie weights and baking paper. Cool for 1 or 2 minutes.', 'Pour sweet potato mixture into the pie shell and bake for a further 35-40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.', 'Serve with whipping cream or vanilla Ice cream on the side.']

name: New Zealand Kumara Bake
ingredients: ['4 medium sweet potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced in halves lengthwise ', ' salt', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1 cup orange juice', '2 tablespoons chopped walnuts', '1/2 teaspoon grated orange rind', '3 tablespoons cooking sherry', '1/4 cup margarine']
instructions: ['Arrange potatoes in shallow baking pan or dish; sprinkle lightly with salt.\r', 'Combine cornstarch, brown sugar and 1/4 t salt.\r', 'Blend in orange juice and raisins.\r', 'Bring mixture quickly to a boil, stirring.\r', 'Add remaining ingredients and pour over potatoes.\r', 'Bake, uncovered, in oven preheated to 350*F 20 minutes or until potatoes are well glazed.\r', 'Garnish with orange slices, if desired.\r', 'NOTE: 1-pound 2-ounce can drained sweet pototes may be substituted for cooked potatoes.']

name: Wine and Garlic Marinade
ingredients: ['3 -4 garlic cloves', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon coarse salt (to taste)', '6 black peppercorns', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 cup red wine or 1 cup white wine']
instructions: ['Using a mortar and pestle, mash the garlic and add the dry ingredients one at a time, blending well.', 'Drizzle in 1 tbs. of olive oil.', 'Rub meat with spice mixture and place in glass dish.', 'Pour the wine over meat to partially or entirely cover it.', 'Marinate, turning occasionally, for a few hours or overnight in refrigerator.']

name: Wild Mushroom Soup With Horseradish Cream
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped ', '2 stalks celery, chopped ', '1 leek, chopped ', '1/2 garlic clove, chopped ', '7 ounces unsalted butter', '1 lb morel, sliced ', '6 cups chicken stock', '10 ounces potatoes, peeled ', '2 tablespoons freshly grated horseradish', '4 tablespoons sour cream', ' salt and fresh ground white pepper', '5 ounces porcini mushrooms', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley']
instructions: ["In a frying pan or skillet, sweat the onion, celery, garlic, and leek in some of the butter over low heat until soft. Add the morels to the pan. Continue to cook over low heat for 5-6 minutes. Add the chicken stock and potatoes to the saucepan and bring to a boil. Simmer for 45 minutes. Puree the soup in a food processor or blender. Don't be tempted to thin the liquid down too much, as the finished soup should be fairly thick. Keep hot.\r", 'Make the horseradish cream by mixing the horseradish with the sour cream and some pepper.\r', 'Melt a little butter in a frying pan and quickly fry the porcini mushrooms. Add the parsley, toss together and then strain through a fine-mesh sieve to drain off the butter.\r', "To serve, adjust the soup's seasoning with salt and pepper and serve in deep bowls with some of the sauteed porcini mushrooms and a dollop of horseradish cream in the middle."]

name: Hokey Pokey
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 teaspoon baking soda (bicarbonate of soda)']
instructions: ['Put the sugar and Golden Syrup in a large saucepan (it foams) and bring to a boil. Boil for 4 minutes, watching to ensure it does not scorch.\r', 'Add the baking soda and beat until a light golden color and frothy,.\r', 'Pour onto a greased tray and allow to harden. \r', 'Break apart when set.']

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Appelmoes
ingredients: ['4 granny smith apples', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 tablespoon water', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 egg (optional)', '1 dash ground cinnamon', '5 -6 fresh Brussels sprouts (depending on size)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', ' salt & freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon butter']
instructions: ['1 To make the appelmoes, peel, core and roughly chop the apples.\r', '2 Put in a saucepan with the sugar, water and lemon juice. Let simmer for 10 minutes then either puree or pass through a sieve.\r', '3 If using an egg to create a richer sauce, return the sauce to the pan, add a whisked egg and stir until the sauce has thickened slightly. Pour into a bowl and lightly sprinkle with ground cinnamon.\r', '4 To cook the sprouts, preheat the oven to 200°C Toss the sprouts in olive oil and season generously. Tip into a roasting dish and cook for 20-30 minutes, or until they feel slightly soft when given a gentle squeeze. Add the butter and toss again before serving warm with the appelmoes.']

name: Ginger Beer
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1/4 teaspoon dried yeast granules', '1 cup sugar', '2 lemons', '1 tsp- 1 tbsp ground ginger', '1 cup boiling water']
instructions: ['For the starter, put sugar in warm water to dissolve. Add yeast and allow to proof.\r', 'Juice the lemons and grate the rinds. Put into a heatproof container with the sugar and ginger and pour in 1 cup boiling water. Allow to steep for 10 minutes.\r', 'Strain into a 1.5 liter bottle and top up with cool water so it is room temperature. \r', 'Once yeast has foamed, add to bottle and cap tightly.\r', 'Mix thoroughly and put in a warm place. \r', 'Leave the bottle alone until you cannot dent it (12 hours-3 days). Be sure to check regularly.\r', 'Refrigerate until chilled and open carefully.']

name: Raspberry Kisses
ingredients: ['8 tablespoons butter (1 stick)', '8 tablespoons sugar', '3 eggs', '1/2 cup flour', '1/2 cup cornstarch', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 ounces raspberry jam or 4 ounces raspberry preserves', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['Cream together butter and sugar. Add eggs one at a time, beating between each addition. Sift together flour, cornstarch, baking powder and a pinch of salt. Add to wet ingredients.\r', 'Drop dough by teaspoons onto greased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes at 400°F Cool.\r', 'Once cookies are cool, spread flat side with raspberry jam or preserves. Place another cookie on top of preserves by the flat side. Done.']

name: Dill-Havarti Sourdough Toast
ingredients: ['4 slices sourdough bread, about 1/2-inch thick, each cut in half ', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '4 ounces havarti-dill cheese, shredded (about 1 cup) ', ' fresh dill weed (optional)']
instructions: ['Heat grill. Brush one side of each bread slice with oil. Turn slices over; sprinkle each with garlic powder & cheese.\r', 'When grill is heated, place bread slices, oil side down, on grill over medium heat. Cook 3 to 5 minutes or until bread is crisp & cheese is melted. Sprinkle with dill if you like.']

name: Pumpkin Patties
ingredients: ['1 lb cooked pumpkin', '1 onion, finely chopped ', '4 ounces ham, minced ', '2 tablespoons chopped parsley', '1/2 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '2 teaspoons lemon rind, grated ', ' salt and pepper', '3 eggs', ' flour', ' breadcrumbs', ' butter (for frying)']
instructions: ['In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients together with 2 beaten eggs. Form into round patties and coat with flour. \r', 'Lightly beat the third egg and coat patties with egg then breadcrumbs. \r', 'Melt butter in a large frying pan and fry patties until lightly browned on both sides. \r', 'Serve hot.']

name: Dark Chocolate and Pear Friands
ingredients: ['150 g butter, melted ', '1 cup ground almonds', '4 egg whites, lightly whisked ', '1 cup icing sugar', '1/2 cup plain flour', '80 g dark chocolate, roughly chopped ', '2 pears, halved cored and finely chopped ', '1/2 pear, finely slice ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C.\r', 'Grease gem trays or muffin pans.\r', 'Using a large bowl, tip in the butter, almonds, egg whites, icing sugar and flour, then stir until just combined.\r', 'Stir through the chocolate and the pears, reserving the extra half to put on the top.\r', 'Spoon into the trays and bake for 10 minutes then top with slices of pear and continue cooking for a further 10-15 minutes.']

name: Oblongys
ingredients: ['75 g butter, melted ', '3 large eggs', '3/4 cup sugar', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 cup flour, minus 2 tablespoons ', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 tablespoons cocoa']
instructions: ['Place melted butter, eggs, sugar and milk into a bowl. \r', 'Lightly mix. \r', 'Sift in the carefully measured flour, baking powder and cocoa. \r', 'Using electric beater or a good hand beater, beat until the mixture is well mixed, looks creamy and is slightly paler in colour. \r', 'Pour mixture into patty containers and bake at 175 deg C for about 12 minutes. \r', 'When cooled ice with chocolate icing and place either jelly beans, pebbles or hundreds and thousands on top.']

name: Tan Fingers
ingredients: ['7/8 cup unsalted butter, softened ', '1/2 cup sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 1/4 cups unbleached all-purpose flour', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon light corn syrup', '14 ounces sweetened condensed milk']
instructions: ['Line the bottom and sides of a 9x13x 2 inch pan with buttered parchment or foil.\r', 'Set a rack in the lowest level of the oven and preheat to 350 degrees.\r', 'For the dough, beat the butter, sugar and salt with an electric mixer that has a paddle attachment, on medium speed, until soft and light, about 2-3 minutes.\r', 'Beat in the vanilla and then on lowest speed add the flour, scraping the bowl and paddle with a rubber spatula and continuing to mix until the dough is smooth.\r', 'Scrape 3/4 of the dough into the prepared pan. \r', 'Use the palm of your hands to press the dough down evenly, without compressing it any more than necessary.\r', 'Chill the dough lined pan, and reserve the remaining dough at room temperature.\r', 'For the filling, bring the butter, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk to a simmer in a medium saucepan, stirring occasionally.\r', 'Allow the mixture to boil gently until it starts to thicken and becomes a very light caramel color.\r', 'Pour the filling into a stainless steel bowl and let it cool for 5 minutes.\r', 'Remove the dough lined pan from refrigerator and scrape the filling onto the dough, spreading it out evenly to cover the dough.\r', 'Use the remaining dough to make a crumbly topping. Using your fingertips separate the dough into medium crumbs and evenly scatter them on the caramel filling.\r', 'Bake until the filling is a deep caramel color and the dough amd crumb topping are baked through, about 30 minutes. \r', 'Cool for about 10 minutes in the pan on a wire rack, then lift the slab of baked dough out of pan to a cutting board, before it has cooled completely. \r', 'Cut the slab into 24, 2 inch squares, store at room temperature, and serve within a couple of days.']

name: Rack of Lamb
ingredients: ['1 whole rack of lamb, french cut ', ' fresh garlic, minced ', ' extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons mirin', '1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, finely grated ', '1 shallot, minced ']
instructions: ['Rinse the rack, dry and then rub garlic into the meat and bones. Drizzle with olive oil and allow to stand an hour or so at room temperature.', 'In the meantime: Place the ginger in a saucepan; add shallot. In a small bowl, stir mirin, vinegar and soy sauce; add to saucepan. Heat the ingredients to boiling point then remove from heat, cover and leave to stand.', 'Cook the rack in a 400F oven for 15 minutes - it should still be pink in the centre. (you can divide the racks before cooking if you prefer the meat a little better done.).', 'Spoon some of the sauce on the plate; add the rack. Serve with hot vegetables.']

name: Scallops in Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['2 dozen sea scallops', '1 (750 ml) bottle dry white wine', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 lb mushroom', '2 egg yolks', '4 slices thick white bread, toasted and buttered ', '1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped ', '1 lemon, cut in 1/8ths ', ' salt & freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon butter, divided ', '1 teaspoon butter, divided ']
instructions: ['Wash and dry scallops. Place scallops in a bowl and cover with wine; add bay leaf and marinate about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, slice mushrooms and set aside. Separate eggs, this recipe only uses the yolks. Beat the yolks slightly.\r', 'Cook the scallops for 15 minutes in the wine over medium-low heat. When done, remove cooked scallops from saucepan and season with salt and pepper; keep warm.\r', 'In the meantime, sauté the mushrooms in 1 tablespoon butter over medium heat, stirring constantly, for about 5 minutes or to desired doneness.\r', 'Bring the marinade/cooking liquid to a boil and add 1/2 teaspoon butter. Slowly whisk in egg yolks to thicken. Season with a little salt and pepper.\r', 'To serve, arrange buttered toast on individual dishes. Top each with scallops and sautéed mushrooms. Spoon wine sauce over top and garnish with parsley and lemon wedge. (The original recipes calls for the bread to be fried in butter, so do that if you wish).']

name: Grilled Steak Au Poivre
ingredients: ['4 rib eye steaks, 3/4-inch thick ', '1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 -4 tablespoons peppercorns, coarsely cracked ', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 shallots, minced ', '2 tablespoons cognac or 2 tablespoons brandy', '1/3 cup dry red wine', '3 tablespoons heavy cream', '1 1/2 cups beef gravy, canned or homemade ', ' salt & freshly ground black pepper, to taste ']
instructions: ['Steak: Prepare a hot fire. Rub steaks lightly with oil & season with salt. Spread crushed pepper on wax paper & press both sides of each steak into peppercorns to coat.', 'Cook steaks on an oiled grill set 4 to 6 inches from coals, turning once or twice, until nicely browned outside yet still pink & juicy inside; about 6 to 8 minutes for rare. Serve with Creamy Cognac Sauce.', 'Sauce: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add shallots & cook just until softened but not browned, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Add cognac & standing back, ignite with a long-handled match. When flames subside, add wine & bring to a boil. Continue cooking until liquid reduces by half, about 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Whisk in cream & gravy & bring to a boil. Cook until sauce is just thick enough to boat the back of a spoon, about 5 minutes. Season with salt & pepper. Serve with steak.']

name: Pecan Passioncake With Cream Cheese Frosting (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '4 eggs', '1 1/4 cups oil', '225 g crushed pineapple, drained ', '1 cup chopped pecans (or walnuts)', '2 cups flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups grated carrots', '1/2 cup raisins (she said sultanas)', '250 g cheese cheese, softened ', '100 g butter, softened ', "3 cups confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla (or essence) or 1 teaspoon butterscotch extract (or essence)', ' chopped pecans, to decorate ']
instructions: ['Beat eggs and sugar until creamy. Add oil and mix well. Stir in pineapple and nuts. Stir in all dry things, followed by carrots and raisins. Pour into a 23 cm (9 inch) deep greased and paper-lined cake tin.', 'Bake at 180 degrees Celsius (350 F.) for 40-45 minutes until firm and cooked in the center. Test by inserting a skewer; it should come out clean. Rest in tin for 10 minutes, then remove and cool on wire rack. Frost when completely cool.', 'FROSTING: Beat everything together until fluffy and creamy. Spread over top and down sides of cake. Decorate with chopped pecans.']

name: Anzac Day Oaty Biscuits
ingredients: ['1/4 cup polyunsaturated margarine', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 egg, lightly beaten ', '1 cup oats', '1 cup whole wheat flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '1/2 cup sultana', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.\r', 'Melt the margarine and golden syrup.\r', 'Mix all the ingredients together.\r', 'Roll spoonfuls of the mixture into balls and place on a lightly greased oven tray.\r', 'Flatten.\r', 'Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.']

name: Leeks Baked With Cream, Bacon and Bay Leaves
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons butter', '2 leeks', '1/4 cup chicken stock', '1/4 cup white wine', '1/2 cup cream', '4 slices streaky bacon', '4 fresh bay leaves', ' sea salt', ' fresh ground black pepper']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 170°C.\r', 'Grease a baking dish with the butter.\r', 'Trim the leeks and split lengthwise then carefully rinse to remove any dirt.\r', 'Lay the leeks in the dish alternating with the bacon and the bay leaves. Pour over the stock, wine and cream. \r', 'Season and bake for 30 minutes until the leeks are meltingly tender.']

name: Honey Ginger Feijoa Frozen Yogurt
ingredients: ['5 guavas (Feijoas)', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon fresh gingerroot, grated ', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '1 1/4 cups 1% low-fat milk', '1/4 cup honey', '1 cup plain low-fat yogurt, stirred ']
instructions: ['Halve the feijoas; scoop out the pulp and discard the shell. \r', 'In a blender or food processor fitted with a metal blade, puree the feijoa pulp, lemon juice and ginger.\r', 'In a medium saucepan, combine the sugar and cornstarch; stir in the milk and honey. \r', 'Cook and stir until the mixture simmers. \r', 'Cook for 1 minute longer; remove from the heat. \r', 'Add the pureed feijoas.\r', 'Stir in the yogurt.\r', "Freeze in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's directions."]

name: Deviled Steak
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon catsup', '1 tablespoon water', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 dash pepper', '1 lb boneless beef sirloin or 1 lb beef tenderloin, cut 1-inch thick ']
instructions: ['For sauce, combine catsup, water, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, salt & pepper. \r', 'Trim fat from meat. \r', 'Grill meat on uncovered grill directly over medium-hot coals for 6 minutes. Brush with sauce.\r', 'Turn & grill to desired doneness, allowing 6 to 9 minutes more for medium, brushing frequently with sauce. \r', 'Brush any remaining sauce over meat before serving.']

name: Winter Squash and Apples (Slow Cooker)
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 (2 lb) butternut squash (pealed and seeded)', '2 apples (cored and sliced)', '1 medium onion (quartered and sliced)', '1 1/2 tablespoons butter']
instructions: ['Cut squash into 2 inch pieces and place in slow cooker. Add apples and onions. Sprinkle salt and pepper and stir well. Cook on low for 6 to 7 hours.\r', 'Just before serving, combine brown sugar, cinnamon, and butter and stir in with squash, apples, and onions. Add additional salt and pepper to taste.']

name: Smoked Fish Salad With Beans and Dill Mascarpone
ingredients: ['16 small vine ripened tomatoes', '20 -25 green beans, trimmed ', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 sides smoked fish fillet (or approximately 800g)', '200 g mascarpone', ' half a lemon, juice of ', ' salt', '1 tablespoon fresh dill, finely chopped ', ' salt', ' fresh ground black pepper']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 200°C \r', 'Put the tomatoes in an oven dish with the beans, drizzle with the oil and season. \r', 'Cook for approximately 10 minutes depending on their size, then set aside.\r', 'Remove the fish from the bones and tear into bite sized pieces.\r', 'Whisk the mascarpone with the lemon, salt and dill. \r', 'Serve the tomatoes, beans and fish together with a dollop of mascarpone on the top.']

name: Strawberry Feijoa Refresher
ingredients: ['2 large feijoas, guavas ', '1 cup strawberry, fresh or frozen ', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 cup milk, 1% lowfat ', '1 teaspoon unflavored gelatin', '1/4 cup light corn syrup', '1 cup plain low-fat yogurt, stirred ']
instructions: ['Halve the feijoas; scoop out the pulp and discard the shell. \r', 'In a blender or food processor fitted with a metal blade, puree the pulp and strawberries with the sugar.\r', 'In a small saucepan, combine the milk and gelatin; let stand for 1 minute. \r', 'Cook and stir over low heat until the gelatin dissolves. \r', 'Combine with the corn syrup and fruit. \r', 'Stir in the yogurt.\r', "Freeze in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's directions."]

name: New Zealand Squares
ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 1/4 cups flaked coconut, divided ', '1 cup dates, chopped ', '1/2 cup granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 cup unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees F, then grease & flour a 9-inch square baking dish.\r', 'In a large bowl, combine flour, 1 cup of coconut, dates, sugar & baking powder.\r', 'In a saucepan melt butter, then stir in the golden syrup & vanilla.\r', 'Pour over the mixture in the large bowl, mixing until crumbly, then press into the prepared baking dish.\r', 'Bake 20-30 minutes, then sprinkle the top with the remaining 1/4 cup of coconut.\r', 'When cool, cut into 9 squares & enjoy!']

name: Cointreau Blondies
ingredients: ['1 cup plain flour', '1/2 cup soft brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon orange peel, finely grated ', '1 cup macadamia nuts, chopped ', '400 g white chocolate chips', '300 g white chocolate chips', '1/3 cup cream', '2 tablespoons Cointreau liqueur']
instructions: ['Grease and line a 32cm x 32cm baking tray with baking paper.\r', 'Preheat oven to 180C (356 F).\r', 'Melt half the chocolate and the butter, mix until smooth.\r', 'Stir in the flour, sugar, orange rind, nuts and remaining white chocolate buttons.\r', 'Mix well and spread into baking tray.\r', 'Bake for 15 go 20 minutes until firm to touch.\r', 'Cool in baking tray.\r', 'Icing: Melt all ingredients and mix well together.\r', 'Pour over cooled base while still in tin.\r', 'Chill overnight and cut into triangles.']

name: The Almost Anzac Biscuit
ingredients: ['12 tablespoons butter, unsalted ', '3/4 cup all-purpose flour', '1/4 cup flax seed', '1 cup sugar', '1 cup coconut, unsweetened, shredded, toasted ', '1 cup rolled oats', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['Heat oven to 350°F Line cookie sheet with parchment paper.\r', 'In a small sauce pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add honey and baking soda to the butter and stir well. Remove from heat and set aside.\r', 'Mix the flour, flax seed, oats, sugar, coconut and salt in a bowl.\r', 'Add the melted butter to the dry ingredients and stir to combine.\r', 'Roll dough into 12 balls and flatten with bottom of glass. Place on cookie sheet 2" apart.\r', 'Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and cool on sheet for 5 minutes.\r', 'Remove to wire rack to cool completely.']

name: Pomegranate Marinated Lamb
ingredients: ['1/4 cup pomegranate molasses', '4 garlic cloves, chopped ', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground cumin, divided ', '1 1/2 teaspoons paprika', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1 1/2 lbs shoulder lamb chops, cut into 3/4 inch squares (or use 2 pounds bone-in lamb chops reserving the bones)', '1 1/2 cups water, divided ', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 (10 ounce) package couscous', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2/3 cup pomegranate seeds', '3 tablespoons basil leaves, torn ']
instructions: ['In a large bowl whisk together the first 5 ingredients (molasses - cinnamon) plus 1 3/4 teaspoon cumin, paprika, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.\r', 'Add lamb and toss. Cover and marinated for 2 hours at room temperature or up to 2 days in the refrigerator. Drain, reserving the marinade. Pat dry.\r', 'Heat a large skillet over medium high heat.\r', 'Add meat and bones (if using) and cook for 2-5 minutes, or until browned. You may need to cook lamb in batches.\r', 'Return all the lamb and bones to the skillet along with the reserved marinade and 1/4 cup water. Cover and simmer over medium low heat for 5-10 minutes or until meat is tender. Remove from heat and set aside.\r', 'Meanwhile in a saucepan bring remaining water (1 cup) and chicken broth to a boil over medium high heat. Add couscous and remaining cumin (1/4 teaspoon). Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff couscous with a fork and stir in butter.\r', 'Divide couscous among plates and top with lamb, pomegranate seeds and basil leaves, spooning remaining sauce over lamb.']

name: Kiwi Cream Pie
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups finely crushed vanilla wafers (36 wafers)', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/3 cup butter or 1/3 cup margarine, melted ', '1 enveloped unflavoured gelatin', '1 ounce plain yogurt', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/2 cup whipping cream', '2 kiwi fruits, peeled and sliced ', '1/2 cup whipping cream']
instructions: ['In a mixing bowl combine crushed vanilla wafers, cinnamon, and melted butter or margarine. Press into a 9 inch pie plate to form a firm, even crust. Chill the crust for 1 hour.', 'In the meantime, in a small saucepan soften gelatin in cold water, then cook and stir over medium heat until gelatin is dissolved. Cool completely.', 'In a large bowl, beat together yogurt, sugar, and lemon juice; stir in the cooled gelatin mixture. Chill until partially set.', 'Beat the first 1/2 cup of whipping cream until soft peaks forms and then fold it into the gelatin mixture. Chill till mixture mounds when spooned. Turn into chilled crust. Cover and chill several hours or till set.', 'Just before serving, arrange kiwi around the edges of the pie. Beat the second 1/2 cup of whipping cream until soft peaks form and spoon into the center of the pie; garnish with remaining kiwi slices.']

name: 100 Year Old New Zealand Lamb Dish - (I Have Used Deer W/This
ingredients: ['1 (4 -5 lb) boneless leg of lamb (New Zealand)', '2 cups vinegar', '1/2 garlic clove, small garlic thinly sliced ', '1 ounce of fresh mint or 1/4 ounce dried mint flakes', '3/4 cup sugar', '2 cups white wine']
instructions: ['place lamb in dish with a lid pierce with 3/4 inch knife all over to leave slashes 1/2 inch wide. Place sliced garlic in slices that you have made in the lamb . Pour the White wine over the lamb cover with lid. Let Sit over night 12-hrs at least refrigerated.', 'Place in oven and cook according to directions (normaly 275 for first 15-20 mins then 400 for 10-15 ) according to size', 'Take the 2 1/2 cups of vinegar boil down to 1 3/4 to increase acidity . While still hot add the sugar & mint let sit till cool . Seperate in small dipping dishes to dip lamb in and enjoy .']

name: Aotearoa (New Zealand) Scallops With Pernod
ingredients: ['24 scallops', '1 onion, finely chopped ', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '50 g butter', '200 g belly bacon', '6 button mushrooms, sliced ', '100 ml Pernod', '200 ml cream']
instructions: ['Clean scallops, remove sinew and pat dry.\r', 'Saute onion and garlic in butter.\r', 'Add bacon and mushrooms, and cook for 2 - 3 minutes.\r', 'Transfer to a separate bowl.\r', 'Heat pan again, and add scallops cooking 2 minutes on 1 side then turn and add vegetables and bacon back into pan.\r', 'De glaze pan by add Pernod and allow to flame.\r', 'Add cream and cook for 2 minutes and serve.']

name: Braised Pork Belly
ingredients: ['2 -3 kg pork belly', '1/4 cup sweet chili sauce', '1/4 cup oyster sauce', '4 tablespoons brown sugar', '4 potatoes', '1/4 cup cream', '25 g butter', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['Place Pork skin side up in a large roasting dish.\r', 'Pour the Sauces over the top.\r', 'Sprinkle Brown Sugar Over.\r', 'Half fill roasting dish with water.\r', 'Cover with foil.\r', 'Bake in the oven 300F for 3 - 4 hours until melt-in-the mouth tender.\r', 'Cook potatoes, drain then dry over heat.\r', 'Mash with cream and butter.\r', 'Steam some seasonal green veges till just done.\r', 'Divide mash between 4 plates.\r', 'Cut Pork into serving chunks and arrange over top with some of the cooking liquid.\r', 'Garnish with green vegetables.']

name: Pavlova With Whipped Cream and Fresh Fruit
ingredients: ['4 egg whites', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 cup sugar', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 teaspoon vinegar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 cup heavy cream, chilled ', '1 teaspoon vanilla (optional)', '2 tablespoons sugar (optional)', ' fresh fruit, sliced ']
instructions: ['1. Grease and flour a parchment-lined baking sheet, or a springform pan. Preheat the oven to 275 degrees. Beat the egg whites with the salt and cream of tarter in the large bowl of a standing mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add the sugar, and continue beating till it will hold stiff peaks. Beat in the cornstarch, vinegar and vanilla.\r', '2. Using a rubber spatula, mound the meringue in a circle on the prepared baking sheet, or into the springform pan. Either way, make the sides slightly higher than the center, to create a bit of a well for the whipped cream. Bake in center of oven for 1 hr 15 minutes, then allow to cool inside the oven with the door slightly ajar. The outside will be dry, and will be a pale, cream colour. The surface may crack, but the inside will be moist and marshmallowy.\r', '3. Just before serving, whip the cream (adding 1 tsp vanilla and 2 tbsp sugar, if desired). Pile the cream onto the meringue and top with the fresh, sliced fruit. Serve immediately.']

name: Pan Fried Lamb Backstraps With Roasted Potatoes and Tomatoes
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, sliced ', '5 medium floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks ', '8 medium tomatoes, cored ', '3 red onions, sliced ', '1 cup black olives', ' salt & freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '1/2 cup fresh oregano leaves', '4 garlic cloves, chopped ', '4 sirloin lamb chops, all fat and sinew removed ', '4 tablespoons white wine', '1/2 cup beef stock', '1 tablespoon butter']
instructions: ['Vegetables:.', 'Preheat the oven to 200°C', 'Put everything into a roasting dish just big enough to hold it. Season with salt and pepper and mix everything well so that it is all coated with oil.', 'Put into the oven and roast until the potatoes are tender and the tomatoes have collapsed, about 45 minutes. Keep warm.', 'Lamb:.', 'Put the oil, pepper, oregano and garlic into a blender or food processor and purée until smooth.', 'Pour the mixture over the lamb and mix well so the lamb is well coated.', 'Heat a frying pan until very hot and add the lamb.', 'Pan-fry for about 4 minutes on each side until the lamb is medium.', 'Remove from the pan and rest while you make the sauce.', 'Pour any fat from the pan, put it over high heat and add the wine.', 'Let it bubble then add the stock. Bring to the boil, scraping up the caramelised juices from the pan with a wooden spoon, and reduce until it is becoming syrupy. Stir in the butter.', 'Slice each lamb shortloin into 4 pieces and serve it on top of the vegetables with the sauce poured over.']

name: Hotel D'urville Seafood Chowder
ingredients: ['4 cups seafood, mix ', '2 celery ribs', '2 carrots, peeled ', '1 leek', '2 red onions', '250 g unsalted butter', '250 g flour', '500 ml milk', '500 ml cream', '8 saffron strands, soaked in a little hot water ', ' ground pepper', ' smoked manuka sea salt', '2 lemons, juice of']
instructions: ['Finely dice celery,leek,carrots and onions and reserve.\r', 'In a large pot melt butter then add flour and stir or whisk constantly to cook out the roux for at least 20 minutes.\r', 'Add the saffron and stir in well. gradually add milk while stirring.\r', 'The roux should thicken. As it does keep adding liquid until a smooth texture is reached.Simmer gently for a few minutes.\r', 'In a saucepan with 2 tablespoons of olive oil gently saute veges in batches.\r', 'Once done add to chowder base.\r', 'Add lemon juice and seafood mix and season to taste.\r', 'Finish with cream and finely sliced spring onions. Mix well.\r', 'Serve with freshly baked bread.']

name: Anzac Cookies
ingredients: ['3 1/2 ounces porridge oats', '3 1/2 ounces desiccated coconut', '4 ounces all-purpose flour', '4 ounces superfine sugar', '4 ounces butter, plus extra butter for greasing ', '1 tablespoon corn syrup', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda']
instructions: ['Heat oven to 350°F Put the oats, coconut, flour and sugar in a bowl. Melt the butter in a small pan and stir in the syrup. \r', 'Add the bicarbonate of soda to 2 tbsp boiling water, then stir into the syrup and butter mixture. \r', 'Make a well in the middle of the dry ingredients and pour in the butter and syrup mixture. Stir gently to incorporate the dry ingredients. \r', 'Put dessertspoonfuls of the mixture on to buttered baking sheets, about 1in apart to allow room for spreading. \r', 'Bake in batches for 8-10 mins until golden. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.']

name: Easy Pavlova
ingredients: ['4 egg whites', '1 1/4 cups white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '2 teaspoons cornstarch', '1 pint heavy cream', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 cup lemon curd, chilled ', '6 kiwi, peeled and sliced or 6 fruit, of your choice ']
instructions: ['Pre-heat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).', 'Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Draw a 9 inch circle on the parchment paper.', 'In a large bowl, beat egg whites until stiff but not dry.', 'Gradually add in the sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating well after each addition.', 'Beat until thick and glossy.', 'Overbeaten egg whites lose volume and deflate when folded into other ingredients.', 'Be absolutely sure not a particle of grease or egg yolk gets into the whites.', 'Gently fold in vanilla extract, lemon juice and cornstarch.', 'Spoon mixture inside the circle drawn on the parchment paper.', 'Working from the center, spread mixture toward the outside edge, building edge slightly.', 'This should leave a slight depression in the center.', 'Bake for 1 hour; cool on a wire rack.', 'Let cool completely before next phase.', 'Remove the paper, and place meringue on a flat serving plate.', 'Place the cream, sugar, and vanilla in bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment; beat on medium-high speed until soft peaks form, about 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.', 'Gently fold lemon curd into whipped cream.', 'Pile center of the meringue with whipped cream.', 'Top whipped cream with kiwifruit slices OR fruit of your choice.']

name: Pumpkin & Almond Pilau (Rice)
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped ', '2 tablespoons finely chopped ginger', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped ', '1 finely grated lemon, zest of', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 tablespoon toasted coriander seed', '5 cm piece cinnamon sticks', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup roasted and chopped almonds, plus extra for garnish ', '2 cups pumpkin, that has been peeled seeded and diced 2cm ', '2 cups basmati rice, well rinsed in cold water, soaked 30 minutes and well drained ', '3 cups chicken stock']
instructions: ['Heat the oil in a saucepan until hot but not smoking. \r', 'Add everything except the rice and stock and stir-fry over moderate heat, without browning, until the onion is soft. \r', 'Add the rice and mix well. Add the stock, mix well and bring to the boil.\r', 'Cover tightly, turn the heat to the lowest setting (or if your stove is electric, put a heat-diffusing mat under the saucepan and turn the heat to low) and cook 25 minutes. \r', 'Do not uncover for any reason during this time.Uncover and gently mix well so that everything is evenly distributed. \r', 'Pile the pilau onto a serving dish and scatter extra roasted almonds on top.']

name: Emz Chocolate Wizz Cake
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups flour', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '1 1/2 cups milk', '1/2 cup cooking oil', '1/2-1 cup cocoa (to suit your taste)', '2 eggs', '50 g melted butter or 50 g margarine', '1 tablespoon malt vinegar', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '1 -2 teaspoon vanilla essence (to suit your taste)', '1 pinch salt', '1/2-1 cup white chocolate chips (or a mixture of both, to taste) (optional) or 1/2-1 cup dark chocolate chips (or a mixture of both, to taste) (optional)', '1/2-1 cup nuts (any kind or mix, to taste) (optional)']
instructions: ['Put all ingredients into food processor (except choc chips/nuts), if food processor is small you may need to wizz in two batches.', 'Wizz for 2-3 minutes.', 'Stir in chocolate chips/nuts with a spoon.', 'Pour mixture into a 8-10 inch tin, lined on the bottom with lightly greased sides.', 'Bake in pre heated oven at 180 degrees C for approx 1 1/4 hours (when cake is pricked through with a wooden skewer and comes out clean).', 'Remove from oven and allow to stand for a few mins before turning onto a cake rack.', 'allow to cool and frost with your favorate icing or whipped cream and berries,alternativly dust with icing sugar.', 'Delishious on its own or with youghurt and fruit / icecream / custard.', 'Enjoy!']

name: Emz Luscious Lemon Slice
ingredients: ['125 g flour', '90 g sugar', '75 g butter, cold and chopped into small pieces ', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon zest', '4 eggs', '225 g sugar', '1/2-3/4 cup lemon juice, freshly squeezed ', '2 tablespoons flour']
instructions: ['to make the base put all base ingredients in a food processor and wizz until the mixture forms a ball.', 'roll out and press into the base of a 23cm buttered springfoam tin.', 'bake at 180 degrees C for about 20 mins until just turning golden.', 'meanwhile, for the filling, beat together the eggs and sugar until creamy.', 'fold in the lemon juice and flour.', 'pour this mixture over the crust and bake at 180 degrees C for a further 15 minutes.', 'lower the heat to 150 degrees C and bake for a further 30 mins, until the lemon mix is set.', 'cool and dust with icing sugar.', 'enjoy!']

name: Pear and Boyensberry Shortcake
ingredients: ['1 1/4 cups flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 cup semolina', '1/2 cup caster sugar', '175 g butter', '1 egg, beaten ', '2 tablespoons cold water or 2 tablespoons milk', '1/2 cup boysenberry jam', '410 g canned pears, quarters, in clear fruit juice, drained and thickly sliced ']
instructions: ['Rub together flour, baking powder, semolina, castor sugar and butter in a mixing bowl until the mixture resembles crumbs.', 'Cut in beaten egg and water or milk until the mixture forms small moist ball of dough. Take 2/3 of the mixture, lightly knead an dpress out to fit a 20 x 30cm slice tin.', 'Spread with Boyensberry jam, arrange sliced pear evenly over jam. Scatter with remaining crumbled dough.', 'Cook at 180c or moderate oven for 25-30mins or until golden. Cool on a wire rack, cut into 12 pieces. Serve warm as a dessert with custard, yoghurt or cream, any leftovers will make popular lunch box fillers.']

name: Pavlova
ingredients: ['4 egg whites', '4 tablespoons ice water', '1 cup caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 teaspoons cornflour', '1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar']
instructions: ['Separate your egg whites ensuring no yolk remains, pour the whites into a cool or room temp bowl and check to make sure there is no fat or oil on the beaters or bowl, any fat will prevent the whites from whipping correctly.', 'Whip the egg whites until they hold stiff peaks and then add the cold water slowly while whipping.', 'Fold in the caster sugar gradually, followed by the vinegar, vanilla, cornflour and cream of tartar while whipping.', 'Scoop out the mix onto a sheet of baking paper, using a spatula mold the mix into a circle around 20cm wide and then create a slight well in the center, sloping it out towards the edges, this will stop the pavlova from cracking as much.', 'Bake at 150°C for 50 minutes turning halfway through, when finished turn off the oven and open the door, leaving the pavlova in the oven for an hour or two, transfer it to the fridge and allow it to cool, it has a very eggy flavour when eaten raw.']

name: Emz Crunchy Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1 -2 slice bacon', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 garlic cloves, crushed ', ' cornflour (to thicken)', ' salt', ' pepper', '2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine', '1 onion, finely chopped ', '1 -2 teaspoon dried herbs', '1 cup fresh breadcrumb']
instructions: ['place chicken (whole or jointed) in a saucepan with bacon, water, soy sauce and garlic.', 'cover and simmer over a very low heat for about an hour, or until flesh is cooked tender.', 'bone chicken and place flesh in an shallow casserole dish.', 'chop bacon and sprinkle over the chicken.', 'strain remaining liquid, thicken to desired consistancy with cornflour paste, season and pour over chicken and bacon.', 'for the topping, melt butter in a pan at moderate heat and cook the onion untill tender, not brown.', 'remove from the heat and mix well with the bread crumbs and dried herbs.', 'spread the topping evenly over cooled sauce and chicken. (Can be refrigerated at this stage).', 'cook in a pre heated oven at 190 dagrees C for about 30 - 40 mins untill topping is crisp and meal is heated through.', 'Enjoy!']

name: Lemon and Poppy Seed Cake
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '3 cups sugar', '5 lemons, juice and zest of', '2 cups natural yogurt', '2 cups baking oil', '4 cups flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '4 tablespoons poppy seeds', '3/4 cup sugar', '1/4 lemon juice']
instructions: ['Beat eggs and sugar until creamy.', 'Add lemon rind and juice, yogurt. Stir.', 'Slowly pour in oil while beating.', 'Add flour, BP, poppy seeds and a pinch of salt.Beat slowly.', 'Pour into 2 medium cake tins that have been greased with oil or butter.', 'Bake at 160 degrees Celsius for 1 hour or until skewer inserted into centre comes out clean.', 'Remove from oven pour over hot syrup, put back in oven for a further 2 minutes.', 'Remove from oven, cool, serve with yoghurt.', 'SYRUP.', "Heat sugar and lemon juice in small pot until sugar has dissolved and consistency becomes 'syrupy'.", 'Pour hot over hot cake straight from the oven before replacing cake in oven for a further 2 minutes.']

name: New Zealand Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '500 g lean ground beef', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped ', '420 g pasta sauce', '500 ml water', '10 button mushrooms, finely chopped ', '1 carrot, finely diced ', '1 zucchini, finely diced ', '3 cups mashed potatoes']
instructions: ['Brown the mince and garlic in the oil in a hot pan, breaking the mince up into small pieces with wooden spoon or potato masher. \r', 'Add chopped veges, pasta sauce and water, stirring after each addition.\r', 'Bring to a simmer and half cover pot. Cook 10-15 mins or until most of liquid evaporated and veges are soft to touch.\r', 'Spoon mixture into casserole dish and top with mashed potato (you can pipe it or just pile it on and smooth out the top).\r', 'Bake at 180°C for about 15 minutes or until top is golden.\r', 'Suggestions: I add grated cheese, milk and a pinch of green herb seasoning to the potato before mashing, then fill a plastic bag, cut the corner off and pipe it in a nice pattern over the top.']

name: Emz Lovely Lemon Tahini Sauce
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups tahini', '1 1/2 cups yoghurt (plain unsweeted is best)', '1 -2 garlic clove, crushed ', '1/2 cup lemon juice, freshly squeezed ', '1/4 cup scallion, finely chopped ', '1/4 cup parsley, finely chopped ', '1/2-1 teaspoon cumin, ground ', '1/4-1/2 teaspoon cayenne, ground ', '1/4-1/2 teaspoon paprika, ground ', '1/4-1/2 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['put all ingredients into a bowl.\r', 'beat well using a wooden spoon,whisk or electric mixer. the more you whip, the thicker it becomes to suit individual desire.\r', 'serve at room temperature with hot/warm foods, chilled with salads.\r', 'enjoy!']

name: Salmon and Leek Cakes
ingredients: ['250 g potatoes, peeled ', '1 tablespoon whole grain mustard', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon tomato sauce', '500 g salmon, pin bones removed ', '1 leek, finely sliced (green and white parts)', '25 g butter', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt & freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 cup flour', '1 egg, beaten ', '1 cup coarse breadcrumbs or 1 cup panko breadcrumbs', '6 tablespoons freshly grated parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', '1 lemon, zest of', ' light vegetable oil (for frying)', ' mesclun, leaves to serve ', ' sour cream flavoured with either fresh chives or horseradish, to serve ']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 200°C Boil the potatoes in salted water until tender, drain and mash with the mustard, mayonnaise and tomato sauce.\r', 'Place the salmon in an oven dish lined with baking paper and bake for 6 minutes (it should not be fully cooked). Remove from the oven, cool a little then remove the skin and cut or flake the flesh into 2cm cubes.\r', 'Sauté the leek in the butter with a lid on until cooked but not brown. Gently combine in a large bowl with the mashed potatoes and salmon. Season with salt and pepper. \r', 'Make neat cakes by packing the mixture into an 8cm x 3cm biscuit cutter sitting on a sponge roll tin lined with baking paper. Put the tray in the freezer for up to 1 hour so the cakes are easier to handle.\r', 'Turn the oven to 200°C fan bake. Dip the cakes in flour, then egg, then coat in the crumb mixture. Brown the cakes quickly in batches in about 0.5cm light flavourless oil. Transfer the cakes to the oven and finish them off for up to 6 minutes, depending on how cold they were. The salmon should still be slightly underdone.\r', 'Make a small pile of mesclun on each plate, top with a salmon cake and serve the sour cream on the side.']

name: Gingerbread Cupcakes W/Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons unsalted softened butter', '1/2 cup granulated sugar or 1/2 cup Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking', '1/4 cup light molasses', '2 eggs', '1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '3/4 cup whole wheat pastry flour', '1/4 cup chopped candied ginger', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/2 cup prepared hot cocoa (adjust amount if needed)', '2 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened ', '2 ounces softened cream cheese', "2/3 cup confectioners' sugar", '1/4 teaspoon lemon extract']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F.', 'Butter or line a 12 muffin tin.', 'Cream 5 tablespoons of the butter with the sugar or Splenda. Add the molasses and the egg and the egg yolk.', 'Sift together the flour, ginger, cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg, and salt.', 'Dissolve the baking soda in the hot cocoa. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture and stir until just combined. Stir in the hot cocoa mixture. Pour the batter evenly into the prepared muffin tin.', 'Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until lightly springy to the touch. Cool in the pan and move to a rack.', 'To make frosting: Cream the 2 tablespoons butter and cream cheese, beat in confectioners sugar until fluffy. Add the lemon extract. Wait until the cupcakes are cool, then frost.']

name: Whitebait Fritters
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 cup whitebait', ' approx 1/2 cup self raising flour', ' oil']
instructions: ['beat egg with milk and salt.\r', 'Add one cup whitebait and sufficient self raising flour to make a batter conisitency of pikelet mix.\r', 'Cook as you would cook pikelets, in a pan with a little hot oil over medium heat.']

name: Chocolate & Orange Pumpkin Cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '4 ounces butter', '1/2 cup caster sugar', '1 cup mashed pumpkin', '1 1/2 cups flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 grated orange, rind of', '1 orange, juice of', '2 teaspoons vanilla custard powder', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '3 tablespoons cocoa']
instructions: ['Cream butter& sugar, add pumpkin, then beat in eggs, golden syrup& orange rind.', 'Sift dry ingredients,& add alternaly with orange juice, then put in 8 inch (18-20 cm) round cake pan.', 'Bake at 325 degrees F (150c) 45-60 minutes until cake begins to leave side of baking pan.']

name: Emz Fantastic Felafel
ingredients: ['4 cups chickpeas (2 cups soaked for 1 1/2 hours and boiled untill very soft, drained)', '2 -4 garlic cloves, crushed (to suit taste)', '1/2 cup scallion, finely minced ', '1/2 cup celery, finely minced ', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric, finely ground ', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne, finely ground ', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '1 1/2-2 teaspoons salt (to suit taste)', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons tahini paste', '3 tablespoons flour (or fine bread crumbs)', ' flour, for coating ', ' oil (for frying)']
instructions: ['mash the chickpeas well.\r', 'combine with other ingredients.\r', 'mix well.\r', 'with floured hands, make the batter into approx 1 inch balls or patties.\r', 'dust each one lightly with flour.\r', 'heat approx 2-inch pool of oil in a heavy skillet to 365 degrees C.\r', 'deep fry the felafels untill golden.\r', 'serve and enjoy!']

name: Choco Chunky Kiwi Biscuits
ingredients: ['342 g butter', '3/4 cup sugar', '6 tablespoons sweetened condensed milk', '3 cups flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '150 g chocolate bars, chopped up ']
instructions: ['Cream Butter and Sugar.\r', 'Add condensed milk and then sift dry ingredients.\r', 'Lastly add chocolate.\r', 'Roll into balls and place on greased trays.\r', 'Bake at 180 celcius (moderate oven) for 10 to 15 minutes.']

name: Lamb Shank Rogan Josh
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons fresh ginger, finely grated ', '3 garlic cloves, crushed ', '2 teaspoons turmeric', '3 bay leaves', '4 lamb shanks, trimmed ', '1 1/4 tablespoons fennel seeds', '6 cardamom pods, crushed to release seeds ', '1/3 cup sunflower oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced ', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '6 -8 small red chilies (or to taste)', '100 g cottage cheese', '200 g tomatoes, chopped ', ' coriander sprig, to garnish ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C.\r', 'Mix fresh ginger, garlic, turmeric and bay leaves in a large bowl. \r', 'Add lamb, toss to coat well, then stand at room temperature while you make the sauce.\r', 'Grind fennel and cardamom seeds in a mortar and pestle.\r', 'Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a frypan over medium heat. Cook onion, stirring for 6 minutes or until softened.\r', 'Add all ground spices and stir for a further 5 minutes or until the mixture is aromatic.\r', 'Set aside to cool slightly, then puree to a coarse paste in a blender or processor with chilli, cheese, tomatoes and remaining 2 tablespoons of oil.\r', 'Place lamb and its spice mix in a heavy-based, lidded casserole or large saucepan. \r', 'Add the paste and enough water to cover meat (about 300ml).\r', 'Stir to combine, then cover surface closely with a sheet of wet baking paper and foil to hold moisture.\r', 'Cover with the lid, then bake in oven for 1 1/2 hours, stirring from time to time, until the lamb is very tender.\r', 'Garnish with coriander and serve.']

name: Watermelon & Kiwi With Malibu Cream
ingredients: ['1 kg seedless watermelon, cut into 12 small wedges, rind removed ', '4 kiwi fruits, peeled, each cut into 4 slices ', '1/3 cup passion fruit pulp', '2 tablespoons Malibu rum (coconut liqueur)', ' heavy cream, to serve ']
instructions: ['Divide the watermelon and kiwifruit among serving bowls. Combine the passionfruit pulp and Malibu. \r', 'Dollop the cream over the fruit and drizzle with the passionfruit. Serve immediately.']

name: An Aussie Vegemite Pizza !
ingredients: ['1 prepared pizza crust, thawed ', '1 tablespoon vegemite', '100 g ham, thinly sliced ', '1 small onion, sliced ', '1 1/2 cups tasty cheese, grated (more to taste if you wish)', '2 eggs, lightly beaten ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 190°C.\r', 'Spread the Vegemite over the pizza base and top with the ham, onion, cheese.\r', 'Pour beaten egg over the pizza.\r', 'Cook for 12-15 minutes or until golden and egg is cooked through.']

name: Mustard Lamb Chops
ingredients: ['1 1/2 kg bbq lamb chops (1 cm thick)', '4 tablespoons English mustard', '2 bulbs of garlic', '6 chilies (adjust qty to your liking)', '1 teaspoon pepper (Crushed)', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs', '50 ml virgin olive oil', '50 ml canola oil']
instructions: ['Clean lambchops of excess fat.', 'Cut lambchops in halfs.', 'Wash in running tap water and keep aside to drain excess water.', 'Put Garlic, Chillies in small blender and crush (not too fine).', 'Empty garlic and chillies in mixing bowl.', 'Add crush pepper, mix herbs, salt and both oil.', 'Mix well.', 'Take each lambchop on a board and baste both sides.', 'Baste all lambchops.', 'Put in refrigrator for atleast 2 hours(best if marinated overnight).', 'Heat your BBQ and cook lamchops to your liking.', 'Serve with your favorite salad and garlic bread.']

name: Tamarillo & Carob Pudding
ingredients: ['6 tamarillos', '1/3 cup sugar', '3/4 cup water', '1 cup self-rising flour', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon carob powder', '2 ounces butter', '1/2 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1/3 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon carob powder', '1 cup water, approximately ']
instructions: ['Peel and poach whole, 6 tamarillos in 3/4 cup water and 1/3 cup of sugar until fruit just cooked.', 'Mix into a bowl: 1 cup SR flour, 3/4 cup sugar and 1 tbsp carob powder, and add to this 2 ozs (50 gms) of butter melted in 1/2 cup milk and 1 tsp vanilla.', 'Drain the syrup liquid that the tamarillos were poached in into a cup.', 'Place tamarillos on the bottom of a deep cooking dish and spoon over the pudding mix.', 'Sauce topping: Sprinkle 1/3 cup sugar and 1 tbsp carob powder over pudding mix.', 'Make up the syrup liquid to 2 cups by adding hot water and pour over top of the pudding.', 'Cook in a moderate oven 35-45 minutes.', 'Serve with plain ice cream.']

name: My Best Chicken and Vege Soup!!
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 leek (thinly sliced)', '2 -3 garlic cloves (minced)', '1 stalk celery (chopped)', '1 large carrot (grated)', '1 large sweet potato (grated or chopped)', '250 g pumpkin (chopped)', '1 large zucchini (grated)', '1 bay leaf', '1/4 cup dried lentils (or more if you like) or 1/4 cup soup mix (or more if you like)', '1 -2 chicken breasts (more if you like) or 1 -2 chicken piece (more if you like)', '5 -6 cups chicken stock or 5 -6 cups vegetable stock', ' salt and pepper', '1 (8 ounce) can creamed corn (or more)', ' fresh parsley']
instructions: ['Brown the chicken in a little oil or soup stock. Remove from pan.', 'Heat extra oil in the same saucepan over medium heat. Add leek and garlic. Cook, stirring, for 4 minutes or until soft.', 'Add vegetables. Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Add lentils and stock. Increase heat to high. Bring to the boil.', 'Reduce heat to low. Simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally, for 40 mins - 1 hour or until vegetables are tender.', 'Remove the chicken breasts and shred. Return to soup and add corn.', 'Season with salt, pepper and parsley.']

name: Caramel Sponge Kisses
ingredients: ['125 g sugar', '150 ml milk, hot ', '125 g butter', '2 eggs', '1 1/4 cups flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence']
instructions: ['Caramel:', 'Melt sugar in a saucepan and heat until it is a light coffee colour; cool a little.', 'Add the hot milk and dissolve caramel in it.', 'Kisses:.', 'Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy, about 5-8 minutes.', 'Add lukewarm caramel and egg yolks.', 'Beat until combined.', 'Stir in the dry ingredients with a spoon.', 'Lastly fold in stiffly-beaten egg whites.', 'Either pipe [pastry bag] onto lightly greased baking trays or spoon onto trays using rounded teaspoonsful.', 'Bake about 9 - 12 minutes at 190ºC (375ºF).', 'When cold sandwich together -- .']

name: Tamarillo Royale
ingredients: ['6 -8 red tamarillos or 6 -8 gold tamarillos', '1/4 cup sugar', '1/4 teaspoon Chinese five spice powder', '1/4 cup water or 1/4 cup apple juice', '1 1/2 cups cream, whipped ', '8 meringues']
instructions: ['Firstly prepare tamarillos by pouring boiling water over them, leaving for 5 minutes then peel skins off and slice tamarillos into four sections lengthwise.', 'Poach until just soft in water or applejuice, sugar and spice.', 'Cool completely.', 'Layer; tamarillos, whipped cream, tamarillos, then place a meringues on top, preferably in individual glass bowls so that the beautiful red tamarillo color is seen at its best.']

name: Boysenberry Kiwi Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 kiwi fruit, peeled ', '100 g boysenberries', '100 ml orange juice', '2 tablespoons vanilla yogurt', ' sugar, to sweeten (optional)']
instructions: ['Process all ingredients in a blender and chill before serving.']

name: Tamarillo and Date chutney (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['24 tamarillos', '4 apples, cored and chopped ', '4 large onions, chopped ', '400 g pitted dates, chopped ', '500 ml malt vinegar', '1 kg brown sugar', '2 teaspoons mixed spice']
instructions: ['Slice tamarillos in half lengthwise and place in microwave dish and cook for five minutes.', 'This enables one to remove skins with ease.', '(Depending on size of dish this will take several lots to microwave the 24 tamarillos).', 'Place all ingredients in a large pot or preserving pan and bring to the boil stirring frquently.', 'Simmer covered stirring frequently for approximately 2 hours or until thick.', 'Pour into hot sterilised jars and cover when cold.']

name: Tempura Prawns
ingredients: ['1 kg green prawns (remove shells,leave tails on)', '1 cup chilled soda water (or plain water)', '1/2 cup all-purpose flour (plain flour)', '1/2 cup cornstarch', '1 teaspoon baking soda', ' salt and pepper (to taste)', '1 egg yolk', ' oil (for deep frying)']
