Remove from heat.', 'In a large bowl, mix together the pasta, chicken, green onions, raisins and capers.', 'Pour the dressing over the pasta mixture and stir through.', 'Serve in lettuce leaves.']

name: Weetbix Based Chocolate Slice
ingredients: ['2 Weet-Bix', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons cocoa', '5 ounces butter', '1 cup flour', '3/4 cup brown sugar', '1 cup coconut', '3/4 cup sultana', '2 cups icing sugar', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '1/4 cup coconut', '2 tablespoons boiling water']
instructions: ['Base:.', 'Crumble the weetbix into a medium sized bowl.', 'Add flour, baking powder and rest of dry ingredients to weetbix and mix with wooden spoon.', 'Melt butter and add to dry mix then mix well.', 'Press into greased lamington/slice tin.', 'Bake at 180c for 15mins.', 'Icing:.', 'Combine icing sugar and cocoa in bowl.', 'Add butter slivers to top of icing', 'Pour small ammounts of boiling water over butter (approx 2 tablespoons)and beat with a table knife till no lumps remain. If too runny add more icing sugar. If too dry add more boiling water.', 'Pour icing over slice while still warm and sprinkle coconut over top.', 'Cut while still warm.']

name: Curried Pickled Onions
ingredients: ['2 1/2 kg pickling onions', '450 g brown sugar', '1 1/4 liters vinegar', '15 g ground cloves', '15 g ground allspice', '2 tablespoons flour', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '2 teaspoons turmeric']
instructions: ['Peel all the onions.', 'Without boiling heat the vinegar and sugar and stir till sugar is dissolved.', 'Stir in other dry ingredients (except for onions) which have been mixed with a little cold vinegar.', 'Boil until it thickens.', 'Pat dry onions, put in jars and fill jars with the sauce.', 'Keep three weeks before using.']

name: Champagne Cherry and Berry Jelly (Jello)
ingredients: ['1 (750 ml) bottle sparkling white wine', '1 1/2 cups caster sugar', '5 teaspoons unflavored gelatin (powder)', '300 g raspberries (2 punnets)', '150 g blueberries (1 punnet)', '300 g cherries']
instructions: ['In a saucepan heat the sparkling white wine and add the caster sugar and stir to dissolve through.', 'Once hot add the cherries and heat through for around 5 minutes. Then remove liquid and cherries and put aside in a glass bowl.', 'Completely dissolve the gelatine in 2 tablespoons of very warm water, stirring thoroughly.', 'Stir gelatine through wine and cherries.', 'Add the berries to the mixture and stir.', 'Very lightly spray the moulded tin with canola spray.', 'Ladle the mixture into the tin and cool to room temperature before placing plastic wrap over the tin and placing into the fridge.']

name: Sri Lankan Crab Curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon peanut oil', '2 large onions, finely chopped ', '4 garlic cloves, crushed ', '3 cm piece fresh ginger, grated ', '1 small red Thai chile, chopped finely ', '4 dried curry leaves', '1/2 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 (400 ml) cans coconut cream', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 (1 5/8 kg) cooked whole mud crabs', '1/2 cup coconut flakes, toasted ']
instructions: ['Heat oil in wok, stir-fry onion, garlic, ginger and chilli until onion softens. Add curry leaves and spices, stir-fry until fragrant. Add coconut cream, sauce and juice and simmer, uncovered for 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, prepare crabs. Lift tail flap of each crab then, with a peeling motion, lift off the back of each shell. Remove and discard the gills, liver and brain matter, rinse crabs well. Cut each body in half and separate claws from bodies. You will have eight pieces.', 'Add half of the crab to the wok, simmer, covered, about 10 minutes or until crab is heated through. Transfer crab to large serving bowl, cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining crab pieces.', 'Spoon curry sauce over crab, sprinkle with coconut.']

name: Wild Berry Rice for Rice Cooker
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups short-grain white rice', '2 cups water', '45 ml honey, warmed ', '2 tablespoons butter, melted ', '1 cup cream', '1 cup mixed berry (fresh or frozen)', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '1/4 cup water', '2 tablespoons port wine (optional)', ' berries, for serving ']
instructions: ['Place rice and 2 cups water into rice cooker and with lid on set cooker to cook.', 'Once cooked fluff rice and stir in honey, butter and cream. Close lid and allow to stand to for 10 minutes on the keep warm setting.', 'Place berries, icing sugar, 1/4 cup water and port into the bowl of a food processor or blender and process until smooth.', 'Fold berry mixture through rice mixture.', 'Transfer to serving glasses and top with extra berries and cream.']

name: Asparagus, Strawberry & Avocado Salad
ingredients: ['400 g fresh asparagus', '200 g punnet strawberries (or whatever punnet size you get)', '1 cup bean sprouts', '1 avocado', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/4 cup avocado oil', '1 large crushed garlic clove (1 tsp prepared)', '3 tablespoons lemon juice', ' freshly ground salt and pepper', '3 tablespoons basil, finely chopped (my gran used parsley or whatever she had)']
instructions: ['Cook asparagus for 4 minutes until tender.', 'Refresh in a bowl of icy water to retain color.', 'Halve strawberries.', 'Cut up avocado and put 1 tbsp lemon juice over to prevent browning.', 'Cut asparagus in half.', 'Place all items in serving dish.', 'Avocado Oil Dressing:.', 'Whisk dressing ingredients in a bowl.', 'Drizzle over salad.']

name: Pickled Cherries
ingredients: ['500 g cherries, stems intact ', '1 cup cider vinegar', '1 lemon, zest of', '2 star anise', '1 cinnamon stick', '6 whole cloves', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1/2 cup water', '3 tablespoons dark brown sugar']
instructions: ['Put everything but the cherries in a saucepan, and bring to the boil, simmer gently for about 10 minutes.\r', 'While the mixture is simmering, prick each cherry three or four times with a sharp wooden skewer. \r', 'Add the cherries to the simmering liquid and remove from heat. Allow to cool. \r', 'Put the cherries and liquid in a jar and allow to stand at room temperature overnight. Store in the fridge until use.']

name: Mango, Lychee and Passionfruit Salad
ingredients: ['40 lychees, peeled, seeds removed ', '4 mangoes, cheeks scored ', '1/4 cup mint leaf, torn ', '125 ml passion fruit pulp (1/2 cup or 5 black passionfruit)', '2 oranges, juice of, strained ', '1 lemon, juice of, strained ', '165 ml caster sugar (3/4 cup)']
instructions: ["For the syrup, pulse the passionfruit briefly in a food processor to loosen the seeds. If you have plastic blades us them so you don't cut the seeds.", 'Transfer to a pan with remaining ingredients and stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves.', 'Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until syrupy. Cool completely.', 'Place lychees and mango on a platter. Scatter with mint and drizzle with the passionfruit syrup. Serve immediately.']

name: New Zealand Curried Sausages
ingredients: ['25 g butter', '1 -2 teaspoon ground coriander (or 1-2 tsp curry powder instead of the coriander and cumin)', '1 -2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '10 -12 links pork sausage, cut into about four pieces ', '1 -2 onion, chopped ', '1 -2 carrot, chopped ', '2 (400 g) cans chopped tomatoes', '1 (400 g) can coconut cream', '2 tablespoons coconut', '2 tablespoons sultanas', '1 -2 banana, chopped ', ' apple (optional)', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ["In a large deep frying pan or electric frypan, melt butter. Don't let it spread all over the pan but keep in a smallish area.", 'On top of that, as it melts, place spice mixes. Mix the spices into the butter and cook a minute or two till the spice flavour has expanded.', 'Stir sausages through the butter and spice mix.', 'Add onions and carrots and stir through also.', 'Cook a few minutes stirring every now and then, till the sausage and onion are starting to brown a little and the mix is sticking to the pan surface.', 'Add tin tomatoes and stir through. A wooden spatula is easiest for this - and will help you lift the brownings from the surface of the pan to mix through to give extra flavour.', 'Add coconut cream and stir through.', 'Add coconut, sultanas and bananas. Maybe some apple.', 'Simmer all together for 1 - 1 1/2 hours or till the mix is as thick as you want. Try not to use a thickening agent as the flavour is better this way.', 'Season to taste and serve on rice.']

name: Biscuit Fudge Cake
ingredients: ['100 g butter', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 egg (beaten)', '250 g wine biscuits', '1/2 cup raisins (chopped)']
instructions: ['Place butter, sugar, cocoa and vanilla in a saucepan and heat until butter is just melted.', 'Add the egg, mix well then heat until just boiling, stirring constantly.', 'Crush the biscuits, mix into the cocoa mixture with the raisins.', 'Press into a greased sponge roll tin.', 'Cut when set.']

name: Flourless Orange and Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['1 orange (whole)', '125 g caster sugar', '200 g dark chocolate, melted ', '100 g ground almonds', '3 eggs, separated ', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder']
instructions: ['Put the orange in a microwave safe bowl.', 'Add 250ml water, cover with clingfilm and microwave on high for 20 minutes, turning halfway through (or simmer for 1 hour in a small saucepan).', 'Leave to cool, still covered.', 'Heat oven to 180°C.', 'Line a 20cm round springform tin with baking parchment.', 'Cut the orange in half and remove pips.', 'Put in a food processor with 5 tbsp of orange liquid left in the bowl and blitz to a smooth puree.', 'Add the sugar, melted chocolate, egg yolks and baking powder and whiz again to mix thoroughly.', 'Tip into a large bowl.', 'Beat the egg whites until stiff, but not dry and fold into chocolate mixture.', 'Spoon into lined tin.', 'Put the tin on a baking sheet, then in the oven.', 'Bake for 1 hour covering with a piece of foil or baking parchment halfway through to stop the top burning.', 'Cool in the tin.']

name: Brown Rice Pizza Wheat Free Recipe
ingredients: ['3 cups cooked brown rice, cooled ', '2 egg whites, beaten ', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', ' vegetable oil cooking spray', '2/3 cup pizza sauce', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 tablespoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon parmesan cheese', '1 cup sliced mushrooms', '1/4 cup ripe olives', '1/4 cup red pepper, chopped ']
instructions: ['Combine cooled rice, egg whites, and 1/3 cup mozzarella cheese in a large bowl.\r', 'Press into 12-inch pizza pan sprayed with vegetable cooking spray.\r', 'Bake at 400 degrees for 5 minutes.\r', 'Combine pizza sauce, garlic powder, and black pepper in a small bowl.\r', 'spread over prepared rice crust.\r', 'Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.\r', 'Layer 1/3 cup mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, olives, and red pepper.\r', 'Top with remaining cheese.\r', 'Bake at 400 for 10 minutes.\r', 'Garnish with green peppers.']

name: Apple Crumble
ingredients: ['4 granny smith apples', '1 cup plain flour', '2 ounces butter', '1 cup desiccated coconut', '3/4 cup brown sugar or 3/4 cup white sugar', '2 Weet-Bix, crumbled ']
instructions: ['Peel, core and chop apples.', 'Stew in a pot with a little water and a sprinkling of sugar if necessary.', 'When cooked, pour into a pie dish.', 'Crumble:.', 'Add flour in a bowl and rub in butter.', 'Add all other dry ingredients and mix well.', 'Pat onto top of apple and bake in a moderate oven for 40 minutes.', 'Serve warm with cream and/or ice cream.']

name: 10 Minute Pudding
ingredients: ['410 g sliced peaches in juice, drained ', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 orange, rind of, finely grated ', '425 g rice pudding or 425 g custard', '4 tablespoons caster sugar (for a more toffee flavour use demerara sugar)']
instructions: ['turn on the grill.', 'roughly chop the peahces.', 'put in four ramekins or heatproof cups.', 'stir the cinnamon and orange rind into the rice pudding.', 'spoon over the peaches.', 'smooth the tops with the back of a spoon and sprinkle evenly with sugar.', 'grill for 5 minutes until the sugar has caramelised.', 'cool a litle before serving eating as the sugar will be very hot.', 'VARIATIONS:.', 'instead of peaches, you can also use canned mandarin slices or pineapple rings or even fresh mango.']

name: Lemon Drizzle Cake
ingredients: ['225 g unsalted butter, softened ', '225 g caster sugar', '3 lemons (3 zested, 2 juiced)', '4 eggs, lightly whisked ', '200 g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '50 g ground almonds', ' icing sugar']
instructions: ['Heat oven to 180°C.', 'Butter and line the base of a 20cm round cake tin.', 'Beat the butter and caster sugar in a large bowl using electric hand whisk until pale and creamy.', 'Add the lemon zest (reserving half a tsp for the icing) and mix well.', "Gradually whisk the eggs into the butter mix--don't worry if it curdles a bit.", 'Sift together the flour and baking powder and fold into the egg and butter mix using a large metal spoon or spatula.', 'Add the ground almonds and 3/4 of the lemon juice; fold until thoroughly combined.', 'Spoon into the cake tin and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the middle of the cake comes out clean.', 'Put cake tin on wire rack to cool for 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, mix together the remaining lemon juice and zest and enough icing sugar to make a runny icing and then drizzle over top of cake.', 'Cool in tin for a further 30 minutes and then remove and cool completely.']

name: Homemade Grape Nuts Cereal
ingredients: ['7 cups whole wheat flour', '3 cups packed brown sugar', '2 1/4 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 1/2 cups buttermilk', '6 tablespoons butter, melted ', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1/2 teaspoon maple flavoring (optional)']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.\r', 'Grease 6 13x9x2" pans.\r', 'Combine flour, brown sugar, baking soda and salt.\r', 'Add buttermilk, butter, vanilla and maple flavoring, if desired.\r', 'Spread into baking pans.\r', 'Bake 35 to 40 minutes.\r', 'Cool.\r', 'break up and process in processor until pieces are small.\r', 'Reduce oven to 250°.\r', 'Return cereal to pans and bake 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes, or until light brown and crisp.\r', 'Store airtight.']

name: No-Bake Rum-Raisin Balls
ingredients: ['1/3 cup dark rum', '1/3 cup rolled oats', '2 cups powdered sugar', '3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '2/3 cup chopped toasted walnuts', '2/3 cup golden raisin', '2/3 cup shredded coconut', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/3 cup butter, melted and cooled ', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar']
instructions: ['In a large bowl, combine rum and oats; cover and set aside 1 hour. \r', 'Add all remaining ingredients except granulated sugar; stir until well combined. Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.\r', 'Roll teaspoons of mixture into 1-inch balls. Place sugar in a small bowl. Roll balls in sugar, coating each generously.\r', 'Store 24 hours in an airtight container at room temperature before serving. May be stored in an airtight container for up to 10 days or freeze for longer storage.']

name: Tuna Pasta Bake - Wheat Free Recipe
ingredients: ['200 g canned tuna, in brine, drained ', '180 g sweetcorn, canned ', '800 g chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 garlic clove, crushed (or garlic puree)', '1/2 teaspoon dried herbs', '150 g low-fat plain yogurt', '100 ml milk (any type including soya, goats)', '2 -3 dashes Tabasco sauce', ' black pepper, freshly ground ', ' cheese, grated ', ' gluten-free pasta (or wheat-free pasta, or rice pasta)']
instructions: ['Cook the pasta and drain well.', 'In a separate saucepan put the tomatoes, tomato puree, garlic, herbs and tabasco, bring to the boil then simmer for 10 minutes.', 'Allow to cool slightly or when adding the yogurt it will curdle.', 'Add the yogurt and sweetcorn to the tomato mixture and mix well.', 'Put the tuna in with the pasta and mix to distribute the tuna evenly.', 'Then tip the tomato mixture on top and stir thoroughly.', 'Tip the mixture into an ovenproof dish and top with grated cheese.', 'Cook in the oven for 30-35 minutes, until the top is golden and the misture is bubbling.', "Serve on it's own or accompanied by a green salad."]

name: School Invented Sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon ketchup (heinz)', '1 tablespoon salad dressing (heinz)']
instructions: ['mix together.', 'serve with hot chips.']

name: Simple Smoked Salmon Chowder (Gluten Free)
ingredients: ['1 onion, finely diced ', '1 tablespoon butter, recipe says a knob ', '750 g potatoes, diced ', '500 ml chicken stock (made up, from either fresh, cube or concentrate)', '500 ml milk', '350 g smoked salmon, cut into ribbons ', ' fresh parsley, finely chopped ', '1 lemon, halved ']
instructions: ['Fry the onion gently in the butter until softened.', 'Add the potatoes, stock and milk.', 'Simmer until potatoes are tender.', 'Add smoked salmon and parsley and season well.', 'Heat everything through and squeeze some lemon juice over.']

name: Carrot & Pecan Cake
ingredients: ['150 g self-raising flour', '150 g whole wheat self-rising flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '500 g carrots, grated ', '30 g desiccated coconut', '30 g pecan nuts', '80 g sultanas', '2 eggs', '125 ml apple juice', '250 ml skim milk', '200 g reduced-fat cream cheese', '3 tablespoons white sugar', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 200°C/400°F/Gas 5.', 'Lightly grease and flour a deep 20cm (8in) tin.', 'Sift flours, bicarb, and spices into a large bowl. Add carrot, coconut, nuts and sultanas. Beat eggs, add apple juice. Once well mixed, add milk; stir well to combine.', 'Add liquid to dry ingredients; stir well until well mixed. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 40 - 45 minutes, or until golden and firm to touch.', 'Cool the cake in the tin for a few minutes, and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely.', 'For the topping, beat the ingredients together until smooth; spread over the cake. Decorate with extra pecans and grated carrot if desired.']

name: Dad's Favourite Toastie
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 teaspoon butter (approx)', '4 slices cheese', '1/4 tomatoes, sliced ', '1/4 onion, sliced ', '3 slices ham, wafer thin ']
instructions: ['Heat toasted sandwich maker.', 'Butter one side of both sides of bread.', 'Place one slice buttered side down on machine.', 'Place on ham, cheese tomato and onion.', 'Then top with other piece of bread buttered side up.', 'Cook for about 3-5 minutes or until golden brown.']

name: Summer Berry Tiramisu
ingredients: ['1 sponge cake base (see note)', '1 cup mascarpone cheese', '1 cup icing sugar', '1/3 cup Kahlua', '1/4 cup cream, softly whipped ', '1 cup blueberries', '1 1/2 cups strawberries, quartered ', '1 cup raspberry puree or 1 cup fruit puree', '1 teaspoon gelatin']
instructions: ['NOTE: Sponge cake base - I normally make a sponge in the springform tin. I then cut it in half height wise (depending on how high it rises) and use half for this recipe (and freeze the other half).', 'Grease springform pan lightly and place sponge in the bottom.', 'Lightly soak with half to two-thirds of the Kahlua (I use a brush).', 'Beat together mascarpone, icing sugar, cream & the remaining Kahlua. Smooth over the top of the sponge.', 'Cover and chill until set (approx 4-8 hours).', 'Top evenly with the berries & put back in the fridge so everything is kept cool.', 'Dissolve gelatin in water as per pack instructions, then set aside.', "In a pot slowly warm the fruit puree and add the gelatin. Stir until totally dissolved, then leave to cool (you can speed this up by putting it in the fridge, but be careful - you don't want it to set).", 'Top the sponge cake/cheese mixture with the puree mixture and refrigerate again until set and stable (approx 2 hours).', 'Remove from fridge 15 minutes before serving, then gently remove the springform pan outer (you may need to gently run a knife around the edges).', 'Serve with garnish & accompaniment of your choice.']

name: Blueberry & Pear Cake
ingredients: ['150 g self raising flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '75 g margarine', '60 g ground almonds', '2 eggs', '1 orange, juice and zest of, grated ', '3 drops almond essence', '2 pears, peeled, cored, and chopped ', ' blueberries', '1 tablespoon demerara sugar']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 200°C/400°F/Gas 6.', 'Lightly grease a deep 20cm (*in) cake tin and line it with baking parchment.', 'Put the flour, baking powder, margarine, almonds, eggs, orange zest & juice and almond essence in a large bowl and beat them together thoroughly.', 'Fold the pears and blueberries into the mixture. Spoon it into the prepared cake tin and sprinkle with the demarara sugar. Bake for 45-60 minutes or until firm to the touch.', 'Cool the cake in the tin on a wire rack. Stored in an airtight container, it will keep for up to a week.']

name: Double-Decker Mud Cake
ingredients: ['250 g butter, chopped ', '150 g white chocolate, chopped coarsely ', '2 cups caster sugar', '1 cup milk', '1 1/2 cups plain flour', '1/2 cup self raising flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '2 eggs, beaten ligtly ', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '600 g milk chocolate, chopped coarsely ', '1 cup cream']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to slow.', 'Grease two deep 20cm round cake pans, line base and sides with baking paper.', 'Combine butter, white chocolate, sugar and milk in medium saucepan, stir over heat, without boiling, until smooth, transfer mixture to large bowl, cool for 15 minutes.', 'Whisk sifted flours into white chocolate mixture.', 'Whisk in essence and egg.', 'Pour half of mixture into one prepared pan.', 'Whisk sifted cocoa into remaining mixture.', 'Pour into other prepared pan.', 'Bake cakes in slow oven about 50 minutes.', 'Stand cakes 5 minutes, turn top-side, up onto wire rack to cool.', 'Combine milk chocolate and cream in medium saucepan, stir over low heat until smooth.', 'Transfer to medium bowl, cover and put in fridge, stirring occasionally, until is of spreading consistency.', 'Reserve 1 cup of chocolate mixture for spreading over cake.', 'Split each cooled cake in half.', 'Centre one layer on serving plate, spread 1/2 cup of remaining milk chocolate mixture, repeat layering, alternating colours.', 'Cover top and sides of cake with reserved chocolate mixture.']

name: Chocolate Coconut Rough Slice
ingredients: ['125 g butter', '1 cup flour', '1 cup coconut', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup icing sugar', '1 cup coconut', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '1 tablespoon butter (melted)']
instructions: ['BASE:.', 'Cream butter and sugar.', 'Add sifted flour, baking powder and cocoa.', 'Add coconut.', 'Mix well and spread into slice tin.', "Bake at 350'F/175'C for 25minutes.", 'Remove from oven and while hot ice with the topping.', 'TOPPING:.', 'Melt butter and add other ingredients.', 'Add a little milk to mix if necessary.', 'Stir over a low heat to dissolve and spread over hot base.', 'Cut into bars before completely cold.']

name: Hot Prunes and Custard
ingredients: ['20 prunes', '400 g custard', '1/2 cup water (approx)']
instructions: ['place prunes in a saucepan, (you may need to do this in batches).\r', 'cover with water 3/4 of the way up.\r', 'heat through until prunes are plump.\r', 'while they are heating through, heat your custard.\r', 'pour the prunes and juice into four serving bowls.\r', 'pour hot custard over and enjoy.']

name: Flourless Hazelnut Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['1/3 cup cocoa powder', '1/3 cup hot water', '150 g dark chocolate, melted ', '150 g butter, melted ', '1 1/3 cups brown sugar, firmly packed ', '1 cup hazelnut meal', '4 eggs, seperated ', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder, extra ']
instructions: ['preheat oven to moderate.\r', 'grease a deep 19cm square cake pan, line base and sides with baking paper.\r', 'blend cocoa with the hot water in large bowl until smooth.\r', 'stir in chocolate, butter, sugar, hazelnut meal and egg yolks.\r', 'beat egg whites in small bowl with electric mixer until soft peaks form.\r', 'fold into chocolate mixture in two batches.\r', 'pour mixture into prepared pan.\r', 'bake in oven about 1 hour or until firm.\r', 'stand cake 15 minutes.\r', 'turn onto wire rack, top side up, to cool.\r', 'dust with sifted, extra, cocoa to serve.']

name: Caramello Chocolate Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2/3 cup brown sugar, firmly packed ', '1/4 cup vegetable oil', '1/2 cup plain flour', '1/3 cup self-raising flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100 g dark chocolate, melted ', '250 g Cadbury Caramello chocolate bars (or dairy milk caramel)']
instructions: ['preheat oven to moderate, lightly grease two oven trays.', 'beat egg, sugar and oil in small bowl with electric mixer until changes in colour.', 'stir in sifted dry ingredients and dark chocolate, stir until mixture becomes firm.', 'centre one caramello square on 1 heaped tsp chocolate mixture (1 heaped tsp in equivelant to 3 level tsps).', 'place balls on prepared trays allowing 6cm between each cookie.', 'bake in oven about 10 minutes.', 'stand cookies 5 minutes.', 'transfer to wire rack to cool.']

name: Crunchy Popums (Peanut Butter)
ingredients: ['2 cups peanut butter', '1 cup sifted powdered sugar', '36 chocolate chip cookies (crushed)']
instructions: ['Mix peanut butter and sugar in medium bowl. Add 1-1/2 cups of the crushed cookies; stir until well blended.', 'Shape peanut butter mixture into 60 balls, using 1 heaping teaspoonful for each ball. Roll in remaining 1-1/2 cups crushed cookies until balls are evenly coated; cover.', 'Refrigerate at least 1 hour.', 'Store leftover balls in refrigerator.']

name: 2 Ways With Oatabix
ingredients: ['2 Oatabix biscuits', '1/4 cup milk (approx)', '1/4 cup hot water (approx)', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 Oatabix biscuits', '1/4 cup milk', '1/4 cup dried mixed fruit or 1/4 cup sliced strawberry']
instructions: ['Hot Way:.', 'place your biscuits in a bowl.', 'pour hot water over the biscuits.', 'sprinkle sugar over.', 'heat milk in microwave on high about 30-40 seconds until it is hot.', 'pour milk over and enjoy.', 'Cold Way:.', 'place oatabix in a bowl.', 'pour over sufficient milk.', 'top with mixed fruit and enjoy.']

name: Chocolate Lovers Waffles
ingredients: ['200 g frozen Belgian waffles (4 pre-made waffles)', '8 tablespoons nutella (or another chocolate spread, i.e. milkyway or galaxy)']
instructions: ['heat the waffles through as instructed to do so on the packet.', 'spread with chocolate spread until fills all the gaps on one side.', 'eat up.']

name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Bars
ingredients: ['2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour', '1/2 cup butter, melted ', '1/2 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/2 cup packed light brown sugar', '1/4 cup granulated sugar', '1 egg', '1 cup strawberry jelly (or any flavour jelly or preserve you wish)']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F.\r', 'Coat a 9" x 13" baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.\r', 'In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients except the jelly.\r', 'Beat with an electric beater on medium speed for 2 minutes, or until blended and crumbly.\r', 'Reserve 1 cup of the peanut butter mixture.\r', 'Spread the remaining mixture over the bottom of the baking dish.\r', 'Spread the jelly evenly over the mixture and crumble the reserved peanut butter mixture over the top.\r', 'Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until the topping is golden.\r', 'Allow to cool completely then cut into bars and serve.']

name: Crunchy Salmon Fingers
ingredients: ['4 baking potatoes, priked ', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 (260 g) packs boneless skinless salmon fillets', '1 large egg', '25 g butter, melted ', '150 g fresh whole wheat breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds', ' peas', ' lemon, cut into wedges ']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 220 degrees.\r', 'microwave the potatoes on full power for 10-15 minutes.\r', 'cut into wedges and toss in the oil.\r', 'bake on a tray for 20 minutes.\r', 'while the potatoes are in the microwave, cut the salmon into chunky fingers.\r', 'lightly beat the egg and melted butter in a shallow dish.\r', 'put the breadcrumbs and sesame seeds on a plate.\r', 'dip the salmon fingers, one at a time in the egg mixture until coated all over.\r', 'then coat them in the crumbs and put on baking tray.\r', 'bake the salmon fingers for the last 12 minutes.\r', 'serve with peas and lemon wedges.']

name: Peanut Butter Oreos
ingredients: ['200 g Oreo cookies (just a normal packet)', "340 g peanut butter (just the jar, you won't need all of it)"]
instructions: ['simply pick up your oreo with your hand.\r', 'dip in peanut butter.\r', 'place in mouth.\r', 'chew and swallow.\r', 'say mmmm.']

name: Peanut Butter and Chocolate Swirl
ingredients: ['360 g white chocolate, chopped coarsely ', '1/2 cup smooth peanut butter', '400 g dark chocolate, chopped coarsely ']
instructions: ['Note: You can cook chocolate in microwave, cook on medium about 1 minute, stirring twice while cooking.', 'Grease a 20cm x 30cm lamington pan, line base and sides with baking paper, extending 5cm above long edges of pan.', 'Stir white chocolate in a small heatproof bowl over a small saucepan of simmering water until smooth.', 'Cool 5 minutes.', 'Add peanut butter until smooth.', 'Stir dark chocolate in small heatproof bowl over small saucepan of simmering water until smooth, cool slightly.', 'Drop alternative spoonfuls of white chocolate mixture and dark chocolate mixture into prepared pan.', 'Gently shake pan to level mixture.', 'Pull a skewer backwards and forwards through mixtures several times for a marbled effect.', 'Stand at room temperature about 2 hours or until set.', 'Cut into small pieces(I got about 72).']

name: Surprise Me Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices rye bread (I used one cut in half but they were bid pieces)', '1 tablespoon chocolate spread, I used milky way ', '1/2 banana, sliced thinly (or more)']
instructions: ['Spread one slice of rye bread with chocolate spread top with sliced bananas, keep adding till covered.', 'Add top piece of rye bread.', 'Eat, I recommend if you are taking it somewhere, making on the same day.']

name: Steak Dish
ingredients: ['2 lbs steak', '2 -3 onions', '1 cup tomato sauce', '1/4 cup flour', ' salt', ' pepper']
instructions: ['pre heat oven to 350 degrees \r', 'mix to a paste the tomato sauce, flour, salt and pepper.\r', 'slice onions.\r', 'place tin foil in a casserole dish coming well over the edges to be able to seal later on.\r', 'spread half of paste over.\r', 'place meat on top and cover with sliced onions and rest of paste.\r', 'seal foil.\r', 'bake for 1 hour.']

name: Brown Rice Porridge
ingredients: ['1 cup brown rice', '3/4 tablespoon salt', '4 cups hot water', ' cinnamon sugar, posted (Cinnamon Sugar)']
instructions: ['Cook the rice in salted water for about 1 1/2 hours in a covered casserole dish in a moderate oven, until well cooked and slightly mushy.', 'Refrigerate until needed (rice will absorb extra water during this time).', 'When needed stir in about 2 tsp cinnamon sugar per serving and re-heat in a microwave or pot to desired temperature.', 'Serve topped with raw fresh fruit, more cinnamon sugar, the milk of your choice or a little cream.']

name: Walnut Brownie Bites
ingredients: ['1/2 cup walnuts, toasted and chopped finely ', '80 g butter', '150 g dark chocolate, chopped coarsely ', '3/4 cup brown sugar, firmly packed ', '1 egg, beaten lightly ', '1/3 cup plain flour', '1/4 cup sour cream', '3 (50 g) packets Rolo chocolates']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to moderate.', 'Lightly grease 2 non-stick 12 hole mini muffin pans.', 'Divide walnuts among holes.', 'Stir butter and chocolate in small saucepan over low heat until smooth.', 'Stir in sugar, cool to just warm.', 'Stir in egg, then flour and cream.', 'Spoon mixture into prepared pan.', 'Press one Rolo into centre of each quantity of mixture.', 'Spread mixture so that Rolo is completely enclosed.', 'Bake in oven about 15 minutes.', 'Using a sharp pointed knife, loosen sides of brownies from pan, stand 10 minutes.', 'Remove brownies gently from pan.']

name: Strawberry Ice Cubes
ingredients: ['1 cup water, approximately ', '100 g strawberries, approximately ']
instructions: ['Cut strawberries in half and cut the stalks off.', 'Place berries in ice cube molds.', 'Cover with water as you usually do when making ice cubes.', 'Freeze until set.']

name: Peanut Butter Granola
ingredients: ['2/3 cup creamy peanut butter', '2/3 cup honey', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '4 cups uncooked rolled oats', '1 cup raisins', '1 cup peanuts', '1/2 cup dried fig, snipped ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 300ºF.\r', 'In a small saucepan, combine peanut butter, honey and cinnamon, heat through.\r', 'Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.\r', 'Place oats in a large, shallow roasting pan or a 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan.\r', 'Pour warm peanut butter mixture over oats and stir gently till oats are coated.\r', 'Spread evenly in pan.\r', 'Bake in a 300ºF oven for 35 to 40 minutes, stirring occasionally. Turn off oven.\r', 'Meanwhile in a small bowl, cover raisins in boiling water.\r', 'Let stand for 10 minutes, drain well.\r', 'Stir raisins, nuts and figs into baked mixture.\r', 'Return to oven and let dry 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.\r', 'Store in covered containers.']

name: Lemon Cheesecake
ingredients: ['250 g digestive biscuits', '125 g butter', '397 g condensed milk', '170 g extra heavy cream', '4 large fresh lemons']
instructions: ['put the biscuits in a large freezer bag and crush to a fine crumb using a rolling pin.', 'melt butter on low heat in a pan.', 'tip biscuit crumbs into pan of melted butter.', 'cook on a low heat stirring with a wooden spoon until the crumbs are slightly darker (not burnt).', 'press biscuit crumbs into a 17cm flan tin with removable base and chill.', 'zest rind of lemons.', 'squeeze the juice of the lemons removing any pips.', 'take a large mixing bowl and pour into it the condensed milk and cream.', 'mix together.', 'add the zest and juice of the lemons and slowly whisk by hand.', 'the cream will start to thicken as a result of adding the lemon juice, if it does not, simply add one more lemon.', 'pour into chilled base.', 'put in fridge for 1 hour.', 'to serve push the flan base underneath and slide flan onto a plate.', 'decorate with lemon zest and flaked chocolate and serve with cream.']

name: My Gran's Bread With Variations
ingredients: ['450 g high grade flour', '3 teaspoons surebake active dry yeast', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons oil (any)', '1 1/4 cups warm water']
instructions: ['she places in bread machine and follows instructions on how to make bread.\r', 'throughout the process she will throw in a handful of PARMESAN CHEESE grated or any other dessert spoon of MUSTARD (grainy).\r', 'not all of above at the same time though.\r', 'but in moderation you can add most things - 1 cup OLIVES (stones out) are lovely.']

name: Giant Rolo
ingredients: ['250 g butter', '250 ml pot cream', '750 g sugar', '10 (200 g) chocolate candy bars']
instructions: ['Melt the butter, cream and sugar with a dash of water in a very large pan.', 'Cook till soft toffee stage.', 'Pour the soft toffee into your mould i.e. clean plant pot.', 'Set in fridge for a while.', 'When set, position soft toffee centrally in a big mould.', 'Engulf soft toffee in "molten chocolate".', 'Place creation in chiller.', 'Release the mould and behold a giant rolo!']

name: Ginger Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 cup soya sauce', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1500 g chicken pieces', '1 teaspoon chopped gingerroot', '1/2 cup water', '2 teaspoons sugar', '2 tablespoons oil', '425 g pineapple chunks', '2 tablespoons lemon rind']
instructions: ['put soya sauce, sugar, cornflour and lemon rind in a large bowl.', 'add chicken, coat with sauce.', 'leave 1 hour.', 'drain chicken.', 'fry both sides in oil.', 'add ginger, whole tin of pineapple and water.', 'simmer gently 1 hour.', 'serve with rice.']

name: Mega Marshmallow
ingredients: ['3 (200 g) packets marshmallows', ' cornflour', ' greaseproof paper']
instructions: ['prepare a mould the shape in a round tub about 3 inches high and 2 inches wide (about) by lining with greaseproof paper and dusting with cornflour.', "in a large bowl over simmering water melt marshmallows until it's runny, this can take a while.", 'take off the heat.', 'pour into prepared mould.', 'set in fridge.', 'once set turn out.', 'voila.', 'mega marshmallow.']

name: Chocolate Fruit
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups milk chocolate melts', '2 medium bananas, sliced thickly ', '250 g strawberries', '3/4 cup dried apricot']
instructions: ['Grease an oven tray and line with baking paper.', 'Place melts in microwave safe bowl cook on medium-low for 1 minute in microwave.', 'Remove bowl and stir chocolate, return to microwave.', 'Repeat cooking and stirring for 1 minute until chocolate melts have melted.', 'Dip fruit into chocolate to coat about three-quarters of each piece of fruit.', 'Place fruit on the tray.', 'Refrigerate till set.']

name: Cinnamon Sugar
ingredients: ['1/4 cup brown sugar', '1/4 cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['mix together.\r', 'store in an airtight container.']

name: No-Bread Sandwich (Pret-A-Manger)
ingredients: ['1/2 perfectly ripe avocado, sliced ', '90 g crayfish tails, cooked and peeled ', '1 cup fresh mixed salad green (they used a variety of escarole, frisee, rocket and chard, for a good flavour and crunch combination)', '6 slices cucumbers, thin but not transparent ', ' sea salt', ' fresh coarse ground black pepper', '3 fresh basil leaves', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar (one good squirt)', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard (heaped teaspoon)', '1/2 lemon, juice of', '1 garlic clove, roughly chopped ', ' sea salt', ' fresh coarse ground black pepper']
instructions: ['French Dressing:.', "Mix ingredients in a bowl add a pinch of black pepper (it's nice to do this an hour or two before using to allow flavour to develop).", 'Lay avocado slices in a shallow dish or plate (they use a 15cm sq dish to keep ingredients in neat layers, just like a sandwich but without bread).', 'Scatter salad leaf mix into dish.', 'Lay cucumber neatly over one half of the salad leaves.', 'Arrange crayfish over other half.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Pop the three basil leaves on top of the cucumber.', 'Drizzle the dressing over your no-bread sandwich and enjoy.']

name: Deb's Raisins Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup self raising flour', '1 pinch salt', '1/4 cup sugar', '46 g butter', '1 cup raisins', '1 lemon rind, finely grated ', '1/2 cup milk', '2 cups boiling water', '1 cup brown sugar', '65 g butter']
instructions: ['sift flour and salt together with sugar.\r', 'lightly rub in butter with raisins and lemon rind.\r', 'add milk.\r', 'mix.\r', 'spread out evenly in a greased 20cm x 20cm ovenproof dish.\r', 'put to the side.\r', 'put boiling water, sugar and butter in saucepan and heat until butter melts.\r', 'spoon over contents of dish.\r', 'bake at 180 degrees for about 45-60 minutes.\r', 'serve while hot.\r', 'this does have a self sauce but is still lovely with cream or custard if desired.']

name: Granola
ingredients: ['1/4 cup butter', '1/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar', '2 1/2 cups uncooked rolled oats', '1/4 cup slivered almonds', '1/4 cup chopped walnuts', '1/2 cup raisins', '1/3 cup chopped dates', '1/3 cup chopped dried apricot', '1/3 cup chocolate chips (optional)']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.\r', 'Melt the butter in a 15-by-10-inch jelly roll pan.\r', 'Stir in the brown sugar until combined.\r', 'Stir in the oats, almonds and walnuts.\r', 'Spread the mixture in an even layer in the pan.\r', 'Bake the granola for 12 to 15 minutes or until it is golden brown, stirring twice during the baking process.\r', 'Transfer the pan to a wire rack and cool. When the mixture is completely cool, stir in the raisins, dates, apricots and chocolate chips.\r', 'Store in an airtight container.']

name: All Natural Berry Striped Popsicles
ingredients: ['2 cups strawberries', '3/4 cup honey, divided ', '6 kiwi fruits, peeled and sliced ', '2 cups peaches', '12 paper cups or 12 popsicle molds', '12 wooden popsicle sticks']
instructions: ['Puree strawberries with 1/4 cup honey in blender or food processor.', 'Divide mixture evenly between 12 cups or Popsicle molds.', 'Freeze about 30 minutes or until firm.', 'Meanwhile, rinse processor.', 'purée kiwifruit with 1/4 cup honey.', 'Repeat process with peaches and remaining 1/4 cup honey.', 'When strawberry layer is firm, pour kiwifruit purée into molds.', 'Insert Popsicle sticks and freeze about 30 minutes or until firm.', 'Pour peach purée into molds and freeze until firm and ready to serve.']

name: Christmas Truffles
ingredients: ['1 cup dried mixed fruit', '4 -6 tablespoons brandy', '2 1/2 cups crumbled chocolate cake', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '3/4 cup glace cherries, green and red ', '3/4 cup dark chocolate melts', '1 cup dark chocolate melts', '1/2 cup white chocolate chips']
instructions: ['You also need for the balls 3/4 cup dark melts, melted.', 'And for the finish 1 cup dark melts and 1/2 cup white melts.', 'Process dried fruit with brandy until finely chopped.', 'Put in a bowl.', 'Add chocolate cake crumbs, icing sugar, melted first measure of dark melts.', 'Mix thoroughly.', 'Roll into small balls about tsp size.', 'Chill until firm.', 'Finish:.', 'Melt dark melts and coat all over the balls with.', 'Place on a tray lined with foil.', 'Chill until firm.', 'Chop glace cherries.', 'Melt the white melts.', 'Using a spoon put a bit over each ball and decorate with glace cherries.']

name: Blue Lagoon
ingredients: ['30 ml gin or 30 ml vodka', '120 ml lemonade', '30 ml Curacao', ' ice']
instructions: ['pour ingredients, one after the other into serving glass filled with ice (glass size 285ml highball).\r', 'stir with swizzle stick if desired.\r', 'garish with an orange slice and cherry.\r', 'serve.']

name: Jelly Bean Birthday Bark
ingredients: ['12 ounces white chocolate chips', '3/4 cup jelly beans']
instructions: ['Pour white chocolate chips in a 2-cup glass measuring cup and microwave 2 to 4 minutes until barely melted, being careful not to overcook (chips may not look melted; stir before microwaving again).', 'On wax paper, pour out chocolate into a 2-inch puddle, spreading to about ¼ inch thickness.', 'While still hot, sprinkle about 15 Jelly Belly jelly beans on each, and press beans lightly into the chocolate.', 'Allow to cool completely.']

name: Jeweled Jelly Belly Nests
ingredients: ['6 egg whites', '1 pinch salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons cream of tartar', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '4 ounces assorted jelly beans', ' decorative candies or sherbet, to fill nests ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 170 degrees F.\r', 'Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. \r', 'Using a round cookie cutter or a small can, trace the outline of a 3 ½ inch to 4 inch circle, for 10 circles. Set aside. \r', 'In the clean, dry mixing bowl of an electric mixer, beat egg whites, salt and cream of tartar, until soft peaks form. \r', 'With the mixer running, add almond extract and gradually add sugar.\r', 'Beat until stiff and glossy. \r', 'Spoon about ¾ cup meringue onto parchment lined baking sheet, using tracing lines as a guide for size. \r', 'With a large spoon make an indentation in each meringue mount to form a nest.\r', 'Gently press jelly beans into sides of meringues.\r', 'Bake for 2 ½ hours at 170 degrees F, or until hard.\r', 'Fill with jelly beans and assorted Easter candies.\r', 'Or for an elegant dessert, fill meringue nests with small scoops of pastel sherbets, serve immediately.']

name: Granny's Chocolate Crunch
ingredients: ['2 cups corn flakes', '1/2 cup white sugar', '6 ounces butter, melted ', '1 cup coconut', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup plain flour', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '1/2 cup sultana']
instructions: ['Mix dry ingredients and pour melted butter over them.', 'Blend well and press into shallow sponge roll tray.', 'Bake in slow oven at 350°F for 1/2 an hour or 375°F for 20 minutes.', 'Ice with chocolate icing while hot.', 'Cut while still warm.']

name: Microwave Barbecue Chicken Legs With Banana
ingredients: ['1 kg chicken leg', '1/2 cup tomato sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons salad oil', '1 tablespoon prepared mustard', '1 tablespoon dried onion flakes', '3 firm semi-ripe bananas']
instructions: ['rinse chicken.', 'pat dry.', 'place in large microwavable circular platter with small bone ends pointing towards centre.', 'combine ingredients except bananas.', 'spoon about 2/3 of sauce over chicken.', 'cook on high, uncovered 16 minutes turning over half way.', 'slice bananas into 1/2 inch slices and scatter over chicken.', 'spoon remaining sauce over and microwave on high 4 minutes.', 'stand 2-3 minutes before serving.']

name: Fail Safe Sponge
ingredients: ['1 cup cornflour (a cup)', '4 eggs, seperated ', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon cream of tartar', ' vanilla essence']
instructions: ['beat egg white and sugar until sugar is dissolved.\r', 'add yolks and vanilla and beat until thick.\r', 'fold in sifted dry ingredients.\r', 'bake at 180 degrees for 25 minutes.']

name: Classic Cherries Jubilee
ingredients: ['425 g pitted black cherries', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 cinnamon stick', '2 teaspoons arrowroot', '1 tablespoon water', '1/3 cup brandy']
instructions: ['drain cherries, keep syrup.', 'combine syrup sugar and cinnamin in pan.', 'cook stirring until it boils.', 'simmer uncovered without stirring for 2 minutes.', 'strain, discard cinnamon.', 'return syrup to pan.', 'stir in arrowroot and water.', 'cook stirring until boils and thickens slightly.', 'add cherries, stir until heated through.', 'heat brandy, add to sauce.', 'set aflame.', 'serve imediately with ice cream.']

name: Seafood Sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 pint whipped cream', '2 tablespoons thick mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon tomato sauce', ' Worcestershire sauce (a couple of good shakes)']
instructions: ['mix all ingredients', 'chill.']

name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Filled Cupcakes
ingredients: ['1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour', '1/3 cup sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup creamy peanut butter', '1 large egg', '3/4 cup milk', '1/3 cup butter, melted ', '1/2 cup raspberry jelly or 1/2 cup grape jelly']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees.', 'Line a 12 muffin tin with muffin papers.', 'In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.', 'In another bowl, mix the peanut butter with the egg.Add the milk, a little at a time, then mix in the butter.', 'Pour the wet batter into the bowl with the dry ingredients and stir gently to combine. The batter will be stiff.', 'Put a heaping tablespoon of batter in the bottom of each muffin cup.', 'Use a finger to make an indentation in the center and put a teaspoon of jelly in the hole.', 'Cover with another heaping tablespoon of batter or enough to fill each cup about 2/3 full.', 'Spread the batter gently until no jelly is visible.', 'Bake for 20 minutes, then turn the muffins onto a wire rack to cool for at least 10 minutes.', 'Be careful: the jelly centers can get hot. Makes 12 muffins.']

name: Red Onion Marmalade
ingredients: ['6 red onions', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon butter', '1/4 cup balsamic vinegar', '1/4 cup brown sugar']
instructions: ['have frypan on lowest heat.', "add olive oil and butter, don't stir.", 'all onions in at once nicely.', "after 10 minutes pour over the balsmic vinegar and brown sugar, don't stir you can shake.", 'after 5-10 minutes, get tongs, turn everything over.', 'can put lid on, leave about 45 minutes-1 hour.', 'cool.', 'then transfer to bowl.', 'serve or keeps well in the fridge.']

name: Deb's Thai Fish Cakes
ingredients: ['600 g cod or 600 g red snapper', '4 tablespoons coconut cream', '1 tablespoon chili pepper, finely chopped ', '1 egg, lightly beaten ', '1/2 red capsicum, chopped ', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger', '2 tablespoons coriander, chopped ', '2 spring onions, finely chopped ', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
instructions: ['Combine diced fish, coconut cream, chilli and capsicum.', 'Puree till smooth.', 'Combine with remaining ingredients.', 'Leave for 3 hours.', 'Shape into small patties.', 'Shallow fry in vegetable oil for about 2 minutes either side.']

name: Curried Corn on Toast
ingredients: ['440 g whole kernel corn', '2 teaspoons butter', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '2 teaspoons flour', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 teaspoon parmesan cheese (optional)', '1 -2 teaspoon fresh herb, chopped (optional)', '4 slices bread']
instructions: ['drain corn, reserve liquid.\r', 'melt butter in frypan.\r', 'add curry powder and flour.\r', 'cook while constantly stirring for about 20 seconds.\r', 'pour in corn liquid and bring to boil.\r', 'cook until sauce thickens.\r', 'add corn and cook till corn is cooked.\r', 'stir in parmesan and herbs.\r', 'serve straight away on un-buttered toast.']

name: Amazing Chunky Chocolate-Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['125 g butter, shopped ', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/4 cups brown sugar, firmly packed ', '1 egg', '1 cup plain flour', '1/4 cup self-raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/3 cup cocoa powder', "1/2 cup M&M's peanut chocolate candy", "1/3 cup miniature M&M baking bits (mini m&m's)", '1/2 cup milk chocolate melts']
instructions: ['pre heat oven to moderate.', 'lightly grease two oven trays.', 'beat butter, extract, sugar and egg in a small bowl with an electric mixer until smooth, be careful not to overmix.', 'transfer to large bowl, mix in sifted combined dry ingredients then all chocolate.', 'drop level teaspoons of the mixture onto prepared trays, allowing 5cm between each cookie.', 'bake, uncovered in moderate oven abput 10 minutes.', 'stand cookies 5 minutes.', 'transfer to wire rackto cool.']

name: Creamy Dreamy Shake
ingredients: ['1 pint chocolate ice cream or 1 pint vanilla ice cream', '1/2 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 cup milk']
instructions: ['In blender, process all ingredients until smooth.\r', 'Serve immediately \r', 'VARIATION: For a Dreamy Banana Shake -- increase milk to 1/2 cup and add 1 medium banana.']

name: Frozen Peanutty Pops
ingredients: ['1/2 cup creamy peanut butter or 1/2 cup crunchy peanut butter', '2 cups cold milk', '1 (3 7/8 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix or 1 (3 7/8 ounce) vanilla instant pudding mix']
instructions: ['In medium bowl, with wire whisk, blend all ingredients.\r', 'Spoon pudding into 4-oz. wax coated paper cups or muffin pan lined with cupcake liners.\r', 'Place plastic spoons or popsicle sticks in center of each and freeze 4 hours or until firm.\r', 'To serve, peel off paper cups or cupcake liners.']

name: Peanut Butter Pancakes With Peanut Butter Maple Syrup
ingredients: ['1 1/4 cups flour', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/4 cups milk', '1 egg', '1/4 cup peanut butter', '3 tablespoons butter, melted ', '1/2 cup maple syrup', '1/4 cup peanut butter']
instructions: ['Combine flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.\r', 'Beat milk with egg and peanut butter until smooth.\r', 'Add to dry ingredients and beat just until well moistened.\r', 'Lightly butter hot griddle.\r', 'Spoon by ¼ cupfuls onto griddle.\r', 'Cook until golden brown on both sides.\r', 'Peanut Butter Maple Syrup:.\r', 'Combine syrup and peanut butter in sauce pan.\r', 'Heat, stirring until smooth and heated through.\r', 'Serve over pancakes.']

name: My Egg Filled French Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 tablespoon butter (approximately)', '1 egg']
instructions: ['Cut a medium size hole in bread.', 'Put half the butter in frypan and put both pieces of bread in and fry.', 'Once browned, turn both over and crack egg into the hole.', 'Once egg is cooked, flip one last time for 15-30 seconds.', 'Serve.']

name: Asda Great Stuff Raisin Oat Cookies
ingredients: ['50 g dried apricots', '125 g butter, room temperature ', '75 g soft brown sugar', '100 g self-raising flour', '75 g porridge oats', '4 (14 g) boxes raisins']
instructions: ['pre heat the oven to 180 degrees.\r', 'line 2 baking trays with some baking paper.\r', 'cut the apricots into small pieces.\r', 'put the butter and sugar in a large mixing bowl.\r', 'cream them together until they become creamy.\r', 'add the flour, oats, apricots and raisins and mix them together.\r', 'roll out the oat mixture into balls, about the size of a ping pong ball and put them on the baking trays.\r', 'flatten each ball slightly.\r', 'put them in the oven and bake for 15 minutes.\r', 'leave to stand for 5 minutes, then trandfer them to a cooling tray.']

name: Sticky Sausages
ingredients: ['20 pork cocktail franks', '4 tablespoons clear honey']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 200 degrees \r', 'place sausages in a shallow roasting tin lined with baking parchment.\r', 'brush with honey.\r', 'cook for 25-30 minutes, until they are thouroughly cooked and a sticky dark brown colour.\r', 'serve while they are still warm.']

name: Outrageous Egg-Free New Zealand Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['1 (375 g) can condensed milk', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1 cup malt vinegar']
instructions: ['put the milk in a bowl.', 'add the mustard.', 'then a dollop of vinegar.', 'mix.', 'test taste.', 'keep adding to taste small amounts at a time.', "you shouldn't be able to get the taste of condensed milk when you taste it, but something very unique."]

name: Crunchy Popums
ingredients: ['2 cups peanut butter', '1 cup sifted powdered sugar', '36 chocolate chip cookies, finely crushed (about 3 cups)']
instructions: ['Mix peanut butter and sugar in medium bowl.\r', 'Add 1 1/2 cups of the crushed cookies.\r', 'stir until well blended.\r', 'shape peanut butter mixture into 60 balls.\r', 'using 1 heaping teaspoonful for each ball.\r', 'Roll in remaining 1-1/2 cups crushed cookies until balls are evenly coated.\r', 'cover.\r', 'refridgerate at least 1 hour.\r', 'Store leftover balls in refrigerator.']

name: Egg Free Chocolate Cake or Whatever You Desire Cake
ingredients: ['2 1/4 cups plain flour', '1/4 cup cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 cups caster sugar', '175 g unsalted butter, melted ', '1 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract or 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste', '2 teaspoons white vinegar', '500 g cream cheese, softened, cut into small pieces ', '1/4 cup unsalted butter, softened, cut into small pieces ', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups powdered sugar, sifted ']
instructions: ['Note: for a differnt cake try this:.', 'Vanilla variation Omit the cocoa and increase plain flour to 2 1/2 cups.', 'Coconut variation Omit the cocoa. Use 1 1/2 cups plain flour (instead of 2¼ cups) and add 1 cup desiccated coconut with the caster sugar.', 'to start:.', 'Preheat oven to 180°C.', 'Grease and line the base of 2 x 20cm round cake pans with non-stick baking paper.', 'Sift together the flour, cocoa and baking powder into a large mixing bowl.', 'add the caster sugar and stir to combine.', 'Add the melted butter, milk, vanilla and vinegar and whisk until all ingredients are well combined and smooth.', 'Divide the batter between the prepared tins and place in preheated oven for 30 minutes or until golden and a skewer inserted into the centre of the cake comes out clean.', 'Set aside to cool for 10 minutes before turning out on a wire rack to cool completely.', 'When ready to serve, spread the top of one cake with some of the frosting, place second cake on top and spread remaining frosting over top and sides.', 'Cream cheese frosting:.', 'Place cream cheese, butter and vanilla into a large mixing bowl.', 'Using electric hand beaters, beat until smooth.', 'Gradually add icing sugar and beat until well combined.']

name: Lizard Skins
ingredients: ['1/2 cup peanut butter', '12 ounces marshmallows', '4 drops green food coloring', '4 cups Cheerios toasted oat cereal or 4 cups corn flakes', ' Pam cooking spray', '16 raisins']
instructions: ['Heat peanut butter with marshmallows in a large saucepan over low heat until melted.', 'Add green food coloring and mix inches.', 'Pour in cereal and stir quickly.', 'Spray 8-inch pan with Pam and then pour contents into pan.', 'Allow to cool in fridge.', 'Cut into long thin strips, about 1 inch x 4 inch.', "Cut each raisin in half and stick on one end of each strip to make the lizard's eyes."]

name: Secret Sauce for Spareribs
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons h.p brown sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 lemons, juice of']
instructions: ['Mix well and then dip ribs inches.', 'Bake or grill as required.']

name: Hershey's Homemade Chocolate Ice Cream
ingredients: ['5 eggs', '1 cup sugar', '2 (395 g) cans condensed milk', "6 cups hershey's chocolate milk", '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla', '3 ounces semisweet chocolate, melted ']
instructions: ['Beat eggs.', 'Add sugar and mix well.', 'Add condensed milk, chocolate milk, melted chocolate, and vanilla one ingredient at a time, stirring well after each addition. Mix until smooth.', 'Pour directly into ice cream mixer or machine.', 'For best results let ice cream freeze over night.']

name: Chocolate Cupcakes Filled With Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['7 ounces milk chocolate', '3/4 cup butter or 3/4 cup margarine', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 1/3 cups granulated sugar', '4 large eggs', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '12 miniature peanut butter cups']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Line muffin pan with baking cups.', 'Melt chocolate and butter together.', 'stir in vanilla extract.', 'In a separate bowl combine sugar, unbeaten eggs, flour, baking powder and salt.', 'Stir in chocolate mixture.', 'Fill muffin cups half full.', 'place peanut butter cup in center of each and top with remaining batter.', 'Bake 20-25 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean.']

name: Nutty Marshmallow Patties
ingredients: ['30 g butter', '2 tablespoons peanut butter', '100 g marshmallows', '3 cups rice bubbles', '1/2 cup roasted unsalted peanuts', ' glace cherries']
instructions: ['Place butter in large bowl.\r', 'melt in microwave on HIGH 1 minute.\r', 'Add peanut butter and marshmallows.\r', 'cook on HIGH 30 seconds, or until marshmallows are melted.\r', 'Stir in Rice Bubbles and peanuts.\r', 'drop spoonfuls into paper patty cases.\r', 'top with pieces of cherry.\r', 'refrigerate.']

name: Saturday Morning Fry Up
ingredients: ['8 eggs (2 per person)', '4 tablespoons milk (1 per person)', '1 teaspoon butter', '8 slices bacon', '8 links pork sausage', '400 g baked beans in tomato sauce', '1 large mushroom', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 tomatoes', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '8 slices bread or 4 English muffins', ' ketchup', ' brown sauce', ' Worcestershire sauce', ' pepper', '4 cups freshly squeezed orange juice']
instructions: ['Now first of all, grill your sausages and bacon, if you can keep them warm in the oven that is great if you run out of time.', 'Cut up your mushrooms and cut the tomatoes in half, fry in a little oil until done.', 'Gently heat the baked beans at the same times as making the eggs.', 'Whisk together the eggs and milk, melt the butter in the pan, add egg mixture.', 'Leave to set about 1 minute then start lifting (not stirring) until is cooked, leave a little moisture as it is nicer.', 'Toast your toast, cut into 2 triangles and butter.', 'Place on plate.', 'Put eggs on top of toast.', 'Add 2 sausages, 2 rashers bacon, 1 tomato a quarter of the mushrooms to each plate.', 'Add a quarter of the baked beans to every plate.', 'Sprinkle Worcestershire sauce over eggs and rest if you like, season with pepper.', 'Place on the table, with sauces in the middle.', 'Pour orange juice equally into 4 glasses.', 'Call the family.']

name: Butterfly Cakes
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups self raising flour', '2/3 cup caster sugar', '125 g butter, softened ', '3 eggs', '1/4 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1/2 cup jam or 1/2 cup lemon butter, approximately ', '300 ml thickened cream']
instructions: ['Line a 2 x 12 hole deep patty pans with paper cases.', 'Sift dry ingredients into a small bowl of electric mixer.', 'Add butter, eggs, milk and essence.', 'Beat on medium speed about 3 minutes or until mixture is smooth and slightly lighter in colour.', 'Drop 1 1/2 tbsp of mixture into prepared paper cases.', 'Bake in a moderate oven about 20 minutes or until lightly browned.', 'Cool in pans.', 'Using a fine pointed knife, cut circles from tops of cakes about 1 cm from the edge and about 1 1/2cm down into patty cakes.', 'Cut these in half as they will be your butterfly wings, and put aside.', 'Place about 1/2 tsp of jam or lemon butter into cavities of cakes.', 'Top with whipped cream.', 'Place tops into butterfly wings position.', 'Dust with icing sugar.']

name: Yummy Snowflakes
ingredients: ['6 flour tortillas', '6 teaspoons butter (for frying) or 6 teaspoons cooking spray (for frying)', ' powdered sugar']
instructions: ['just like paper snowflakes, fold up and cut out shapes from it.\r', 'open them up and you will have a beautiful snowflake.\r', 'fry.\r', 'dust with powdered sugar.']

name: Chocolate Pancakes With Mint Cream
ingredients: ['1 cup self-raising flour', '2 tablespoons cocoa', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 1/3 cups milk', '1 egg, lightly beaten ', '15 g butter, melted ', '1 egg white', '300 ml thickned cream', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '1 tablespoon creme de menthe', '2 (35 g) peppermint crisp chocolate candy bars, chopped ']
instructions: ['Mint Cream:.\r', 'beat cream in small bowl until soft praks form.\r', 'fold in sifted icing sugar, liquueur and chocolate.\r', 'set aside till needed, chill in fridge if desired.\r', 'panckaes:.\r', 'sift flour, cocoa and soda into large bowl.\r', 'stir in sugar.\r', 'make well in centre.\r', 'gradually stir in combined milk, egg and butter.\r', 'mix well.\r', 'beat egg white in small bowl until soft peaks form.\r', 'fold into batter.\r', 'pour 2 to 3 tbsp of batter into a heated greased heavy-based frying pan.\r', 'cook over medium heat until browned underneath.\r', 'turn pancake.\r', 'brown on other side.\r', 'repeat with remaining batter.\r', 'you will need 8 pancakes for this recipe.\r', 'serve hot with mint cream.']

name: Special Banana Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '50 g butter, melted ', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 large ripe banana, mashed ', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '2 eggs', '1/2 cup milk', '1 orange, juice and rind of (1/2 cup juice)', '1 cup blueberries (fresh or frozen)', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '1/4 cup white sugar', '1 tablespoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['mix flour, baking powder and baking soda together in a large bowl.', 'in another add the melted butter, then add the sugar, mashed banana, vanilla, eggs, milk, orange juice and rind.', 'mix with a fork to combine.', 'tip into dry ingredients and fold together until dry ingedients are barely damp.', 'stir in the (thawed) blueberries, taking care not to overmix.', 'spoon mixture into deep, buttered or sprayed muffin pans and sprinkle each muffin with 1/4 tsp cinnamon sugar.', 'bake at 200 degrees for 10-12 minutes or until muffins spring back when pressed in centre.']

name: Kids Jacket Potatoes
ingredients: ['3 large sebago potatoes', ' rock salt', ' olive oil', '2 slices bacon, chopped ', '1 cup broccoli floret, steamed and chopped ', '1/3 cup light sour cream', '2 tablespoons grated cheese']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 200°C.\r', 'Sprinkle a layer of salt onto a small baking tray (the salt on the tray makes the potato skins crispy).\r', 'Rub the potatoes with olive oil and place on prepared tray.\r', 'Bake for 1 hour or until skin is crispy and potato is cooked.\r', 'Allow to cool slightly.\r', 'Meanwhile, fry or microwave bacon until crisp.\r', 'Remove the flesh from the potatoes.\r', 'Place in a bowl along with the bacon, broccoli and sour cream.\r', 'Season.\r', 'Return the filling to 2 of the potato shells, piling it high.\r', 'Sprinkle with cheese and return to the oven.\r', 'Cook for a further 5-10 minutes or until cheese has melted.']

name: Muesli for Kids
ingredients: ['1 cup puffed wheat cereal', '1 cup puffed corn cereal', '1 cup extruded natural bran', '1 cup corn flakes', '1 cup shredded coconut', '1 cup pumpkin seeds', '1/2 cup papaya, chunks chopped ', '1/2 cup dried apple, sliced ']
instructions: ['mix all ingredints.', 'store in airtigh container.', 'serve with milk or yoghurt and slices of fruit.']

name: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['250 g milk chocolate', '1 cup peanut butter']
instructions: ['have handy some small cupcake papers.\r', 'Melt the chocolate in a ‘bain-marie’ or the microwave with ¼ cup of the peanut butter.\r', 'In a separate ‘bain-marie’ melt the remaining peanut butter.\r', 'Trim the cupcake papers to 2 cm in height and place in muffin tins.\r', 'Spoon in 1 tablespoon of the chocolate mixture.\r', 'Allow to set for 20 minutes and spoon on 1 tablespoon peanut butter.\r', 'Allow to set for 10 minutes and top with remaining chocolate.']

name: Animal Mud Bath
ingredients: ['4 slices white bread', '1/2 cup nutella', '12 small pretzels', '12 animal crackers']
instructions: ['Place 4 bread slices on large plate to form a 4-square grid in middle.\r', "Cut each slice's edge to form 1 large circle.\r", 'Trim with knife to fit plate.\r', 'Spread Nutella generously to form a 6 to 7 inch circle on the bread.\r', 'Press pretzels into outer edge of circle to create fence.\r', 'Stand animal crackers upright inside fence and enjoy.\r', 'Serving ideas: For a splash of color, sprinkle 1 tablespoon multi-colored candy sprinkles over mud bath.']

name: Dirt Cups
ingredients: ['1 cup whole milk', '1 cup heavy cream', '4 1/2 ounces instant vanilla pudding', '3/4 cup powdered milk', '8 Oreo cookies, crushed ', '4 gummy worms']
instructions: ['Stir together milk and heavy cream.\r', 'With wire whisk, beat pudding mix and dry milk powder into milk and cream mixture for 2 minutes.\r', 'Stir in crushed Oreo cookies.\r', 'Immediately pour pudding into 4 clear cups.\r', 'Put pudding into the refrigerator.\r', 'Pudding will be soft-set and ready to eat within 5 minutes.\r', 'Serve with a gummy worm on top.']

name: Healthy Jungle Bars
ingredients: ['2 bananas', '1 cup dried fig, chopped ', '1 cup dried apricot, chopped ', '1 cup pitted dates, chopped ', '1 cup raisins', '2 cups granola cereal', '1 cup chopped toasted almond', '2 tablespoons almonds or 2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 cup flaked coconut']
instructions: ['Put all the ingredients in a large mixing bowl and mix everything together really well.\r', 'Dump the mixture into a 13 x 9 inch baking pan and smoosh it with a wooden spoon.\r', "Try to press it down evenly so that it's flat across the pan.\r", 'Cover the pan with plastic wrap and put it in the fridge overnight to allow the flavors to blend.\r', 'Cut it into about 24 squares.']

name: Sardines Melt
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 (95 g) can sardines in tomato sauce', '2 slices cheese (your favourite best melting one)']
instructions: ['Toast the bread lightly.', 'Place a slice of cheese on each piece of toast.', 'Put two sardines on each with tomato sauce.', 'Put under the grill until cheese bubbles.']

name: Toffee Apples
ingredients: ['10 small apples', '4 cups sugar', '1 cup water', '1/3 cup sugar syrup', '1 teaspoon red food coloring']
instructions: ['rinse apples under cold water and stand on rack until completely dry, do not rub with a cloth.\r', 'grease an oven tray.\r', 'push a skewer three quarters of the way into each apple at the stem end.\r', 'combine sugar, water, glucose syrup and colouring in a heavy-based saucepan.\r', 'stir over heat, without boiling until sugar is dissolved.\r', 'boil uncovered without stirring about 20 minutes or until mixture reaches a crack stage (remove sugar syrup from heat, allow bubbles to subside, drop a teaspoon of syrup into cold water, it should set hard and be hard to crack with fingers).\r', 'remove syrup from heat, stand pan in baking dish of warm water about 1 minute or until bubbles subside.\r', 'remove pan from water, tilt pan, dip and rotate an apple slowly in toffee until apple is completely coated.\r', 'twirl apple round a few times before placing onto greased oven tray to set.\r', 'pepeat with remaining apples and toffee.']

name: Special Breakfast in a Glass
ingredients: ['2 -3 tablespoons milo', '1 teaspoon honey (heaped tsp)', '1/4 cup yoghurt', '1 small banana, mashed ', '1 egg, raw ', '2 cups milk']
instructions: ['place first 5 ingredients in a blender or food processor, blend until smooth.\r', 'add cold milk (and in hot weather a generous scoop of ice cream) and process until mixed.']

name: Fluffernutter
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons marshmallow cream', '2 tablespoons peanut butter (smooth or creamy)', '2 slices bread']
instructions: ['Spread peanut butter onto one slice of bread, use as much as you want.\r', 'Cover with Marshmallow Fluff, use as much as you want.\r', 'Top with second slice of bread and enjoy!']

name: The Godmothers Fruit Loaf (No Eggs)
ingredients: ['2 cups sultanas', '1 cup raw sugar', '1 cup water', '100 g butter', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '2 cups plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda']
instructions: ['grease and line tin.', 'put sultanas, sugar, water and butter in a saucepan and bring to boil.', 'simmer uncovered for 5 minutes.', 'stir in lemon rind and vanilla.', 'mix in flour and baking soda.', 'mix well and bake 40 minutes 170-180 degrees.', 'leave until next day.']

name: Tuti Fruiti
ingredients: ['6 ounces caster sugar', '1 cup mixed fruit', '1 egg, beaten ', '4 ounces self-raising flour', '4 ounces butter', '1 cup coconut']
instructions: ['cream butter and sugar.\r', 'add other ingredients.\r', 'grease swiss rolls tin.\r', 'bake 25 minutes at 325 degrees.']

name: Boiled Passionfruit Fruitcake
ingredients: ['1/2 cup strained passion fruit pulp (about 7 large passionfruit)', '500 g mixed fruit', '1 cup sugar', '3 eggs, lightly beaten ', '3/4 cup self-raising flour', '1/4 cup orange juice', '125 g butter', '3/4 cup plain flour', '1 teaspoon mixed spice']
instructions: ['combine passionfruit pulp, mixed fruit, orange and butter in a pan.', 'bring to boil.', 'reduce heat.', 'simmer uncovered 3 minutes.', 'remove from heat to cool to room temperature.', 'stir in eggs and dry ingredients.', 'pour into greased and base lined deep 20cm round tin.', 'bake in moderately slow oven about 1 1/4 hours.']

name: Granny's Fruit Loaf
ingredients: ['3/4 pint cold brewed tea', '12 ounces sugar', '4 ounces apricots, chopped ', '1 1/4 lbs dried fruit', '1 egg, beaten ', '2 cups self-raising flour (heaped cups)']
instructions: ['Soak the apricots, sugar and dried fruit overnight in the cold tea.', 'Stir in morning.', 'Add egg and flour.', 'Bake 1 1/4 hours at 350°F.']

name: Salmon Dip
ingredients: ['75 g butter', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon cream', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon French dressing', '1 tablespoon parsley', ' salt', ' pepper', '200 g salmon (just 1 tin, or any fish)']
instructions: ['cream butter.\r', 'add ingredients.\r', 'mix well.\r', 'chill before serving.']

name: Cheesy Baked Bean Toastie
ingredients: ['200 g vegetarian baked beans, in tomato sauce (1 small can)', '2 slices bread', '2 teaspoons butter', '4 slices cheese (your favourite, good for melting, cheddar works well)']
instructions: ['Butter both slices of bread.', 'Place one slice buttered side down on the preheated toasted sandwich maker.', 'Empty contents of can on to bread.', 'Top with cheese.', 'Followed by the last piece of bread buttered side up.', 'Toast 3-4 minutes, or until golden brown.', 'Cut into either 2 triangles or 4 triangles.', 'Serve.']

name: New Zealand Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten ', '1 cup vinegar (scant cup)', '1 cup sugar (heaped cup)', '3 teaspoons flour (heaped cup)', '3 teaspoons mustard', '3 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2 cups water', '1 tablespoon butter']
instructions: ['mix together all ingredients except butter.', 'add butter and place in double boiler.', 'stir occasionally.', 'chill before serving.']

name: Jam and Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 tablespoon strawberry jam', ' triangle soft cheese (the L aughing Cowbrand)', " cheddar cheese (if you can't get Laughing Cow)", '1 teaspoon butter']
instructions: ['Butter bread if you like.', 'Spread jam over.', 'Place with cheese.', 'Top with other piece of bread.', 'Cut in half.', 'Serve.']

name: Smoked Salmon Bagels
ingredients: ['6 bagels', '6 slices smoked salmon', '6 tablespoons Philadelphia Cream Cheese, soft spreading ']
instructions: ['toast the bagels.', 'spread philadelphia on bagels.', 'top with salmon.', 'enjoy.']

name: Spaghetti and Cheese Toastie
ingredients: ['200 g canned spaghetti in tomato sauce (1 small can)', '4 slices cheddar cheese', '2 slices bread', '2 teaspoons butter']
instructions: ['butter bread.', 'place one slice butterside down on toasted sandwich maker.', 'empty contents of spaghetti can onto it.', 'top with cheese.', 'place other piece of bread on top, butter side up.', 'toast 3-4 minutes or until golden brown.', 'cut into2 traingles.', 'enjoy.']

name: Nanaimo Bars
ingredients: ['185 g butter, chopped ', '100 g dark chocolate, chopped ', '1 egg, lightly beaten ', '2 cups wheatmeal plain sweet biscuit crumbs', '1 cup coconut', '2/3 cup finely chopped pecan nuts', '60 g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '2 cups icing sugar', '2 tablespoons custard powder', '1/4 cup milk', '30 g dark chocolate, chopped ', '15 g butter']
instructions: ['Grease a 19cm x 29cm Lamington pan.', 'Melt butter and chocolate over hot water.', 'Remove from heat and cool 5 minutes.', 'Stir in egg.', 'Combine biscuits, coconut and pecans in a bowl.', 'Stir in butter mixture.', 'Press mixture firmly over base of prepared pan.', 'Filling:.', 'Cream butter and essence in small bowl with electric mixer.', 'Gradually beat in sifted icing sugar, custard powder and then milk.', 'Spread filling evenly over base.', 'Refrigerate until firm.', 'Topping:.', 'Melt chocolate and butter over hot water.', 'Cool slightly.', 'Drizzle the topping over slice.', 'Refrigerate until set before cutting.']

name: Bailey's Irish Cream
ingredients: ['395 g condensed milk', '1 teaspoon instant coffee (heaped dsp)', '1 1/2 cups whiskey', '3 eggs', '1/2 pint cream']
instructions: ['dissolve coffee in 1 cup boiling water.', 'leave to cool.', 'beat eggs in blender.', 'then beat in condensed milk.', 'add cream and beat again.', 'add cold coffee and beat.', 'lastly add whiskey and beat again.', 'refridgerate.', 'shake before use.']

name: My Favourite Toasted Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons butter', '2 slices bread', '2 slices bacon, cooked and fat removed ', ' ketchup']
instructions: ['Butter the bread', 'Place buttered side down on toasted sandwich maker.', 'Place bacon on top.', 'Squirt ketchup on, as much as you like, it gives an excellent taste.', 'Top with other piece of bread, buttered side up.', 'Toast about 3-4 minutes or until browned.']

name: Tuna Ritz Appetizers
ingredients: ['1 (400 g) can canned tuna (1 big tin)', '4 tablespoons mango chutney (or until it mixes well)', '400 g Ritz crackers (just one packet will do)']
instructions: ['drain tuna and place in a small bowl.', 'add chutney and mix until it is good enough to get a taste of chutney on every mouthful.', 'drop 1 tsp onto each cracker.', 'serve.']

name: Baked Beans on Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread, toasted ', '1 (200 g) can vegetarian baked beans, in tomato sauce ']
instructions: ['toast your bread.', 'butter if you like butter.', 'cut into 2 big diagonal traingles.', 'heat baked beans.', 'pour over toast.', 'serve.']

name: Gluten Free Fairy Cakes
ingredients: ['75 g margarine or 75 g butter', '75 g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla essence', '75 g gluten-free flour', '1 tablespoon milk', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder']
instructions: ['make sure you have 12 paper cases handy.', 'Preheat oven to 200 degrees.', 'Cream together margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.', 'Beat in eggs and vanilla, followed by the sifted baking powder, sifted flour and milk.', 'Half fill paper cases standing on baking tray.', 'Bake for 10-12 minutes.', 'When cold, decorate the top with jam or icing or just icing sugar, if desired.']

name: Banana Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 banana', '2 slices bread, soft ', '1 teaspoon butter, softened (if you like your bread buttered)']
instructions: ['Butter bread if you like.', 'Mash banana in a bowl and spread over a piece of bread.', 'Top with other piece of bread.', 'Cut into 4 triangles.', 'Enjoy.']

name: Rocky Road Sauce
ingredients: ['200 g dark chocolate, melted ', '1/2 cup cream, warmed ', '3/4 cup packaged marshmallows, chopped ', '1/4 cup red glace cherries, chopped ', '1/4 cup mixed nuts, crushed ']
instructions: ['combine chocolate and cream in a bowl.\r', 'stir in remaining ingredients.\r', 'mix well.']

name: Gluten Free Pastry
ingredients: ['100 g gluten-free flour', '50 g butter or 50 g margarine', '2 tablespoons water']
instructions: ['using a pastry cutter of knife, blend the butter into the flour until in resembles breadcrumbs.\r', 'add the water and bring together into a soft ball of dough.\r', 'wrap in cling film and leave to stand for 30-60 minutes.\r', 'roll out gently and use as per your recipe, (i found it easier to roll out with a lightly floured rolling pin on a lightly floured surface).']

name: Pb&j Toast
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut butter', '2 tablespoons jelly', '2 slices bread']
instructions: ['Toast the bread until you know it will be crunchy.', "Spread with peanut butter (you don't need butter).", 'Spread with jelly on top.', 'Viola.', 'Sooo nice.']

name: Marmite Melt
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon marmite', '2 slices bread', '1 teaspoon butter (if taste is to strong for you)', '4 slices cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['lightly toast bread.', 'butter if taste is to strong for you.', 'spread evenly with marmite.', 'top with cheese.', 'place under the grill until cheese starts to bubble.']

name: Chocolate Kahlua Cheesecake
ingredients: ['200 g chocolate chip cookies', '75 g butter, melted ', '150 g dark chocolate, broken into squares ', '1 tablespoon cream', '1/4 cup coffee-flavored liqueur', '150 g white chocolate, broken into squares ', '1/4 cup cream', '500 g creme fraiche', '3 tablespoons brown sugar']
