instructions: ['process the chocolate chip cookies in a food processor until fine.', 'add the butter and mix to make damp crumbs.', 'press into the base of a lined, shallow-sided 22cm cake tin.', 'refridgerate while preparing the filling.', 'filling:.', 'put the dark chocolate, first measure of cream and liqueur in a heatproof bowl and melt gently over hot, not boiling, water.', 'melt the white chocolate with the second measure of cream in the same manner.', 'beat together cream fraiche and sugar and divide in half.', 'stir the dark chocolate into one portion of cream fraiche and the white chocolate into the other.', 'gently swirl the two mixtures together and pour into the prepared base.', 'refridgerate for 6 hours or overnight.', 'it will set softly.', 'serve straight from the fridge.', 'cut into 12 thin wedges and accompany with seasoned fruit.']

name: Gluten Free White Sauce
ingredients: ['50 g butter', '50 g gluten-free flour', '600 ml milk', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['place butter, flour and milk in a saucepan.\r', 'using a whisk, stir over medium heat allowing sauce to thicken.\r', 'continue until smooth and thick then bring to the boil.\r', 'remove from heat and season.']

name: When You're Sick Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 teaspoons honey']
instructions: ['Toast bread.', 'Spread with honey.', 'Cut into soldiers.']

name: Pineapple Glazed Apple Pie
ingredients: ['7 granny smith apples, peeled, cored, wedges or 7 cups tart apples', '3/4 cup white sugar', '1 1/2 cups unsweetened pineapple juice', '3 tablespoons cornstarch', '1 tablespoon margarine', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 pie crust, baked, cooled ', ' whipped cream or Cool Whip']
instructions: ['In large pot add 1 1/4 cup pineapple juice and sugar. Bring to a low boil, add apples.', 'Simmer about 4 minutes, apples should be tender but not soft.', 'With slotted spoon take out apples and drain in colandar, have a dish underneath to catch liquid.', 'In small bowl, add 1/4 cup pineapple juice and cornstarch. Stir to dissolve.', 'Add to hot pineapple mixture, stirring until thickened. Turn the heat down when thickening. Should be clear and not milky.', 'Take off the heat. Stir in margarine vanilla and salt. Cool about 30 minutes, do not stir. Take any juice drippings from apples and stir into mixture.', 'Pour half of the mixture in the pie shell covering bottom.', 'Arrange apples in the circle around the shell. Spoon other half over the applies, smooth with the back of a spoon. Chill.Before serving top with whipped cream or cool whip in the center.', 'Optional Serving: Place 8 slices of Kiwi fruit on top of pie for 8 servings.']

name: Pita Snacks
ingredients: ['4 pita bread rounds (about 15cm in diameter)', '1/3 cup tomato sauce', '100 g ham', '1 cup pineapple chunk, drained ', '2 cups cheese, grated ']
instructions: ['turn oven to 200 degrees.\r', 'put bread on oven tray.\r', 'spread each one with tomatoe sauce.\r', 'chop ham into small bits.\r', 'sprinkle on bread.\r', 'chop pineapple.\r', 'sprinkle on bread.\r', 'sprinkle cheese over all.\r', 'bake about 10 minutes or until cheese bubbles.']

name: Caramel Cake
ingredients: ['125 g butter', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 egg', '1 cup milk', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 1/2 cups self-raising flour', '1 tablespoon cocoa']
instructions: ['turn oven to 170 degrees.\r', 'grease and flour a 20cm round tin.\r', 'cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.\r', 'beat in egg.\r', 'beat well.\r', 'put milk, syrup and soda in a pan.\r', "heat gently, DON'T BOIL!\r", 'sift flour into a bowl.\r', 'add milk mixture.\r', 'mix well.\r', 'spread only half of the mixture into prepared tin.\r', 'add cocoa to rest of batter.\r', 'mix it well.\r', "add to prepared tin - don't mix it up.\r", 'bake 40-45 minutes.']

name: Gluten Free Chocolate Brownies
ingredients: ['100 g butter', '75 g baking chocolate', '100 g gluten-free flour', '3 eggs', '100 g walnuts, chopped ', '200 g sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder']
instructions: ['gently melt together the butter and chocolate.', 'in a seperate bowl mix together the flour, baking powder, sugar and nuts.', 'beat in eggs.', 'followed by the melted butter and chocolate mixture.', 'pour into a 6" x 8" oiled and lined baking dish.', 'bake at 180 degrees for 30 minutes.', 'cut into slices before serving.']

name: Chocolate Sauce for Fruit or Ice Cream
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons cream', '1 Mars bar (one per person)']
instructions: ['chop up the mars bar.', 'put it into a jug.', 'add the milk.', 'put it in the microwave.', 'melt on high 65-75 seconds.', 'whish until smooth.', 'add cream.', 'whish well.', 'pour over fruit or ice cream.']

name: Chicken Fajitas Our Way
ingredients: ['500 g chicken breasts', '1 onion', '2 bell peppers (1 red, 1 green)', '1/4 cucumber, chopped ', '3 large tomatoes, chopped ', ' iceberg lettuce, chopped ', '2 carrots, grated ', '1 cup cheese, grated ', '1 avocado, cut into strips ', '1 mushroom, chopped ']
instructions: ['you also need 1 sachet of Old El Paso original smoky BBQ spice mix, 1 pack of Old El Paso soft flour tortillas,.', '1 jar old El Paso original salsa', 'and', '1 small pot of sour cream.', 'cut chicken breasts into thin strips.', 'slice peppersand onions into strips.', 'stir fry the chicken in a litle oil over a medium heat for 4 minutes, or until you know it is cooked.', 'add the El Paso Fajita spice mix, onions and peppers.', 'stir-fry another 3 minutes until seasoning mix coats them thouroghly.', 'heat soft flour tortillas as per pack instructions.', 'place everything out on the table.', 'grab a tortilla.', 'drop a dollop of sour cream over it.', 'spread it round.', 'add the meat.', 'then the veges you desire.', 'DO NOT ROLL UP.', 'you take one side fold it half way, take the other side, fold it over, take the bottom and fold it up.', 'YUMMY!']

name: Lucy's Marshmallows
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '1 cup boiling water', '2 teaspoons gelatin', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 teaspoon food coloring']
instructions: ['Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.', 'Add sugar, vanilla essence and colouring.']

name: Raspberry Slice
ingredients: ['125 g butter', '3/4 cup sugar', '2 egg yolks', '1 cup self-raising flour', '1/2 cup plain flour', '3 tablespoons raspberry jam', '2 egg whites', '1/2 cup sugar', '1/2 cup coconut']
instructions: ['turn oven to 180 degrees.\r', 'grease a 28cm x 18cm tin.\r', 'cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.\r', 'add egg yolks.\r', 'beat well.\r', 'sift in both flours.\r', 'mix it all to a soft dough.\r', 'press it evenly in tin.\r', 'spread jam over.\r', 'Topping:.\r', 'beat egg whites until stiff.\r', 'gradually beat in the sugar.\r', 'beat well.\r', 'add coconut.\r', 'stir it in.\r', 'spread evenly over jam.\r', 'bake 35-40 minutes.\r', 'slice when cold.']

name: Potato Wedges
ingredients: ['4 medium size new potatoes', ' oil', ' salt', '3/4 cup sour cream', '1/4 cup cheese, grated ']
instructions: ['turn oven to 190 degrees.\r', 'wash potatoes.\r', 'dry potatoes well.\r', "don't peel them.\r", 'cut each potato into 4 wedges.\r', 'spread enough oil to cover base of baking dish.\r', 'put wedges in one layer in dish.\r', 'bake 30 minutes \r', 'then turn wedges over, sprinkle with salt and bake 20 minutes more.\r', 'mix sour cream and cheese.\r', 'serve with wedges on a platter or in a bowl.']

name: Ginger Crunch
ingredients: ['125 g butter, soft (9 tablespoons)', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 1/2 cups plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '4 tablespoons butter', '1/2 cup icing sugar', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '2 teaspoons ground ginger']
instructions: ['turn oven to 180 degrees.', 'grease a 20cm tin.', 'beat butter and sugar until smooth.', 'sift flour, ginger, baking powder into a bowl.', 'mix and knead until smooth.', 'press it firmly in tin.', 'bake for 20 minutes.', 'Topping:.', 'put butter, icing sugar, golden syrup, ginger in small pan.', "heat gently, stirring, until it's melted.", 'when base is cooked, take it out of the oven.', 'pour topping over.', 'leave until cooled, then slice.']

name: Melt Down Croissant
ingredients: ['1 croissant', '1 slice cheese', '1 slice ham', '1 tablespoon english chutney', ' French mustard']
instructions: ['Put cheese, ham and chutney/mustard in croissant.', 'Heat in a microwave for about 30 seconds - 1 minute.']

name: Nesquik-Filled Marshmallows
ingredients: ['16 marshmallows (1 large bag)', '2 tablespoons nesquik chocolate flavored syrup']
instructions: ['Cut top off of marshmallow. Form a hole in center of marshmallow using your finger.', 'Fill hole with Nesquik. Put top back on marshmallow.', 'Use a wooden pick to hold the top in place if needed. Fix as many as you can eat at one time.', 'Freeze or refrigerate for 15 minutes to adhere top of marshmallow to bottom. Insert long campfire-roasting fork or other long fork or skewer into center of marshmallow and slowly roast over the fire to warm the chocolate and turn the marshmallow golden brown.', 'Do not burn the marshmallow as the chocolate will not have time to heat up and the outside of the marshmallow will slide off.']

name: No Bowl Potato Quiche
ingredients: ['3 -4 eggs', '1 1/2 cups whole milk', '1 cup cheese, grated ', '1 onion, sliced ', ' salt and pepper', "4 potatoes, cooked and cut up (she didn't specify here, so I am unsure, I think this is about right after asking Mum)", '3 slices bacon, cooked, trimmed and cut into pieces ', ' parsley', '1/2 cup self raising flour (a good 1/2 cup)', '1 teaspoon baking powder']
instructions: ['You can add finely sliced veggies, i.e: silverbeet, courgettes, pumpkin, kumara, etc etc.', 'Grease a oven proof dish.', 'Put cheese aside.', 'Mix all ingredients and put them in the dish.', 'Top with cheese and sliced tomatoes.', 'Cook at 350 degrees for 1 hour.']

name: Tu Tu's Carrot Cake
ingredients: ['1 cup self raising flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon clove', '1 teaspoon ginger', '1 cup firmly packed brown sugar', '1 1/8 cups grated carrots', '1/2 cup sultana', '2/3 cup olive oil or 2/3 cup vegetable oil', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['mix step one well.', 'beat step two.', 'add two steps together.', 'bake 180 degrees 40 - 50 minutes.', 'top with a cream cheese topping.']

name: Nesquik Nibbles (Low Fat, High Protein)
ingredients: [' nonstick cooking spray', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons butter or 5 tablespoons margarine', '2/3 cup chocolate-flavor Nestle Nesquik powder, double chocolate flavor powder ', '1/3 cup packed brown sugar', '1/3 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt or 1/3 cup plain low-fat yogurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Spray 2 baking sheets with cooking spray.', 'Combine flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl, set aside.', 'Combine butter, Nesquik and sugar in medium bowl until mixture resembles coarse sand.', 'Stir in yogurt and vanilla extract.', 'Stir in flour mixture until combined.', 'Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared baking sheets.', 'Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges appear done and middles are almost set.', 'Cool on baking sheets for 2 to 3 minutes, remove to wire racks to cool completely.', 'TWIST IT UP!', 'Turn these Nibbles into a fun and extra delicious treat with extra protein.', 'Just use a spoonful of peanut butter sandwiched between two Nibbles.']

name: Bread and Butter Pudding (Poor Man's Pudding)
ingredients: ['4 slices stale bread', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 eggs', '1/4 cup raisins', '2 apples', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1/2 cup milk']
instructions: ['NOTE:.\r', 'ingredients are not to specific, it is how much you want to make, only specific ingredients are the eggs and sugar.\r', 'butter bread and cut into squares.\r', 'layer into dish with raisins and thinly sliced apples.\r', 'mix eggs (or more) and sugar and enough milk to cover pudding.\r', 'bake 300-350 degrees for 1 hour.']

name: Shortbread
ingredients: ['175 g butter, room temperature ', '75 g caster sugar', '250 g plain flour, plus extra for dusting ']
instructions: ['You will also need 30cm x 20cm swiss-roll tin. \r', 'pre-heat oven to 180 degrees. \r', 'slice butter into a food processor bowl and add the sugar. \r', 'whiz until soft and light and well creamed. \r', 'add the flour and process again, using the pulse switch until dough clings together in coarse crumbs. \r', 'turn mixture into prepared swiss-roll tin and spread out with spatula. \r', 'press all over with floured knuckles to form an even base. \r', 'prick with a fork. \r', 'bake for 15 minutes or until light golden and firm to the touch. \r', 'let shortbread base cool in the baking tin.']

name: Half Hour Steam Pudding
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '4 tablespoons flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 tablespoon cocoa', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 pinch salt', '1 egg']
instructions: ['melt butter and golden syrup in a bowl.\r', 'add flour, sugar, baking powder, salt cocoa, egg and enough cold water to mix (like with a sponge).\r', 'boil 1/2 hour.']

name: Daniel's Ambitious Invention Cake
ingredients: ['1 cup water', '2 lbs mixed fruit', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1/2 lb butter', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1 (395 g) can sweetened condensed milk', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 cups plain flour']
instructions: ['Put all of step one ingredients in a saucepan.', 'Bring to boil', 'Take of heat and add step two ingredients.', 'Cool.', 'Then add step three ingredients.', 'Bake in lined tin at 300°F for 1 1/2 - 2 hours.']

name: 3 Toppings Apple Crumble
ingredients: ['4 apples', '3/4 cup water', '1/4 cup sugar', '1 lemon, juice and zest of', '1 cup flour', '4 ounces butter', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 cup brown sugar', '3 cups breadcrumbs', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 cup water', '2 ounces butter', '2/3 cup desiccated coconut', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 cups corn flakes']
instructions: ['stew together the filling to a pulp.', 'Topping A:.', 'rub butter into flour and bakingpowder.', 'add brown sugar.', 'place crumbly mixture over stewed fruit.', 'bake 350 degrees until brown and crisp.', 'Topping B:.', 'mix together then sprinkle over fruit.', 'same baking as for Topping A.', 'Topping C:.', 'melt butter.', 'add rest of ingredients and sprinkle over fruit.', 'same baking as for Topping A.']

name: Ketchup Spaghetti
ingredients: ['1 lb spaghetti', ' ketchup']
instructions: ['cook spaghetti as instructed on the packet.\r', 'when you come to serve, put on as much ketchup as you desire, it has a really unique taste to it.']

name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: ['1 avocado', '2 slices bread, toasted, of your choice ']
instructions: ['toast bread.', 'spread with avocado.', 'eat and enjoy.', 'also fab if you add slices of cheese.']

name: Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['1 cup shelled roasted peanuts', '1 1/2 teaspoons peanut oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt (omit salt if salted peanuts are used)']
instructions: ['Place ingredients in blender.', 'With the lid secured, blend until mixture becomes paste-like or spreadable (3 to 4 minutes).', 'If necessary, stop the machine and use a rubber spatula to scrape mixture from the sides of the container back into contact with the blade.', 'Continue blending until desired consistency is reached.', 'For crunchy peanut butter, stir in 1/4 cup chopped roasted peanuts after the blending is completed.', 'Yields 1/2 cup creamy or 3/4 cup crunchy peanut butter.', 'Store in a tightly closed container in the refrigerator.', 'Oil may rise to the top. If this occurs, stir before using.']

name: Good for You Banana Choc Chip Ice Cream
ingredients: ['8 ripe bananas', ' chocolate chips']
instructions: ['NOTE:you can have just plain if your going all healthy, or add really anything you want, even a bit of mint essence to make it banana mint choc chip.\r', 'peel the bananas.\r', 'wrap in cling film and freeze overnight.\r', 'get out of freezer and leave to sit for 20 minutes to soften a bit.\r', 'cut roughly and chuck in a blender.\r', 'blend until smooth.\r', 'add your desired accompany and eat now or re-freeze for later.']

name: Ketchup Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread, toasted ', ' ketchup']
instructions: ['toast bread.\r', 'spread with ketchup.\r', 'eat.']

name: Salmon Mousse Supreme, Grandma's Recipe
ingredients: ['350 g salmon steaks (12 oz)', '1 onion, diced ', '75 g carrots, sliced (3 oz)', '2 bay leaves', '10 black peppercorns', ' salt (to taste)', ' pepper (to taste)', '150 ml white wine (1/4 pint)', '240 ml water (16 Tablespoons)', '23 ml gelatin (4 1/2 teaspoons)', '300 ml milk (1/2 pint)', '25 g butter (1 oz) or 25 g margarine (1 oz)', '30 ml plain flour (2 Tablespoons)', '75 ml mayonnaise (5 tablespoons)', '10 ml lemon juice (2 teaspoons)', '150 ml whipping cream (lightly whipped, 5 oz)', '1 egg white (whisked until stiff)', '15 ml medium sherry (1 Tablespoon)', '5 ml vinegar (1 teaspoon)', '10 cm piece cucumbers (4 inch)', ' melba toast (to serve) or cracker (to serve)']
instructions: ['Place the salmon steaks in a small shallow pan, add half the onion, half the carrots, one bay leaf, 5 peppercorns and a good pinch of salt, spoon over half the wine (= 75 ml / 5 Tablespoons) with some of the water (=75 ml / 5 Tablespoons).', 'Cover and slowly boil, then simmer gently for 15 minutes (covered).', 'Remove the salmon pieces (RESERVE the cooking liquid).', 'Gently peel off the skin and using two forks gently flake the flesh, removing any bones.', 'Place the fish to one side to cool and boil the reserved cooking liquid down until it it reduced by half, strain it and reserve it again.', 'To make the mousse, sprinkle 15 ml ( 3 teaspoons) gelatine into 45 ml (3 Tablespoons) water in a small cup and mix well, leave until totally dissolved (several minutes).', 'bring the milk to the boil with the rest of the sliced onion, carrot, bay leaf and peppercorns then leave to infuse for 10 minutes.', 'Melt butter, and off the heat add flour and then strain the milk mixture into this. bring to the boil and boil for several minutes, stirring all the time. Take off the heat and while still warm, mix in the gelatine mixture.', 'Once the sauce is cooked, add it, with the fish and a little of the reserved fish stock to a food processor (or use a stick blender) and PULSE ONLY for a few seconds so that the fish still retains some texture.', 'Slowly add the mayonnaise and whipped cream and fold through the mousse.', 'Whisk the egg white until stiff but not dry, and fold it well into the mousse mixture.', 'Pour the mixture into an oiled 18cm (7 inch) soufflé dish, smooth the surface, cover and refrigerate about 2 hours to set.', 'Make aspic by soaking the remaining gelatine in 30 ml (2 Tablespoons) water and dissolving it, stir in the remaining wine, sherry, vinegar, water( 90ml / 6 tablespoons) and season. refrigerate for 1 hour to set.', 'Turn Mousse out on to a flat dish and dab with kitchen paper very gently to absorb any excess oil from the dish. Turn the aspic out in a sheet of greaseproof paper and chop roughly. Slice cucumber very thinly and press gently around the sides of the salmon mouse. Garnish with aspic and serve with Melba toast.']

name: Banana Roll Ups
ingredients: ['1 -2 tablespoon butter', '1 -2 tablespoon honey', '2 slices bread', '1 banana']
instructions: ['cut crusts of the bread.', 'roll lightly with a rolling pin.', 'spread with butter and set honey.', 'put a peeled banana at one end and roll the bread around it.', 'cut in half.']

name: Banana on Toast
ingredients: ['1 banana', '2 slices bread, toasted, your choice all work well ']
instructions: ['toast the bread.\r', 'spread with banana, not in chunks, actually spread with knife.\r', 'and now eat it.']

name: Spinach Dip With Mushrooms
ingredients: ['1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry ', '1 1/2 cups nonfat sour cream', '1 cup fat-free mayonnaise', '1 cup chopped fresh mushrooms', '3 green onions, chopped ']
instructions: ['In a medium-sized bowl, combine all ingredients.', 'Mix well.', 'cover and refrigerate.', 'Serve chilled with a variety of raw vegetables.']

name: Tropical Cole Slaw
ingredients: ['2 cups shredded white cabbage', '1 cup shredded red cabbage', '2 cups grated carrots', '3 cups chopped celery', '1/3 cup chopped dates', '1/3 cup chopped dried pineapple', '2/3 cup lemon yogurt or 2/3 cup low-fat vanilla yogurt', '3 tablespoons fat-free sweet and sour dressing', '1/2 cup dry roasted salted peanut, chopped ']
instructions: ['In a large bowl.', 'combine the cabbage, carrots, celery, dates and pineapple.', 'Mix in the yogurt and vinegar dressing.', 'Before serving, mix in the salted peanuts.']

name: Fried Cod With Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['1 kg dried codfish', '500 g milk', '500 g frying oil', '1 cup grated toast', '1 kg potato', '2 garlic', '3 lemons, juice of', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 cup oil']
instructions: ['Slice the cod and put in water for 12 hours, change water 2-3 times, drain.', 'Arrange the slices on a plate with the skin upwards.', 'Pour the milk over it and let until it is absorbed.', 'Dip the slices in the grated toast and fry in hot oil.', 'Serve with garlic sauce.', 'GARLIC SAUCE:.', 'Pound the garlic in a mortar until they are mashed.', 'Cook and peel the potatoes, pound them in the mortar too.', 'Add the garlic and half a glass of water.', 'Season with salt.', 'Stir in the oil and lemon juice.', 'Continue stirring until sauce is set.']

name: Mayo and Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '3 slices medium cheddar, sliced thick ', '2 slices bread, works best on white ']
instructions: ['Place cheese on bread.', 'Spread with mayonnaise, as much as you want, the more the better.', 'Put other piece of bread on top.', 'Cut into 4 triangles.', 'Voila!', 'A truly yummy, simple sammie.']

name: Lasagna Pasta Rolls With Shaved Ham and Parmesan
ingredients: ['2 cups shaved parmesan cheese', '250 g shredded ham', '3 garlic cloves, crushed ', '300 ml cream', '2 (400 g) cans tomatoes with juice', '1/2 cup white wine', '2 cups sliced button mushrooms', '1/2 cup black olives, pitted (approx)', '1 cup mozzarella cheese', ' tomatoes', ' flat leaf parsley', ' basil (to garnish)']
instructions: ['you will also need.', '1 packet fresh lasagne sheets.', 'cut the lasagne sheets in half.', 'place a handful of ham and cheese along the length of each sheet, a couple of cm in from the edge.', 'roll tightly.', 'cut each roll in half and place in a baking dish.', 'place the garlic and cream in a large frypan, and stir over medium heat until it comes to a gentle boil.', 'add the tomatoes, wine, mushrooms and olives.', 'pour over the pasta rolls and sprinkle with mozzarella.', 'bake at 180 degrees for 30 minutes.', 'remove from the oven and decorate top with chopped fresh tomato, flat-leaf parsley and basil.']

name: Peanut-Crusted Touchdown Turkey Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '8 slices raisin bread', '2 eggs, beaten ', '3/4 cup peanuts, finely chopped ', '1/4 cup apricot jam', '2 teaspoons honey mustard', '4 slices cooked turkey', '4 slices tomatoes', '4 slices avocados']
instructions: ['Melt butter in a 10" to 12" inch skillet over low heat.\r', 'Dip one side of each bread slice into egg and then into peanuts, coating well.\r', 'place in skillet, coated side down.\r', "(You'll need to cook bread in batches).\r", 'Cook over low heat until lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes.\r', 'Blend apricot jam with honey mustard; spread on uncoated side of grilled bread slices.\r', 'Arrange turkey, tomato and avocado on 4 bread slices.\r', 'Top with remaining bread slices, jam mixture down.\r', 'Serve immediately.']

name: Bishop Bread
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1/2 cup shortening', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 cup mashed ripe banana (2 medium)', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup semisweet chocolate piece', '1 cup chopped roasted peanuts']
instructions: ['Heat oven to 350°F.\r', 'Grease and flour a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan, set aside.\r', 'In a large bowl, beat sugar, shortening, eggs and vanilla until light and fluffy.\r', 'Beat in bananas.\r', 'Stir together flour, baking powder and salt.\r', 'add to banana mixture.\r', 'Stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.\r', 'Fold in the chocolate pieces and 2/3 cup of the peanuts.\r', 'Pour batter into prepared pan.\r', 'sprinkle with remaining peanuts.\r', 'Bake in a 350°F oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.\r', 'Cool in pan 10 minutes.\r', 'Remove from pan and cool on wire rack.\r', 'ALTERNATIVE:.\r', 'For mini-loaves, prepare batter as above.\r', 'Grease and flour 8 mini-loaf pans (4 1/2-inch x 2 1/2-inch x 1 1/2-inch).\r', 'Pour 1/2 cup batter into each pan and sprinkle with chopped peanuts, about 2 teaspoons per loaf.\r', 'Bake in a 350°F oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.\r', 'Cool in pan 10 minutes.\r', 'Remove from pan and cool on wire rack.']

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Twist Shake
ingredients: ['1 ounce chocolate chips', '1 ounce peanut butter', '4 ounces coconut juice or 4 ounces milk', '6 ounces frozen yogurt or 6 ounces ice cream, vanilla ', '2 curls chocolate shavings', '1/2 ounce crushed roasted peanuts']
instructions: ['Whip all ingredients together in blender until smooth.\r', 'Garnish with shaved chocolate and crushed roasted peanuts.']

name: Peanut Butter Porridge
ingredients: ['1 cup oats', '1/2 cup milk', '1 tablespoon peanut butter']
instructions: ['cook oats as insturcted on packet with milk.\r', 'serve with peanut butter.\r', 'uterly divine.']

name: Banoffee Smoothie
ingredients: ['2 bananas, cut up ', '200 ml milk', '4 scoops toffee ice cream']
instructions: ['place all in blender.', "MIX for 10 seconds then SMOOTH for 20 seconds or if you don't have a fancy blender, just blend until smooth.", 'serve imediately.']

name: Best Vegemite Sandwiches
ingredients: [' vegemite', ' walkers chicken potato chips', ' butter', '4 slices white bread']
instructions: ['butter bread, if you find the taste of vegemite too strong.', 'spread with vegemite to your desire.', 'get as many potato chips on as possible.', 'put a piece of bread on top of that.', 'press down to crunch the chips and let them break.', 'cut into 4 squares and serve.']

name: Nana Dog
ingredients: ['6 bananas', '6 hot dog buns', '1 (400 g) jar peanut butter, not necaserially 400g (crunchy or smooth)']
instructions: ['First set out the hot dog buns.\r', 'Open the buns and place the bananas.\r', 'You may want to cut the bananas in order for them to fit inside the buns.\r', 'Next, spread the peanut butter on top of the banana.\r', 'Cover with your favorite topping.\r', 'Try sprinkling raisins or chocolate chips or maybe drizzle on some chocolate sauce or honey.']

name: Ice Cool Fruity
ingredients: ['3 kiwi fruits, peeled, quartered ', '300 g fresh strawberries', '350 ml orange juice', '8 ice cubes']
instructions: ['place all ingredients into blender.\r', "MIX for 20 seconds then SMOOTH for 20 seconds or if you don't have a top of the range blender, just blend until smooth.\r", 'serve straight away.']

name: Coffee Smoothie
ingredients: ['200 ml espresso coffee', '150 ml milk', '2 (15 ml) Baileys Irish Cream', ' sugar', '4 scoops vanilla ice cream']
instructions: ["put all ingredients in a blender (you don't have to use the sugar).", "MIX for 10 seconds, SMOOTH for 20 seconds, or if you don't have a fancy blender, just blend until smooth."]

name: Chocolate Cherry Slice
ingredients: ['200 g dark chocolate, chopped ', '3/4 cup coconut', '1/3 cup caster sugar', '1 cup glace cherries, chopped ', '1 egg white']
instructions: ['Grease a 19cm x 29cm lamington pan, line base and sides with paper, grease paper well.', 'Melt chocolate in heatproof bowl over hot water.', 'Spread over base of prepared pan, refrigerate until set.', 'Combine coconut, sugar, cherries and egg white in a bowl.', 'Spread over chocolate.', 'Rough top lightly with a fork.', 'Bake in moderate oven for about 15 minutes.', 'Cool in pan.', 'Cut when cold.', 'Store in refrigerator.']

name: Nana's Fruit Loaf
ingredients: ['2 cups mixed fruit', '1 cup water', '1 cup sugar', '2 ounces butter', '2 cups flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda']
instructions: ['boil mixed fruit, water, sugar and butter.\r', 'put in a bowl to cool.\r', 'then mix together with flour and baking soda.\r', 'put into a greased loaf tin.\r', 'bake for 1 hour at 180 degrees.']

name: Deluxe Devil's Food Cake
ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 3/4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2/3 cup cocoa', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 3/4 cups sugar', '2/3 cup butter, softened ', '1 cup water', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '3 eggs', '2 2/3 cups icing sugar', '1/4 cup cocoa', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup butter, softened ', '1 egg yolk', '1/3 cup hot water']
instructions: ['In a bowl sift together flour, baking powder, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, salt, sugar.', 'Add butter.', 'Then pour in water and vanilla essence.', 'Beat with an electric beater for 2 minutes on high or with a hand beater for 250 strokes.', 'Add eggs and beat 2 minutes or 250 strokes with hand beater.', 'Pour into a 33cm x 23cm x 5cm oblong pan lined with greaseproof paper.', 'Bake at 180°C for 35-40 minutes or until cooked.', 'Cool on wire rack in pan.', 'Ice in pan with deluxe chocolate icing.', 'Deluxe Chocolate Icing:.', 'Sift together icing sugar, cocoa and salt.', 'Add butter, egg yolk and hot water.', 'Beat until smooth and easy to spread.']

name: Spicy Pineapple Meatballs
ingredients: ['375 g hamburger', '1 dash Tabasco sauce', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '1/2 small granny smith apple, peeled and grated ', '1/4 cup stale breadcrumbs', ' oil, for shallow frying ', '450 g pineapple chunks']
instructions: ['Combine minced steak with Tabasco, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, apple and breadcrumbs; mix well.', 'Shape mixture into balls, roll in flour.', 'Shallow fry in hot oil until golden brown all over.', 'Top each meatball with piece of pineapple, securing with a toothpick.']

name: Strawberry Mallow Slice
ingredients: ['2 cups plain sweet biscuit crumbs', '125 g butter, melted ', '1/2 cup coconut', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '250 g cream cheese', '300 ml thickened cream', '100 g pink marshmallows', '250 g punnet strawberries', '1 tablespoon gelatin', '1/4 cup cold water', '100 g marshmallows', '1 tablespoon milk']
instructions: ['Grease a 19cm x 29cm lamington pan.', 'Combine biscuits, butter, coconut and spice in a bowl, mix well.', 'Press evenly over base of prepared pan; refrigerate 30 minutes.', 'Pour filling over base; refrigerate several hours or until firm.', 'Spread with topping; refrigerate until topping is set.', 'Sprinkle with extra toasted shredded coconut if desired.', 'FILLING:.', 'Process cream cheese until soft.', 'Add cream, marshmallows and strawberries, process until smooth.', 'Add gelatine to cold water, stir over hot water until gelatine is dissolved.', 'Fold into cream mixture.', 'TOPPING:.', 'Combine marshmallows and milk in a saucepan, stir constantly over low heat without boiling until marshmallows are melted.', 'Cool topping to room temperature.']

name: New Zealand-Style Ice-Cream, Christmas Pudding
ingredients: ['1/2 cup sultana', '1/2 cup currants', '1/2 cup chopped raisins', '1/4 cup dessert fig, finely chopped ', '1/2 cup brandy', '10 plump dried apricots, chopped ', '2 liters good quality vanilla ice cream, softened ', '50 g dark chocolate, chopped ', '1/2 cup sliced almonds, toasted ']
instructions: ['You will also require 1 packet each of red and green cherries.', 'Combine the sultanas, currants, raisins and figs.', 'Add the brandy and dried fruits, cover, and soak for 12-24 hours, stirring occasionally.', 'Mix the soaked fruits, ice cream, chocolate and almonds together.', 'Line a large pudding bowl, basin or loaf pan with plastic wrap so that it hangs well over the sides.', 'Spoon the mixture into the container, smooth the surface and cover with the overhanging sides of plastic wrap.', 'Freeze until firm.', 'To serve turn onto a chilled serving platter and surround with seasonal berries.', 'Can be stored for up to 6 weeks in the freezer.']

name: Nana's Fruitcake
ingredients: ['1 lb sultana', '3 eggs', '3/4 lb sugar', '1/2 lb butter', '3/4 lb flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['put sultannas in a saucepan, cover with water and boil.', 'beet eggs, add sugar.', 'cut butter and add to eggs and sugar.', 'strain sultannas, add to egg mixture and stir.', 'add flour, baking powder and salt.', 'bake for 1 1/4 - 1 1/2 hours at 350 degrees.', 'add essence if wanted.', 'check at 1 hour.']

name: Toffee Strawberries
ingredients: ['1 cup caster sugar', '1/4 cup water', '36 strawberries']
instructions: ['dissolve the sugar in the water in a small, heavy saucepan and boil without stirring - just swirl the pan around until the sugar syrup turns a golden caramel colour.\r', 'remove from the heat and dip strawberries into te syrup, holding them by the stalk.\r', 'leave to harden on a non-stick baking paper.\r', 'this also works well with cherries.']

name: Apple Flapjacks
ingredients: ['2 large bramley apples, peeled, cored and sliced ', '1/2 lemon, juice of', '150 g butter', '75 g brown sugar', '75 g golden syrup', '225 g porridge oats', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 190 degrees.', 'Place the apples in a small saucepan together with the lemon juice and a.', 'little water.', 'Bring to the boil.', 'cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until the apple is soft then mash the.', 'apple to a soft purée.', 'Melt the butter, sugar and syrup in another saucepan, but do not let the.', 'mixture boil.', 'Stir in the oats, cinnamon and salt and mix well.', 'Press half the mixture into a 20cm/8 inch sandwich tin.', 'Spread the apple purée on top, then cover with the remaining flapjack.', 'mixture.', 'Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown.', 'Remove from the oven and mark into slices, but leave to cool before.', 'attempting to remove from the tin.']

name: Tomatoes With Zucchini Filling
ingredients: ['6 tomatoes', '4 shallots, chopped ', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '30 g butter', '2 zucchini, grated ', '2 teaspoons tomato paste', '1 tablespoon fresh basil, chopped ', '1 tablespoon grated parmesan cheese']
instructions: ['cut top from tomatoes.\r', 'scoop out half the pulp, reserve.\r', 'saute shallots and garlic in butter for 1 minute.\r', 'add zucchini, tomatoe paste, basil and reserved tomatoe pulp.\r', 'cook further 1 minute.\r', 'spoon filling into tomatoes.\r', 'sprinkle with cheese.\r', 'barbeque until heated through.']

name: Calamari
ingredients: ['1 kg squid', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 cups packaged dry breadcrumbs', ' oil, for deep-frying (or shallow frying)']
instructions: ['clean squid:.\r', 'hold squid with one hand, with the other hand hold head and pull gently, head and inside of body will come away in one compact piece.\r', 'cut tentacles from head.\r', 'remove bone found at open end of squid (it looks like a long thin piece of plastic).\r', 'clean squid under cold running water \r', 'rub of brown outer skin.\r', 'cut squid into 5mm rings.\r', 'To make calamari:.\r', 'dip rings into combined beaten egg and milk.\r', 'drain off excess then toss in breadcrumbs.\r', 'pat breadcrumbs on firmly with fingertips.\r', '(two cloves of fresh garlic can be added to the egg and milk).\r', 'heat oil in large saucepan.\r', 'drop squid rings into deep hot oil, a small batch at a time.\r', 'cook 1-2 minutes or until golden brown.\r', 'remove from oil with slotted spoon and drain the rings well on absorbent paper.\r', '(to save oil, shallow fry by only filling oil to half way up the rings and cooking 1-2 minutes then turning and cooking 1-2 minutes on other side).\r', 'serve hot with lemon wedges or tartare sauce.']

name: Beef Fillet With Herb Crust
ingredients: ['4 (180 -200 g) beef steak fillets, best quality possible (4 x 180-200g)', ' sea salt', ' black pepper', ' olive oil', '3 slices white bread, toasted ', '5 -6 tablespoons parsley, finely chopped ', '2 garlic cloves, minced ', '125 g butter, melted ', ' favourite mustard']
instructions: ['For this recipe you will also need tomato relish and 1/2 cup pesto.', 'Trim fat and membrane from each steak and season with sea salt and black pepper.', 'In a smoking hot pan, add olive oil and sear the meat until it is sealed all over.', 'Allow 2 minutes each side.', 'Leave to rest while preparing crust.', 'In a food processor, make fresh bread crumbs and process the fresh parsley.', 'Combine together in a bowl, season with sea salt and pepper, add garlic and melted butter.', 'Smear each steak with mustard.', 'Place crust on each fillet piling on top.', 'Place in 220° oven for 15-20 minutes.', 'Rest meat 10 minutes before serving.', 'While resting, prepare sauce.', 'Gently heat 1 cup of your favourite tomato relish and 1/2 cup pesto.', "If you want to thin, use a little beef stock, this isn't necessary."]

name: Creamy Corn Cake With Avocado Salsa
ingredients: ['1 egg yolk', '1/2 cup self-raising flour', '420 g corn kernels, rinsed and drained ', '310 g creamed corn', '2 egg whites', '500 g cherry tomatoes, quartered ', '200 g avocados (1 small avacado)', '1 small red onion, chopped finely ', '2 tablespoons fresh coriander, chopped coarsley ', '2 tablespoons of fresh mint, chopped coarsley ', '1/4 cup lime juice']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to hot.', 'Oil deep 23cm-round cake pan, line base and side with baking paper.', 'Combine egg yolk, flour, corn kernels and creamed corn in medium bowl.', 'Beat egg whites in small bowl with electric mixer until soft peaks form.', 'Fold into yolk mixture.', 'Spread mixture into prepared pan.', 'Bake, uncovered in hot oven about 30 minutes or until browned lightly and cooked through.', 'Cut cake into 8 wedges, serve with avocado salsa.', 'AVOCADO SALSA:.', 'Combine ingredients in small bowl.', 'Toss gently.']

name: Pizza Loaf
ingredients: ['2 cups plain flour', '7 g sachet dried yeast', '1 teaspoon sugar', '3/4 cup warm water', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '15 slices soft salami', '1/2 cup tomato sauce', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano leaves', '250 g broccoli', '1 egg', '320 g sliced red peppers', '125 g pepperoni salami, in a piece ', '20 stuffed olives']
instructions: ['Dough:.', 'Make well in sifted flour.', 'Stir in combined yeast, sugar and water.', 'Mix to a firm dough.', 'Knead for about 5 minutes on floured surface until smooth and elastic.', 'Using 3/4 of the dough, roll out to a rectangle large enough to line a greased loaf tin (base measures 9cm x 22cm).', 'Leave 2cm of dough over edge.', 'Filling:.', 'Place layer of mozzarella evenly over dough.', 'Top with rolled up soft salami.', 'Pour over combined tomatoes sauce and oregano.', 'Break broccoli into small flowerets, drop into pan of boiling water, boil 1 minute, refresh under cold water.', 'Arrange broccoli over tomato sauce.', 'Top evenly with beaten egg.', 'Drain peppers well, place over broccoli.', 'Remove skin from pepperoni, slice very thinly, arrange neatly over red peppers.', 'Cut olive in half lengthways, place in a row down centre of the loaf.', 'Roll out remaining pizza dough large enough to cover top of loaf, place on top, join edges with a little water, pinch together.', 'Decorate top with scraps of dough, cut a few slits to allow steam to escape.', 'Bake in moderately hot oven 40 minutes.', 'Remove from tin, place onto an oven tray, bake further 10 minutes to brown sides.', 'Cover top with aluminium foil if it is getting to brown.', 'Allow to become cold before cutting.']

name: Naturally Low-Fat Chocolate Fudge Cake
ingredients: ['85 g dark chocolate, chopped finely ', '1/2 cup cocoa powder', '1 cup brown sugar, firmly packed ', '1/2 cup boiling water', '2 egg yolks', '1/4 cup almond meal', '1/3 cup whole wheat flour', '4 egg whites']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to moderate.\r', 'line base and side of deep 20cm round cake pan.\r', 'combine chocolate, cocoa and sugar with the water in a large bowl.\r', 'stir until smooth.\r', 'add egg yolks, whisk to combine.\r', 'fold in almond meal and flour.\r', 'beat egg whites in a small bowl with an electric mixer until peaks form.\r', 'gently fold egg white mixture into chocolate mixture, in 2 batches.\r', 'pour into prepared pan.\r', 'bake in moderate oven about 40 minutes.\r', 'stand in pan 5 minutes.\r', 'turn onto wire rack, remove paper.\r', 'serve warm with icing sugar and dotted with fresh strawerries, also divine cold.']

name: Fish Milanese
ingredients: ['4 fish fillets', '1 small onion', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 cup oil', ' salt', ' pepper', ' flour', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon milk', ' packaged dry breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon oil, extra ', '60 g butter', '60 g butter, extra ', '1 garlic clove', '2 teaspoons parsley, chopped ']
instructions: ['Remove skin from fillets.', 'Remove bones.', 'Combine peeled and finely chopped onion, lemon juice, oil, salt and pepper in a large plate, mix well.', 'Add fillets, spoon mixture over fillets to coat thoroughly.', 'Allow fillets to marinate 1 hour, turning them occasionally.', 'Remove fillets from marinate.', 'Coat lightly with flour.', 'Dip in combined beaten eggs and milk, then into breadcrumbs, pressing crumbs on firmly.', 'Heat extra oil and butter in large frying pan.', 'Add fillets, cook gently on both sides until golden brown.', 'Allow approximately 3 minutes on each side.', 'Drain.', 'Melt extra butter in separate pan, add crushed garlic.', 'Cook until butter turns light golden brown, add parsley.', 'Pour browned butter over fillets.']

name: Asparagus Cocktail
ingredients: ['225 g fresh asparagus', '100 g diced ham', '4 pineapple rings', '8 tablespoons mayonnaise (check ingredients label)', '1/2 teaspoon cognac', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', ' cayenne pepper', '2 hard-boiled eggs (to garnish)', ' freshly chopped parsley (to garnish)']
instructions: ['Prepare the asparagus by cutting off any woody stems and washing under cold running water.', 'Chop into 2.5cm/1 inch lengths then boil in salted water for 10 minutes or until just tender.', 'Drain and cool.', 'Meanwhile, dice the ham and chop the pineapple rings.', 'Mix together the asparagus, ham and pineapple rings in a bowl.', 'Line 4 individual glasses or dishes with lettuce leaves then pile the asparagus mixture on top.', 'In another bowl, place the mayonnaise, Cognac, lemon juice and cayenne and mix well.', 'Divide equally between the glasses.', 'Garnish with slices of hard boiled egg and chopped parsley.', 'Chill for 10 minutes.']

name: Stuffed Veal Scallops
ingredients: ['8 boneless veal steaks', '155 g mushrooms', '30 g butter', '4 slices ham (thin slices)', '4 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese', '60 g butter, extra ', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '1/2 cup hot water', '1/2 beef stock cube']
instructions: ['Pound veal steaks out thinly.', 'Finely slice mushrooms.', 'Melt butter in pan, add mushrooms and cook over medium heat until mushrooms are just tender.', 'Drain pan juices from mushrooms.', 'Place slice of ham on top of each 4 steaks.', 'Divide mushrooms evenly between steaks.', 'Sprinkle 1 tbsp of parmesan over top of each steak.', 'Place remaining veal steaks on top of each to form sandwiches.', 'Trim away any overhanging meat.', 'Melt extra butter in pan, add veal sandwiches to pan, cook until brown on one side. Carefully turn steaks and cook on other side.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Cover tops of steaks with mozzarella cheese.', 'Trim cheese to fit shape of steaks.', 'Pour in water and add crumbled stock cube.', 'Cover pan and return to heat.', 'Simmer 2 minutes or until cheese has melted.']

name: Victoria Sandwich
ingredients: ['250 g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 cup caster sugar', '4 eggs', '2 cups self-raising flour', '2 tablespoons jam']
instructions: ['You will also need icing sugar for this recipe.', 'Grease 2 deep 20cm round cake pans.', 'Cover bases with paper, grease paper.', 'Beat butter, essence and sugar in small bowl with electric mixer until mixture is light and fluffy.', 'Add eggs 1 at a time, beat well between additions.', 'Transfer to large bowl.', 'Stir in sifted flour in 2 batches.', 'Spread mixture evenly between prepared pans.', 'Bake in a moderate oven for about 25 minutes.', 'Turn cakes onto wire rack to cool.', 'Join cakes with jam.', 'Dust cake with a little sifted icing sugar.', 'This is best made on the day of serving.', 'Can freeze, do not microwave.']

name: Go Nuts About My Gingernuts
ingredients: ['90 g butter', '1/3 cup brown sugar', '1/3 cup golden syrup', '1 1/3 cups plain flour', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves']
instructions: ['combine butter, sugar and golden syrup in pan.\r', 'stir over heat until butter is melted.\r', 'remove from heat.\r', 'stir in sifted dry ingredients.\r', 'stand until mixture feels warm to the touch.\r', 'roll 2 level teaspoons of mixture into balls.\r', 'place on greased oven trays, about 3cm apart.\r', 'flatten slightly.\r', 'bake in moderate oven about 12 minutes or until browned.\r', 'loosen biscuits.\r', 'cool on trays.\r', '(can be made a week ahead, store in an airtight container, can freeze).']

name: Melting Moments
ingredients: ['125 g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '2 tablespoons icing sugar', '3/4 cup plain flour', '1/4 cup cornflour', '30 g butter', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1/2 cup icing sugar', '1 teaspoon milk, approximately ']
instructions: ['beat butter, essence and sifted icing sugar in a small bowl with electric mixer until light and fluffy.\r', 'stir in sifted flours.\r', 'spoon mixture into piping bag fitted with a 1cm fluted tube.\r', 'pipe 3cm rosettes about 3cm apart onto lightly greased over trays.\r', 'bake in a moderate oven about 10 minutes or until lightly browned.\r', 'cool on trays.\r', 'join cold biscuits with filling.\r', 'FILLING:.\r', 'beat butter, essence and sifted icing sugar in small bowl until light and fluffy.\r', 'beat in enough milk to make mixture spreadable.\r', 'can be made 2 days ahead, store in an airtight container, do not microwave, can freeze unfilled biscuits.']

name: Warm Chicken Salad Delight
ingredients: ['1 grilled chicken breast', '4 ounces organic baby mixed greens', '1/2 fresh tomato, diced ', '2 ounces sun-dried tomatoes', '2 ounces balsamic vinaigrette', '1 pinch pepper']
instructions: ['You can also add goats cheese to this to make it amazing.\r', 'but if desired it is optional.\r', 'Mix all ingredients.\r', 'Add some goat cheese on top of the salad if you have decided to do so.']

name: Pretend Soup
ingredients: ['2 cups orange juice', '1/2 cup plain yogurt', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 small banana, sliced ', "1 cup berries (any kind, fresh or frozen -- if they're frozen, defrost them first, and use all the juice it'll add)"]
instructions: ['Place the orange juice in a bowl.\r', 'Add yogurt, honey, and lemon juice.\r', 'Whisk "until it is all one color.".\r', 'Place 5 banana slices and 2 tablespoons berries in each bowl.\r', 'Ladle the soup over the berries and bananas.\r', 'Eat!\r', 'Note: You can add other kinds of fruit as well. Slices of kiwi are especially pretty.']

name: Banana Fritters
ingredients: ['1/2 cup plain flour', '1/2 cup self-raising flour', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten ', '1/2 cup milk', '1 teaspoon oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '4 large bananas, halved ']
instructions: ['you will also need, oil for deep-frying and sugar.\r', 'sift flours and castor sugar into bowl, graduallt whisk in eggs milk, oil and essence.\r', 'dip banana pieces into batter.\r', 'deep-fry in hot oil until lighly browned.\r', 'drain on absorbent paper.\r', 'toss in sugar.']

name: Cheeseburger Pie
ingredients: ['1 deep dish pie shell (4-cup volume)', '1 lb lean ground beef', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 cup all-purpose flour', '1/3 cup chopped dill pickle, chopped (or more if needed)', '1/3 cup pickle juice', '1/3 cup nestle Carnation Evaporated Milk', '8 ounces American cheese, cut into pieces divided ']
instructions: ['Pie crust is 9 inch.', 'Also mustard and ketchup is required.', 'Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Cook beef and garlic powder in large skillet, stirring frequently, until beef is no longer pink.', 'Sprinkle with flour; stir.', 'Stir in pickles, pickle juice, evaporated milk and half of cheese.', 'Spoon into pie shell.', 'Bake for 20 minutes.', 'Top with remaining cheese.', 'Bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.', 'Cool on wire rack for 5 minutes.', 'Serve with mustard and ketchup, if desired.']

name: Chocolate Cream Puffs
ingredients: ['1 cup water', '5 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into small pieces ', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1 cup all-purpose flour, sifted ', '5 eggs', '13 ounces semisweet chocolate, finely chopped ', '2 cups heavy cream', '1/4 cup sugar']
instructions: ['Preheat an oven to 400 degrees.\r', 'Butter and flour a large baking sheet.\r', 'FOR THE PASTRY PUFFS:.\r', 'In a saucepan, combine the water, butter, salt and the 1/2 teaspoon sugar and bring to a boil.\r', 'As soon as it boils, remove the pan from the heat and add the flour all at once.\r', 'Using a rubber spatula or a wooden spoon, briskly beat in the flour.\r', 'Place the saucepan over high heat and continue beating briskly for 2 minutes.\r', 'Remove from the heat again and scrape the contents of the pan into a large bowl.\r', 'Add 4 of the eggs, one at a time, beating vigorously after each addition until smooth.\r', 'Place the dough in a pastry (piping) bag with a 1/2-inch plain tip.\r', 'Pipe mounds about 2 inches in diameter and 3 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheet.\r', 'You should have 16-20 mounds in all.\r', 'In a small bowl, beat the remaining egg until well blended.\r', 'Using a pastry brush, lightly brush each mound with the egg.\r', 'Bake until the puffs are golden brown, about 30 minutes.\r', 'Transfer the puffs to a rack and let cool completely, about 30 minutes.\r', 'When the puffs are cool, slice off the top one-third of each puff.\r', 'Set the bottoms and tops aside.\r', 'FOR THE CHOCOLATE CREAM:.\r', 'Place the chocolate in the top pan of a double boiler or in a heatproof bowl over (not touching) barely simmering water in a pan.\r', 'Stir just until the chocolate melts.\r', 'then remove from the heat.\r', 'Pour the cream into a bowl.\r', 'Using an electric mixer set on high speed, beat until soft peaks form.\r', 'Add the 1/4 cup sugar and beat until stiff peaks form, about 20 seconds.\r', 'Pour all of the melted chocolate into the whipped cream as quickly as possible, and continue to mix on high speed until evenly combined, about 1 minute.\r', 'Place the chocolate cream in a clean pastry (piping) bag fitted with a 1/2-inch plain tip.\r', 'Pipe the cream into the bottoms of the cooled puffs so a little bit of the cream is exposed between the crusts.\r', 'Replace the tops on the filled bottoms and serve immediately.']

name: Stuffed Pastries from the Marches
ingredients: ['4 1/3 cups all-purpose flour', '5 egg yolks, beaten ', '1 cup butter, softened ', '1 1/4 cups sugar', ' grated lemon zest', '3 egg yolks', '1 1/4 cups sugar', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 grated lemon, zest of', '1 cup rum', '3 ounces semisweet chocolate, grated ', '3 ounces shelled almonds, ground ', '1 lb ricotta cheese']
instructions: ['FOR PASTRY:.', 'Heap the flour on a board and make a well in the center.', 'Put in the egg yolks, butter, sugar and a little lemon zest.', 'Knead quickly to obtain medium-soft dough.', 'Roll into a ball, wrap in plastic and chill for 1 hour.', 'FOR FILLING:.', 'In a bowl, beat the egg yolks (reserving a little for brushing the pastries), sugar, cinnamon, lemon zest, rum, chocolate and almonds into the ricotta.', 'The mixture should be thick.', 'Roll the dough out thinly.', 'Cut into 3 in circles.', 'Put 1 teaspoon of the filling in the center of each circle and fold the dough over into a half-moon shape, pressing with your fingers to seal the edges well.', 'Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F.', 'Put the pastries onto a buttered baking sheet and brush them with the reserved beaten egg.', 'Bake in the oven until a toothpick inserted into one of them comes out dry.', 'about 20 minutes.']

name: Vanilla Slice
ingredients: ['2 sheets premade puff pastry', '1 cup caster sugar', '3/4 cup cornflour (I always use arrowroot because it is better for you)', '1/2 cup cups custard powder', '1 liter milk (4 cups)', '60 g butter', '2 egg yolks, lightly beaten ', '2 teaspoons vanilla essence', '2 cups icing sugar', '1 teaspoon soft butter', '2 tablespoons passion fruit pulp, strained ', '2 teaspoons water, approximately ']
instructions: ['Line a 23cm square slab pan with foil, bring foil up to overlap sides of pan.', 'Place pastry sheets on lightly greased oven trays.', 'Bake in a hot oven about 6 minutes, or until well browned.', 'Cool.', 'Gently flatten pastry with hand.', 'Fit 1 pastry sheet in prepared pan.', 'Combine sugar, cornflour and custard powder in pan.', 'Gradually stir in milk. Stir until smooth.', 'Add butter and stir over heat until mixture boils and thickens.', 'Simmer, stirring, about 3 minutes or until very thick and smooth.', 'Remove from heat and stir in yolks and essence.', 'Pour hot custard over pastry in pan.', 'Top with remaining sheet of pastry, flat side up.', 'Press down slightly.', 'Cool.', 'Spread pastry with passionfruit icing.', 'Cut when set.', 'FOR THE ICING:.', 'Sift icing sugar into small heat-proof bowl.', 'Stir in butter, passionfruit juice and enough water to make a stiff paste.', 'Stir icing over hot water until spreadable.', 'Recipe can be made a day ahead.', 'Store covered in refrigerator.', 'Do not freeze or microwave.']

name: Pixie Dessert
ingredients: ['1/4 pint milk (just enough to soak bread with)', '4 slices bread', '1 egg, lightly beaten ', '1 tablespoon butter (enough to fry bread with)', '4 tablespoons honey']
instructions: ['Soften slices of dry bread (from which the crusts have been cut) in milk.\r', 'Put a little honey on each slice.\r', 'then dip in beaten egg.\r', 'fry in a little butter.\r', 'Serve hot with cream.']

name: Pea Flapjacks With Smoked Trout
ingredients: ['400 g whole smoked trout', '1/2 cup plain flour', '1/2 cup self raising flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2/3 cup buttermilk', '1/3 cup skim milk', '1/2 cup frozen peas, thawed and drained ', '1 tablespoon fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped ', '2 tablespoons fresh chives, finely chopped ', '1 egg white', '1/4 cup low-fat sour cream', '2 lebanese cucumbers', '1 small red capsicum, finely chopped ', '1/4 cup water', '1/4 cup sugar', '1/2 cup white vinegar']
instructions: ['First make the pickled cucumber.', 'Using vegetable peeler, slice cucumbers into ribbons.', 'Combine cucumber in medium bowl with capsicum.', 'Combine water and sugar in a small saucepan.', 'Stir over heat until sugar dissolves.', 'Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer uncovered about 5 minutes or until thickened slightly.', 'Add vinegar to sugar syrup.', 'Pour hot syrup over cucumber mixture.', 'Cover, refrigerate until cool (this can be made a day ahead).', 'Now make the flapjacks.', 'Remove any skin and bones from fish.', 'Break into large pieces.', 'Sift flours and soda into a large bowl.', 'Gradually whisk in combined buttermilk, skim milk, peas, parsley and half of the chives.', 'Beat egg white in small bowl with electric mixer until soft peaks form.', 'Fold egg white into batter.', 'Pour 1/3 cup of the batter for each flapjack in large heated oiled non-stick frying pan.', 'Cook in batches until lightly browned both sides.', 'Combine sour cream and remaining chives in a small bowl.', 'Serve warm flapjacks topped with fish, pickled cucumber and sour cream mixture.']

name: Apricot Tart from Above (Gluten Free_
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups walnuts', '1 1/2 cups dates', '2 cups dried apricots, sliced 1/4 inch thick ', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 cup orange juice', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon']
instructions: ['Remove pits from dates if they have them and place them in a food processor with walnuts.', 'Process until well mixed and ground, but not smooth.', 'About 40 seconds.', 'It should be a coarse texture when done.', 'Press evenly into a 9inch tart pan with about ½ inch crust around rim.', 'Set in refrigerator while making the filling.', 'Slice apricots about ¼ inch thick, and cook in a 10 inch skillet with honey, orange juice and cinnamon on medium low heat, until apricots become tender,and liquid is syrupy.', 'about 10 minutes.', 'Remove apricots and syrup from hot pan and let cool in bowl for about 1 hour so it gets fairly cool.', 'Spread evenly over crust.', 'It can be served right away or chilled.', "Make sure you store tart covered so it doesn't pick up moisture from the refrigerator."]

name: Mashed Sweet Potatoes - No Dairy
ingredients: ['2 medium sized sweet potatoes or 2 medium yams, sliced thin for quick cooking ', '2 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', ' salt', ' white pepper']
instructions: ['Bring lightly salted water to a boil in a steamer with a tight fitting lid.', 'Peel, slice and steam sweet potatoes in steamer basket, covered, for about 10 minutes or until tender.', 'When tender mash with potato masher adding rest of ingredients.']

name: Tropical Breakfast Risotto
ingredients: ['1 cup arborio rice (this is the Italian rice risotto is made with)', '2 cups water', '1 (15 ounce) can coconut milk', '1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks (save juice)', '1/4 cup sliced almonds', '1/4 cup raisins', '1 cup cubed firm banana, about 1/2 inch pieces ']
instructions: ['Bring water with rice to a boil in medium sized sauce or soup pan on high heat.', 'Once it comes to a boil, turn heat to medium low and simmer uncovered.', 'stirring frequently for creaminess.', 'While rice is cooking prepare rest of ingredients.', 'As water is absorbed in rice add pineapple juice from can and keep cooking.', 'When that is absorbed add the can of coconut milk.', 'As that gets absorbed, but while still creamy, add rest of ingredients.', 'Heat for another 2-3 minutes and serve when rice is tender.', 'This should be still juicy and creamy without being runny.', 'This is good served warm or cold.']

name: Miss Pixie Drops in Some Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup Crisco', '2 cups white sugar', '2 eggs, beaten ', '1/2 cup milk', '3 1/2 cups flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
instructions: ['Mix as you would any cookies dough.\r', 'bake for 12-15 minutes in a moderate oven.\r', 'Add 2 tablespoons more milk if making drop cookies.\r', 'Substitute 1/4 cup cocoa for flour to make chocolate cookies.']

name: Hot Polenta Breakfast With Dried Fruit Compote - Non-Dairy
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups fresh orange juice', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon finely minced lemon zest', '1/4 cup honey', '3/4 cup walnuts, coarsely chopped ', '15 pitted prunes', '10 dried apricots, cut in half ', '1/4 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup polenta', '4 cups lightly salt water']
instructions: ['Combine the orange juice, lemon juice, zest, cinnamon and honey in a medium sized saucepan and stir.', 'Bring to a simmer on high heat and add prunes, and apricots.', 'Turn the heat to lowest level.', "Simmer gently for about 10 minutes. Don't let prunes get too soggy.", 'While prunes are simmering start cooking polenta by bringing lightly salted water to a boil in a medium saucepan.', 'Add polenta to boiling water slowly stirring constantly.', "Reduce heat to low and cook for about 15 minutes stirring to make sure it doesn't get lumpy.", 'If it starts to get too thick add a little more hot water. You want it soft.', 'Remove fruit from sauce with a slotted spoon to a shallow bowl and turn the heat to high.', 'Reduce the liquid to about half.', 'Return fruit and add walnuts to sauce and serve over bowl of polenta.']

name: Blackberry Tart Sent by Angels
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups walnuts', '1 1/2 cups dates', '5 cups fresh blackberries or 5 cups frozen blackberries', '3 tablespoons honey', '1 1/2 tablespoons arrowroot', '2 tablespoons water (or juice from frozen berries)']
instructions: ['Combine walnuts and pitted dates in a food processor.', 'Process until well mixed and ground, but not smooth.', 'About 40 seconds. It should be a coarse texture when done.', 'Press into a 9 inch tart pan.', 'Set in refrigerator while making the filling.', 'If you are using frozen blackberries make sure they are completely thawed.', 'If not, they will dilute the filling as they thaw and make it runny.', 'Place 2 cups of the berries along with the arrowroot and water, or juice in a blender.', 'Blend into a puree.', 'Place in a small saucepan along with honey and cook puree over medium heat stirring constantly for about 3-4 minutes.', 'It should lose its cloudiness and thicken.', 'When it thickens and the cloudiness is gone remove from heat.', 'Mix with rest of the blackberries and fill tart shell.', 'Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.', "Make sure it is covered so it doesn't pick up moisture from the refrigerator."]

name: Morning Power Smoothie
ingredients: ['4 large strawberries', '1/4 cup low-fat plain yogurt', '1 cup fresh orange juice', '1 tablespoon tahini', '1 medium size banana', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '1 tablespoon honey']
instructions: ['Remove stems from strawberries and wash.\r', 'Blend all ingredients in blender.\r', 'until smooth.\r', 'serve.']

name: Swiss Breakfast
ingredients: ['4 cups oats', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 cup raisins', '1/2 cup sliced almonds', '1/2 cup dried apricot, chopped ', '1/2 cup sunflower seeds', '4 chopped dates', '1/4 cup dried cranberries']
instructions: ['Mix all ingredients together.\r', 'The above amount of ingredients will make about 8 servings.\r', "This can be kept so it's ready for future use.\r", 'For 2 servings bring 2 cups water to a boil.\r', 'Add 1 ¼ cups Swiss Breakfast.\r', 'Turn heat to low and cook uncovered.\r', 'stirring occasionally until water is absorbed, about 7 minutes.\r', 'Cover, and set for about 2 minutes before serving.\r', 'Serve with a touch of low fat milk or unsweetened soy milk.\r', "or you can just add milk and eat straight away if you don't have time to cook."]

name: Pixie Butter
ingredients: ['2 hard boiled egg yolks', '1 cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '1 cup unsalted butter']
instructions: ['In a medium sized bowl combine the hard boiled egg yolks, white sugar, orange juice and unsalted butter.\r', 'Blend until well mixed.\r', 'place small mounds on the bread plates.']

name: Slush
ingredients: ['1 cup apple, diced ', '1 cup peach, diced ', '1 cup strawberry', '3 cups fruit juice (your choice)', '1 banana, diced ', ' ice cube']
instructions: ['Place all ingredients into a blender.', 'mix.', 'Serve.', 'or.', 'chill for 1 hour to make a slush.']

name: Pixie Rain
ingredients: ['2 cups strawberries (Fresh)', '2 cups vanilla ice cream', '2 cups sparkling water', '1 cup pineapple, Diced ']
instructions: ['Blend until smooth.\r', 'Serve chilled in rocks glasses.\r', 'put in some straws.\r', 'and enjoy.']

name: Candy from Miss Pixie
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 cup light corn syrup', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons baking soda', '1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate or 1 (12 ounce) package milk chocolate, 1 piece, melted ']
instructions: ['Grease 13-by-9-inch pan; set aside.\r', 'Combine sugar, syrup and vinegar in 3-quart saucepan.\r', 'Cook, stirring constantly so candy does not scorch, and until mixture reaches hard crack stage, 300 degrees.\r', 'At this point, mixture will become foamy and will rise.\r', 'If you continue to cook any longer after this point, candy will become hard.\r', 'Remove from heat; quickly add baking soda, mixing with a few fast strokes, as it is added.\r', 'Baking soda must be stirred rapidly into mixture as it is added.\r', 'Immediately pour mixture into prepared pan.\r', 'If candy is left in saucepan for even a short time, it will stick.\r', 'It is not necessary to spread candy over bottom of pan.\r', 'Cool, then break into small pieces.\r', 'Dip each piece into melted chocolate.\r', 'Store in refrigerator.\r', 'Makes about 1 pound candy.\r', 'Note: Candy should be a light caramel color. It should be slightly puffy, even puffier than a Butterfinger candy bar but not as flaky. This is more airy. If you can, use VERY GOOD milk chocolate to cover it.']

name: Food for Pixie's
ingredients: ['30 large marshmallows', '1/2 cup milk', '200 g crushed pineapple (not 200g, just 1 can)', '8 ounces whipping cream, whipped ', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1/2 cup chopped nuts', '0.5 (200 g) box vanilla wafers']
instructions: ['Combine marshmallows and milk in a microwave safe bowl.\r', 'Microwave until all the marshmallows are melted - watch carefully - then let cool.\r', 'Blend in pineapple (do not drain), whipped cream, lemon juice and nuts.\r', 'Crush vanilla wafers and sprinkle in a 9 x 12 square buttered pyrex dish.\r', 'Reserve some crumbs to sprinkle on top.\r', 'Pour in filling.\r', 'Garnish with extra wafer crumbs.\r', 'Chill thoroughly and serve.']

name: Pixie Pancakes With Pixie Dust
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1 tablespoon cold-pressed vegetable oil', '1 3/4 cups soymilk', '1/4 cup dried coconut, grated ', '1/4 cup date sugar']
instructions: ['First make the Pixie Dust.\r', 'Mix the coconut and date sugar in a mortar and pestle and grind into a fine powder.\r', 'Combine dry ingredients into a mixing bowl.\r', 'Combine oil land soy milk and whip for 1 minute.\r', 'Pour into dry mixture and mix until thoroughly combines.\r', "Don't worry about the lumps.\r", 'Preheat a lightly oiled griddle or large skillet.\r', 'When a few drops of water sprinkled on the griddle bead up and roll off, the griddle is ready.\r', 'Pour 1/4 cup of batter at a time onto the griddle.\r', 'Cook at medium high heat until the pancakes begin to bubble, about 3 minutes, and the bottoms are lightly browned.\r', 'If the pancakes bubble up before the bottoms are browned, raise the heat slightly.\r', 'Turn with a spatula and cook until the second side is lightly browned.\r', 'Serve at once with Pixie Dust.']

name: Nutty Pixie Cookies to Fly Away With
ingredients: ['1 cup butter', '5 tablespoons powdered sugar', '2 cups flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '1 1/2 cups chopped nuts']
instructions: ['Cream butter and sugar.\r', 'Work flour, vannila and nuts into creamed mixture.\r', 'form into balls.\r', 'Bake in 350 degrees F oven for 30 minutes.\r', 'Roll cookies into powdered sugar as soon as they are removed from oven.']

name: Pixie Ambrosia
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups milk', '1/8 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 dash cinnamon', '1 slice lemon']
instructions: ["Warm the milk, but don't boil.", 'Pour into a mug and stir in the honey and vanilla.', 'Squeeze a few drops of the lemon slice into the mixture or just drop the whole thing inches.', 'Sprinkle the cinnamon on top and enjoy.']

name: Pixie Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup powdered sugar', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup margarine', '1 cup vegetable oil', '2 eggs, beaten ', '1 teaspoon vanilla or 1 teaspoon almond flavoring', '4 1/2 cups flour, plus ', '2 tablespoons flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon cream of tartar']
instructions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Chill dough and roll into balls.', 'Press down with fork or glass.', 'Nuts or fruits may be added before chilling dough.', 'Bake at 370 degrees F for 12 minutes.', 'Should be light brown.']

name: Hawaiian Melt
ingredients: ['2 English muffins, split in half ', '150 g ham, sliced ', '4 canned pineapple rings, drained ', '4 slices cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['Preheat grill to medium high.\r', 'Toast muffins until golden brown.\r', 'Top toasted muffin halves with ham, pineapple and cheese.\r', 'Transfer muffins to an oven tray.\r', 'place under preheated grill.\r', 'cooking until cheese has melted.']

name: Baked Bean Boats
ingredients: ['1 -2 French bread (sticks)', '420 g baked beans', '100 g finely sliced brooks italiano salami', '2 tomatoes, diced ', '4 spring onions, finely sliced ', '1/2 cup mainland mild cheese, grated ']
instructions: ['Slice the French sticks into 6-8 even sized pieces and hollow out like a boat leaving a 3 cm border around the edges.', 'Fan bake at 180oC for 5 minutes until warm.', 'Mix together the Baked Beans with the Brooks Italiano Salami, spring onions and tomatoes.', 'Fill the boats evenly with the filling and sprinkle with the grated Mainland Mild Cheese.', 'Fan bake at 180oC for 10-12 minutes.']

name: Orange Carrots and Kumara
ingredients: ['1 lb kumara, peeled (sweet potatoes)', '1/2 ounce butter', '6 fluid ounces orange juice', '1 piece gingerroot, peeled,grated and juice squeezed out (approx 1 inch)', '1/2 grated orange, zest of', '1 lb carrot, peeled and julienned ', ' salt', ' freshly ground black pepper', ' chopped parsley (, to garnish)']
instructions: ['Parboil the kumara in boiling lightly salted water for 10 minutes, then drain and cube.', 'Melt butter in a saucepan, add orange juice, ginger juice, orange zest, kumara and carrots.', 'Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover pan and simmer for 10 minutes, until vegetables are tender.', 'Remove the lid, turn up heat and boil the liquid in the pan until syrupy,stirring frequently.', 'Season to taste.', 'Transfer glazed vegetables to a warm serving dish and sprinkle with chopped parsley.']

name: Extraordinary Fruit Salad Smoothie
ingredients: ['410 g fruit salad, in clear fruit juice ', '1 cup whole milk', '1 cup fruit yogurt', '1 banana, peeled and sliced ']
instructions: ['Put all ingredients.', 'into a blender or food processor.', 'and blend until smooth.', 'enjoy.']

name: Irresistible Breakfast Sandwiches
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1/2-3/4 cup milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '8 slices toast bread', '250 g mainland tasty cheese', "420 g spaghetti, prefrably Wattie's ", '4 slices ham or 100 g sliced salami', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (to season) or 1/4 teaspoon Mexican chili powder (to season)']
instructions: ['Beat the eggs, milk, black pepper and cayenne pepper together.', 'Place 4 slices of bread on a board and top with the Mainland Tasty Cheese.', 'Spread over equal amounts of Spaghetti and then top with slices of ham or salami.', 'Top with the remaining bread slices to make sandwiches.', 'Heat a knob of butter in a frying pan and when hot, dip one sandwich into the egg mixture quickly to coat both sides.', 'Place into the hot frying pan and cook over a moderate heat for about 2 minutes until golden.', 'Flip and cook the other side until the sandwich is hot and golden.', 'Cook the remaining sandwiches and serve hot.', 'These Breakfast Sandwiches will cook in a sandwich maker.']

name: Spaghetti and Cheese Pies
ingredients: ['8 slices toast ed white bread, crusts removed ', '2 tablespoons butter, for spreading ', "420 g spaghetti, prefrably Wattie's ", '8 slices mainland tasty cheese']
instructions: ['Spread one side of each bread slice with butter and place buttered side down in 8 muffin tins.', 'Bake at 180ºC until the bread cases are crispy.', "Line each case with a Mainland Tasty Cheese Slice and fill with Spaghetti (if your in new zealand, Wattie's is the best).", 'Return to the oven for 15 minutes until the spaghetti is hot and the cheese has melted', 'Garnish if wished with chopped herbs or a little Mainland grated cheese.']

name: Blackberry Fluff
ingredients: ['300 g blackberries', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '250 g mascarpone', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '142 ml double cream']
instructions: ['heat the blackberries (keeping a few aside) gently with the sugar for a couple of minutes or until they give off juice.\r', 'whizz in a food processor.\r', 'then push through a fine sieve.\r', 'beat the mascarpone with a spoon until it is floppy.\r', 'then fold in the blackberry puree and the vanilla etract.\r', 'loosely whip the cream and fold it in.\r', 'spoon into 4 dishes and decorate with blackberries.']

name: Chocolate Crinkle Cookies
ingredients: ['175 g chocolate, chopped ', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter', '175 g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 eggs, at room temperature ', '150 g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '60 g icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
instructions: ['heat oven to 160 degrees.\r', 'melt chocolate and butter over a small pan of simmering water or in a microwave until smooth.\r', 'cool slightly.\r', 'in a seperate bowl, mix flour, baking powder and salt.\r', 'beat eggs and sugar with electric mixture until pale, about 2 minutes.\r', 'reduce speed and add chocolate mix and vanilla extract.\r', 'add flour mixture until blended together.\r', 'cover bowl and put in fridge for 1 1/2 hours, or even up to 2 days.\r', 'put icing sugar in a small bowl.\r', 'shape the dough into 4cm balls and roll in the sugar.\r', 'put them on baking sheets lined with baking paper and press down lightly with your hand to flatten.\r', 'bake for 12-15 minutes for soft centres and set edges.\r', 'let cool on a baking sheets for 5 minutes.\r', 'turn on to wire rack to cool.']

name: Vanilla and Boysenberry Ice Cream Cake
ingredients: ['1 liter vanilla ice cream', '300 ml cream', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '425 g boysenberries in syrup, drained ', '1/2 cup chocolate chips', '2 tablespoons cocoa, for dusting ']
instructions: ['Spread half the vanilla ice cream into the base of 23cm loose bottom cake tin.', 'Place in the freezer.', 'Place the remaining ice cream back into the freezer.', 'Whip the cream and icing sugar together until very thick.', 'fold in the Boysenberries and chocolate chips.', 'Spread the boysenberries cream over the base of the ice cream in the cake tin.', 'Return to the freezer for two hours.', 'Spread the remaining tip top vanilla ice cream over the boysenberry cream and return to the freezer for at least six hours and preferable overnight.', 'To serve warm a cloth and run around the outside of the cake tin.', 'Remove the sides of the cake tin and place the ice cream cake onto a serving plate.', 'Dust with cocoa and cut into wedges to serve.']

name: Bug Juice Smoothies
ingredients: ['4 cups non-fat vanilla yogurt', '4 medium bananas, cut into chunks ', '2 cups frozen strawberries', '2 cups orange juice']
instructions: ['Place half of each ingredient in blender.', 'Cover and blend on high speed about 30 seconds or until smooth.', 'Pour into 4 glasses.', 'Repeat with remaining ingredients.', 'Pour into remaining 4 glasses.', 'Serve immediately.']

name: Classic Sloppy Joes
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 small onion, chopped ', '1/3 cup green pepper, chopped ', '1 lb lean ground beef', '1 1/2 cups Heinz ketchup', '1 tablespoon heinz Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', ' salt and pepper', '8 sandwich buns']
instructions: ['Heat oil in a large frying pan set over medium-high heat.', 'Sauté onions and green pepper for 5 minutes.', 'Add beef to the pan.', 'Cook, stirring until browned, about 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Drain off fat.', 'Stir in ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, salt and pepper.', 'Simmer over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until slightly thickened.', 'Serve on sandwich buns.']

name: New Zealand Pasties
ingredients: ['8 ounces flour', '2 ounces Crisco', '2 ounces butter or 2 ounces margarine', '1 pinch salt', '2 -3 tablespoons water', '4 ounces finely diced raw potatoes', '4 ounces ground beef', '2 ounces chopped onions', '2 ounces finely diced raw carrots', '1 ounce green peas (optional)']
instructions: ['Sift together flour and salt. Cut in Crisco and butter until a sandy texture is reached.\r', 'Make a hollow in the middle and add water.\r', 'Mix to make pastry, handling as little and lightly as possible.\r', 'Wrap in greeseproof paper and refrigerate for 24 hours. \r', 'Roll out pastry to approx 1/8" thick, and cut into 5" rounds.\r', "Moisten the filling with a little water and place a generous spoonful in the middle of each round, making sure it's in a pile and not flattened out.\r", 'moisten edges with beaten egg, fold in half and flute the edges to seal.\r', 'Brush pasties with beaten egg and bake 275F for 45 minutes to 1 hour until nicely browned.']

name: Watercress Soup
ingredients: ['1 ounce butter', '1 shallots or 1 onion', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '1 cucumber, grated ', '1/2 pint chicken stock', '6 ounces watercress', '8 ounces Greek yogurt']
instructions: ['melt butter.\r', 'add onion and garlic and cook until softned.\r', 'add cucumber and stock.\r', 'remove stalks from watercress and add leaves to pan and cook for about 4 minutes.\r', 'cool.\r', 'liquidize the soup and pour a small amount over the yoghurt.\r', 'return to the pan and re-heat.\r', 'do not allow to boil or youghurt will curdle.\r', 'sometimes i add a small potatoe at the beggining of the cooking.']

name: Tropical Energy Smoothie
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons tahini', '1 medium size ripe banana', '1 cup low-fat plain yogurt', '1 -1 1/2 cup pineapple juice', '1 medium papaya']
instructions: ['Scoop out meat from papaya with spoon.\r', 'place in blender with rest of ingredients.\r', 'Blend until smooth.']

name: Mushroom Waldorf Salad, 106cals Per Serve
ingredients: ['3 portabella mushrooms, thinly sliced ', '1 medium apple, cut into chunks and coated with lemon juice ', '2 celery ribs, cut into matchsticks ', '1/4 cup walnuts, in pieces ', '1 bunch watercress', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon thick yogurt', '1/2 teaspoon herb flavoured mustard', '1/2 teaspoon lemon juice', ' salt and pepper, to taste ']
instructions: ['Place the mushrooms, apples, celery and walnuts in a bowl. Combine all the ingredients for the dressing and mix gently with the vegetable. Arrange the watercress on a glat dish or platter and mound the salad mixture on the top.', 'Variation: A medium bulb of fennel, finely sliced, could be used in place of the celery.']

name: Banoffee Shortbread
ingredients: ['175 g butter, room temperature ', '75 g caster sugar', '250 g plain flour, plus extra for dusting ', '110 g butter', '110 g light muscovado sugar', '1 (397 g) tin condensed milk', '1 large firm but ripe banana', '1 (200 g) bar luxury chocolate']
