instructions: ['You will also need 30cm x 20cm swiss-roll tin.\r', 'pre-heat oven to 180 degrees.\r', 'slice butter into a food processor bowl and add the sugar.\r', 'whiz until soft and light and well creamed.\r', 'add the flour and process again, using the pulse switch until dough clings together in coarse crumbs.\r', 'turn mixture into prepared swiss-roll tin and spread out with spatula.\r', 'press all over with floured knuckles to form an even base.\r', 'prick with a fork.\r', 'bake for 15 minutes or until light golden and firm to the touch.\r', 'let shortbread base cool in the baking tin.\r', 'filling:.\r', 'put butter, sugar and condensed milk into a saucepan.\r', 'stir over a low heat until butter has melted and sugar has dissolved.\r', 'then bring mixture to the boil.\r', 'stirring constantly because it will catch easily.\r', 'cook the mixture for 5-10 minutes until it forms a golden caramel.\r', 'then dip the base of the pan into cold water to stop it cooking any longer.\r', 'slice banana into 5mm slices.\r', 'let the caramel cool slightly then stir in banana pieces.\r', 'pour caramel over the shortbread.\r', 'spread it out and level it with a spatula.\r', 'set aside for about an hour to cool set and firm.\r', 'to finish:.\r', 'place the chocolate in a bowl set over a saucepan of hot but not boiling water, making sure that the base of the bowl does not touch the water.\r', 'sllow chocolate to melt.\r', 'when it has melted, quickly pour over caramel shortbread in the tin and spread it out evenly with a spatula.\r', 'chill in fridge until chocolate sets firm.\r', 'cut into shortbread squares and store in plastic container in a cool place.']

name: Hot White Chocolate!!!
ingredients: ['1/4 lb white chocolate', '1/4 cup brandy or 1/4 cup rum', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 egg yolks', '1 pint milk']
instructions: ['place chocolate, brandy and vanilla in a heatproof bowl over a boiling pan, place over medium heat and cook until chocolate is melted.\r', 'remove from heat, but leave melted chocolate in the bowl.\r', 'add yolks and mix until incorporated.\r', 'meanwhile, place milk in a small pot over medium heat and scald it.\r', 'immediately remove from heat and slowly pour over the melted chocolate, stirring constantly.\r', 'pour into mugs and serve immediately.']

name: Nutty Portabella Mushrooms, 540cals Per Serve
ingredients: ['6 large portabella mushrooms', '1/2 teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning', '1 cup pistachios, finely chopped ', '1 cup almonds, finely chopped ', '1 cup hazelnuts, finely chopped ', '6 white button mushrooms, finely chopped, medium ', '1 cup black olives, sliced ', '1 lemon, juice and zest of', '2 tablespoons white breadcrumbs, dried ', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground pepper', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds', '1/2 cup parmesan cheese, shaved ']
instructions: ['Using a damp paper towel wipe mushrooms.', 'Place into a lightly oiled baking dish. Season with salt and a generous sprinkling of lemon pepper. Set aside.', 'Using a non-stick pan, dry toast pistachios, almonds and hazelnuts until golden (approx 10 mins). Stir continuously. Remove from heat. Add white buttons, olives, lemon zest, juice, breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, oil and egg. Mix well.', 'Divide mixture into 6. Carefully mould a portion over each portabello mushroom, covering gills completely. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and shaved parmesan. Drizzle a little olive oil over each mushroom.', 'Bake at 180c for 20 minutes or until tender. Lemon wedges and a sprig of parsley make a good garnish.']

name: Simpe Chocolate Delight Cake
ingredients: ['175 g chocolate chip cookies, crushed ', '50 g butter, melted ', '2 (47 g) chocolate, angel delight ', '450 ml milk']
instructions: ['mix the crushed cookies with melted butter.\r', 'press into a 18cm spring-release cake tin.\r', 'whisk angel delight with milk.\r', 'pour into tin and chill.\r', 'sprinkle with chocolate chips and grated white chocolate.']

name: Raspberry Fool
ingredients: ['10 ounces raspberries', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 ounce caster sugar', '150 ml double cream', '5 ounces fromage frais']
instructions: ['Set aside 8 raspberries.', 'Crush the rest with a fork, leaving them a little lumpy.', 'Stir in lemon juice and sugar.', 'Pour double cream into another bowl and beat it with a whisk until it has thickened.', 'Fold in the fromage frais and cream gently into the raspberries.', 'Spoon the fool into 4 ramekins.']

name: Chocolate, Banana and Marshmallow Brioche Toastie
ingredients: ['400 g brioche bread, loaf you will need 8 slices ', '2 ripe bananas, peeled and thinly sliced ', '110 g dark chocolate, roughly grated ', '110 g miniature marshmallows']
instructions: ['pre-heat the grill to medium-high.\r', 'toast both sides of the brioche slices until lightly golden, be careful as this type of bread toasts very quickly.\r', 'place slices of banana on top of each of 4 slices of the brioche and top with grated chocolate followed by a layer of marshmallows.\r', 'place them under the grill and gently cook until marshmallows begin to melt and turn a golden colour and chocolate has melted.\r', 'top with remaining 4 slices of brioche and press down for the untimate indulgence.']

name: Coffee Meringue With Cream & Summer Fruits
ingredients: ['75 g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons instant coffee powder, tsps ', '4 egg whites', '125 g caster sugar', '425 ml double cream', '450 g summer fruit']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 140 degrees.\r', 'begin by sifting the icing sugar and the coffee powder together.\r', 'in a seperate bowl, whisk egg whites on high speed until start to stiffen.\r', 'slowly add caster sugar while still whisking.\r', 'turn of machine.\r', 'vigerously beat in the sifted icing sugar and coffee powder using a slotted spoon.\r', 'spoon mixture onto center of a lined baking sheet and then using a palette knife, spread a circle roughly 28cms in diameter and about 2cm thick.\r', 'place into center of pre-heated oven and cook for about 1-1 1/2 hours.\r', 'by which time the meringue should look cracked on the top and still a litle soft in the center.\r', 'remove from the oven.\r', 'carefully lift off paper and set to wire rack to cool.\r', 'when ready to serve.\r', 'whisk cream until it just holds and then spread loosely over the top of the meringue.\r', 'scatter the summer fruits of your choice liberally over the top of the cream, and cut into slices.']

name: Amazing Triple Chip Brownies
ingredients: ['16 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened ', '2 cups sugar', '8 ounces bittersweet chocolate, melted and slightly cooled ', '2 teaspoons vanilla essence', '4 eggs', '1 cup unbleached all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup walnuts, chopped ', '2 cups semisweet chocolate', '2 cups milk chocolate', '2 cups butterscotch chips']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Line an 8 3/4 x 13 1/2-inch glass or metal pan with a large piece of aluminum foil, smoothing it into the corners.', 'Butter the foil with extra butter.', 'In a large bowl, cream butter with the sugar.', 'Stir in melted chocolate.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Then add eggs, beating until blended.', 'In another bowl, combine flour and salt.', 'Add walnuts and all the bits into the bowl.', 'Scrape the flour, nuts and bits into the butter bowl, and stir with a wooden spoon just until all the ingredients are mixed.', 'Do not overbeat.', 'Scrape batter into prepared pan, holding the foil so that it does not move.', 'Place the pan in the middle of the oven and bake until toothpick inserted to in the center comes out clean--about 50 minutes.', 'Remove pan and let it stand for 1 hour.', 'Then cover the pan with foil and place it in your freezer for at least 1- 1 1/2 hours or in your refrigerator overnight.', 'Turn the cooled brownies out onto clean workspace, lift off the foil and cut into 32 squares.', 'Store in fridge or the freezer in an airtight tin.']

name: Marshmallow Brownies
ingredients: ['1 cup butterscotch chips', '1/2 cup butter', '1 1/2 cups flour', '2/3 cup packed brown sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '2 eggs', '2 cups miniature marshmallows', '2 cups milk chocolate chips']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 350 degrees.\r', 'lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking pan.\r', 'melt butterscotch morsels and margarine in a large bowl in microwave.\r', 'stir the mixture well and let it cool to lukewarm.\r', 'while the liquid mixture is cooling, mix flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla and eggs into the butterscotch mixture.\r', 'mix well.\r', 'fold in marshmallows and chocolate morsels.\r', 'spread batter into pan.\r', 'bake 25 minutes.\r', 'be careful not to overcook.']

name: Apricot Slice by My Granny
ingredients: ['4 ounces butter', '0.5 (375 g) can sweetened condensed milk', '3 ounces brown sugar', '1/2 lb minced apricot', '1 (375 g) packet wie biscuits, crushed ', '2 teaspoons coconut']
instructions: ['melt butter.', 'add rest of ingredients.', 'put in greased tin.', 'sprinkle with coconut.']

name: Seventh Heaven Curried Sausage Rolls
ingredients: ['1 lb sausage meat', '1 apple, chopped ', '1 onion, chopped ', '4 tablespoons parsley', '1 1/2 cups cooked rice', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (375 g) packet flaky pastry dough or 1 (375 g) packet phyllo pastry']
instructions: ['Mix all 1st ingredients.', 'add pepper to taste.', 'roll into two rolls and cover with.', '1 packet flaky pastry or wrap on filo pastry.', 'cook at 350 degrees for 1 hour.']

name: Chickpea, Fish and Olive Stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, halved, thinly sliced ', '2 garlic cloves, thinly sliced ', '100 ml dry white wine', '2 fresh bay leaves', '800 g whole canned tomatoes', '400 g chickpeas, rinsed, drained ', '1/4 cup small black olives', '200 ml water', ' salt and pepper, to taste ', '600 g firm skinless white fish fillets', '1/2 cup flat leaf parsley, finely shredded ']
instructions: ['Heat oil in a large deep frypan and cook onion over medium-low heat, stirring, for 5 minutes or until soft but not coloured.\r', 'Add garlic, wine and bay leaves. \r', 'Increase heat to medium, allowing the wine to simmer and reduce for 2-3 minutes.\r', 'Add the tomatoes, chickpeas, olives and water, and simmer gently for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up tomatoes.\r', 'Season to taste with salt and pepper.\r', 'Cut the fish into bite-sized chunks, slip into the stew and simmer gently for 6-8 minutes until it starts to flake.\r', 'Stir in parsley and spoon among bowls to serve.']

name: Toffee Bananas With Custard
ingredients: ['85 g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 banana, sliced ', '150 ml double cream', '150 ml milk', '3 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
instructions: ['Heat the sugar in a pan until dissolved and a caramel has formed.\r', 'add butter, to form a toffee sauce.\r', 'add the banana to the pan and shake to coat in toffee.\r', 'heat 1-2 minutes.\r', 'Custard:.\r', 'heat the cream and milk in a pan until just coming to the boil.\r', 'remove from heat.\r', 'whisk egg yolks and sugar in a large bowl to combine.\r', 'gradually pour the hot milk in, whisking constantly.\r', 'return the mixture to the pan, stirring constantly.\r', 'gently warm the custard through until thickened.\r', 'spoon the toffee bananas onto a serving plate and pour custard over.\r', 'serve.']

name: Marvelous Marble Cake
ingredients: ['180 g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '3/4 cup caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 1/2 cups self raising flour', '1/2 cup milk', ' pink food coloring', '2 tablespoons cocoa', '1 tablespoon milk', '90 g butter', '1 cup icing sugar', '1 1/2 tablespoons milk', ' pink food coloring']
instructions: ['lightly grease 20cm ring pan, cover with grease paper.', 'beat butter, essence and caster sugar in a small bowl with an electiric mixer until light and fluffy.', 'add eggs.', 'beating well.', 'transfer to a large bowl and fold in sifted flour and milk in 2 batches.', 'divide mixture evenly between 3 bowls.', '1st bowl:.', 'tint mixture pink.', '2nd bowl:.', 'stir sifted cocoa and extra milk.', '3rd bowl:.', 'add extra milk.', 'drop spoonfools of each mixture into pan.', 'run knife through to give a marbled effect.', 'bake in a moderate oven for about 40 minutes.', 'stand 5 minutes.', 'turn onto cooling rack.', 'icing:.', 'beat butter with electric mixer until as white as possible.', 'beat in sifted icing sugar and milk in 2 batches.', 'divide mixture into 2 bowls.', 'tinting one pink.', 'drop spoonfools of each onto cake, use spatula to give marbled effect.']

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies/Sante Biscuits
ingredients: ['90 g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1/3 cup caster sugar', '1/3 cup brown sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 cup self raising flour', '3/4 cup plain flour', '3/4 cup chocolate chips', '1/2 cup chopped pecans or 1/2 cup walnuts', '1 tablespoon milk']
instructions: ['beat butter, essence and sugars in a small bowl until light and fluffy with an electric mixer.', 'beat in egg.', 'stir in sifted flours, choc chips, nuts and milk.', 'drop level tsps of mixture onto lightly greased trays.', 'press with a fork lightly.', 'bake for 12 minutes.', 'stand 5 minutes.', 'turn onto rack to cool.']

name: Miss Pixie Tempts You With Snowballs
ingredients: ['1 ounce butter, melted ', '1 teaspoon cocoa', '1 cup coconut', '1 cup icing sugar', '1 cup sultana', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla essence']
instructions: ['After melting the butter, mix in all ingredients.', 'Roll into small balls then in coconut.', 'Keep in fridge, let set for a while.', '• Or you could try leaving out the cocoa and put in 1/2 cup dried apricots and 1/2 cup sultanas.']

name: Desirable Raisin Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup self raising flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 cup sugar', '45 g butter', '1 cup raisins', '1 lemon, rind of, finely grated ', '1/2 cup milk', '2 cups boiling water', '1 cup brown sugar', '65 g butter']
instructions: ['sift flour and salt together with sugar.', 'lightly rub in butter with raisins and lemon rind.', 'add milk.', 'mix.', 'spread out evenly in a greased 20cm x 20cm ovenproof dish.', 'put to the side.', 'put boiling water, sugar and butter in saucepan and heat until butter melts.', 'spoon over the contents of the dish.', 'bake at 180 degrees for about 45-60 minutes.', 'serve while hot.', 'can be served with cream and custard if desired.']

name: Outrageous Tuna Sarnies
ingredients: ['2 (213 g) cans tuna in water (large cans)', '2 braeburn apples or 2 gala apples', '3 stalks celery', '1 small red onion', '1 cup raisins', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1/2 cup sweet pickle relish', '1/2 cup Ritz cracker']
instructions: ['Chop apples and celery quickly and mince the onion.', 'Add raisins and mix.', 'Strain tuna.', 'Stir in 1 can loosely.', 'Add mayonnaise and relish to taste.', 'Next take tuna and crumble crackers in using a food processor.', 'Add to mixture.', 'Serve on pita bread or in sandwiches or even on crackers.']

name: Lucy's Avocado & Bacon Muffins
ingredients: ['3 slices cooked bacon, finely chopped ', '75 g butter, melted ', '1 cup milk', '2 cups self raising flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon sugar', '4 tablespoons cayenne pepper', '1 cup grated tasty cheese', '4 spring onions, chopped ', '1 avocado, chopped in 1cm cubes and sprinkled with the juice of a lemon ']
instructions: ['take melted butter, egg and milk and beat until combined.', 'sift in dry ingredients.', 'add grated cheese, chopped spring onions and avacado.', 'pour in milk mixture to dry ingredients with bacon.', 'mix well.', 'spoon into well-sprayed deep muffin tins.', 'bake at about 200 degrees for about 10 minutes or until firm in the middle.']

name: Low-Cal Citrus Baked Pork
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 (400 g) packages thin-cut lean pork loin steaks', '1 lemon, thinly sliced ', '6 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves', '150 ml white wine', '150 ml rich pork stock']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 200°C.', 'Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large frying pan.', 'Cook the pork steaks in batches over a high heat for 1 minute on each side until lightly browned.', 'Remove from frying pan.', 'Drain on kitchen paper.', 'Arrange pork steaks, lemon and lime slices and thyme leaves in a shallow, ovenproof dish.', 'Drizzle the remaining olive oil, season generously.', 'Mix the white wine and stock.', 'Pour into the dish.', 'Bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes.', 'When the pork is tender and cooked through.', 'Serve with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables, or salad if preferred.']

name: Miss Pixie's Salmon, Spinach & Mozzarella in Pastry
ingredients: ['1 1/4 kg skinned and boned fresh salmon, 1 side ', '1/2 teaspoon salt & freshly ground black pepper', '500 g spinach', '100 g fresh mozzarella cheese or 100 g bocconcini', '200 g fresh ricotta cheese', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onions', '2 tablespoons chopped chives', '1 egg', '800 g puff pastry', '1 egg, for glazing ']
instructions: ['Season the salmon with salt and pepper, and cut into 2 pieces down the middle lengthwise. Set aside.', 'Wash the spinach carefully to release any dirt, then cook in a small amount of salted water until it wilts.', 'Refresh under cold water; drain thoroughly. Chop very finely and place in a mixing bowl.', 'Chop the mozzarella into tiny pieces and add to the spinach with the ricotta, salt and pepper, nutmeg, spring onion and chives.', 'Mix well and add the beaten egg.', 'Roll out half the pastry into a rectangle about 6cm larger than the salmon, on all sides. Place this on a baking sheet.', 'Spread half the spinach and cheese mixture in the centre of the pastry, so that it covers about two-thirds of the area, leaving a strip of about 6cm on all sides.', 'Place the salmon in the centre, side by side, topping and tailing the two pieces so that the shape of the salmon roughly equates to an oblong.', 'Sprinkle over extra salt and pepper.', 'Carefully spread the remaining spinach and cheese mixture over the salmon.', 'Roll out the remaining pastry, and place this on top, pulling the extra pastry from the base up, brushed with the extra beaten egg.', 'Seal the top piece of pastry to the base with egg so it will remain closed and form a neat parcel.', 'Use any trimmings to decorate the top.', 'Completely brush the parcel with the remaining egg.', 'Return to the refrigerator for at least half an hour.', 'Bake at 200 degrees for about 15 minutes until the pastry is crisp and golden, and the salmon is cooked.', 'serve hot or cold.']

name: Blue Mountain Milk Shake
ingredients: ['2 cups vanilla ice cream', '2 cups milk', '1 cup vanilla yogurt', '2 large bananas', '1 -1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 drops blue food coloring']
instructions: ['Blend all ingredients together until creamy.']

name: Very Quick Low Gi Chicken Curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil (for frying)', '1 onion, chopped ', '2 tablespoons curry paste', '4 tomatoes, chopped ', '4 skinless chicken thighs or 4 chicken thigh fillets', '100 g Baby Spinach', '4 tablespoons plain yogurt', '40 g coriander leaves, a handful ']
instructions: ['You also need basmati rice or naan bread to serve.', 'Heat a little oil in a deep non-stick frying pan(with a lid) and add the onion.', 'Fry for about 3 minutes until tender.', 'Then stir in the curry paste and fry for 1 minute.', 'Add the chicken and tomatoes and a splash of water, cover and cook for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.', 'Stir in spinach until it just wilts.', 'Then stir in the yoghurt and coriander, season.', 'Serve with rice, naan bread or salad.']

name: Deluxe Asparagus Rolls
ingredients: ['12 fat asparagus spears or 36 thin asparagus', '12 slices white bread, buttered, crusts removed ', '100 g fresh raw salmon, boned and skinned and thinly sliced ', '12 slices meyer lemons (very thin slices)', '1 lemon, extra ', '1/2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper']
instructions: ['Cook the asparagus in boiling salted water until tender.', 'Drain and cool.', 'Cover the right-hand third of each slice of bread with a layer of salmon then a slice of lemon.', 'Place one fat or three thin asparagus spears on top and squeeze over a little lemon juice.', 'Season with black pepper and roll up.']

name: Chocolate Mousse Like None Other
ingredients: ['280 g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '60 g unsalted butter, cut into small dice ', '8 egg whites', '60 g sugar', '4 egg yolks', '280 ml double cream']
instructions: ['Chop 240g of the chocolate and place it in a heatproof bowl.', 'add the butter.', 'place over a saucepan half filled with simmering water.', 'gently melt the chocolate and butter.', "stirring until it's smooth, do this as slowly as possible, if the chocolate is allowed to get to hot it will become granular.", 'whisk the egg whites until they turn white and soft peaks form, again do not overwhisk the whites or you will end up with a very granular mousse.', 'add the sugar.', 'stir the egg yolks into the chocolate.', 'using a spatula, pour chocolate mousse into a large glass bowl and put in the fidge for 1 hr to set.', 'when ready to serve, whip the cream until firm and spoon it over the chocolate mousse.', 'grate the remaining chocolate over the cream, or let your children have fun with the decorating.']

name: Chinese Pork in Leaves
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 1/2 cm piece fresh gingerroot, peeled and finely diced ', '1 garlic clove, peeled and crushed ', '500 g ground lean pork', '220 g water chestnuts, drained and sliced ', '5 spring onions, trimmed and sliced (1 bunch)', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon Chinese five spice powder', '1/2 iceberg lettuce, leaves separated and blanched ', ' hoisin sauce']
instructions: ['Heat oil in a large wok or frying pan.', 'Add the ginger, garlic and pork mince.', 'Cook for 8 minutes, turning and stirring occasionally, until golden brown.', 'Add the water chestnuts and spring onions.', 'Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.', 'Stir in dark soy sauce and Chinese five spice.', 'Cook for 1 minute.', 'Spoon pork mixture into blanched lettuce leaves.', 'Pour over a little hoisin sauce to taste.', 'Wrap up leaves.', 'Serve.']

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ['2 (250 g) jumbo mushrooms', '50 g butter', '1 bunch spring onion', '400 g green lentils, drained ', '2 (100 g) packages welsh herbed goat cheese', '25 g fresh whole wheat breadcrumbs', '3 tablespoons fresh flat-leaf parsley, chopped plus ', '3 -5 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, to serve ']
instructions: ['pre heat oven to 200 degrees.', 'grease a large ovenproof dish.', 'cut of mushroom stems and chop well, then set aside.', 'put the mushroom caps in the dish, stem side up, in a single layer.', 'try the stems in the butter along with the spring onions until soft.', 'put in bowl and add the lentils, cheese, breadcrumbs and parsley, mix well.', 'divide between the mushroom caps and bake for 20-25 minutes.']

name: Sublime Hot Chocolate Fondant
ingredients: ['50 g unsalted butter, plus extra to grease ', '2 teaspoons cocoa powder, to dust ', '50 g good-quality unsweetened chocolate squares, minimum 70% cocoa ', '1 free range egg', '1 free range egg yolk', '60 g caster sugar', '50 g plain flour']
instructions: ['heat the oven to 160 degrees.', 'butter to large ramekins, about 7.5cm in diameter, then dust liberally with cocoa.', 'slowly melt the chocolate and butter in a small bowl set over a pan of hot water.', 'then take of the heat and stir until smooth.', 'leave to cool for 10 minutes.', 'using an electric mixer, whisk the whole egg, egg yolk and sugar together until pale and thick.', 'then incorporate the chocolate mixture.', 'sift the flour over mixture and gently fold in, using large metal spoon.', 'divide between the ramekins.', 'bake for 12 minutes.', 'turn the chocolate fondants out on to warmed plates and serve imediately.']

name: Pixie Dust
ingredients: ['1/4 cup sugar', ' red food coloring', '12 ready made cupcakes or 12 other cake', '100 g icing sugar']
instructions: ['simply put the sugar into a sealable plastic bag and add a few drops of red food coloring.', 'keep adding till you get the color you want.', 'ice your cakes.', 'sprinkle sugar over and you have pink pixie dust.', 'can be alternated with different colors.']

name: Baked Oatmeal Like You Never Had Before
ingredients: ['1/2 cup vegetable oil', '3/4 cup white sugar', '2 eggs', '1 cup milk', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '3 cups quick-cooking oats', '1/2 cup raisins', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
instructions: ['Beat together oil and sugar.', 'Mix in eggs, milk, salt, baking powder and oatmeal.', 'Beat well then stir in raisins.', 'Pour into a lightly grease pie pan.', 'Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon, Refrigerate overnight.', 'The next morning, preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Bake in oven until firm, about 35 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

name: Miss Pixie's Basic Waffle Batter
ingredients: ['2 cups self-raising flour', '2 eggs, yokes seperated ', '3/4 cup milk', '1/2 cup water', '90 g butter, melted ', '1/4 cup sugar']
instructions: ['pre-heat waffle maker.\r', 'in large bowl combine sifted flour, egg yokes, milk, water & butter.\r', 'mix until smooth.\r', 'using clean beaters, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.\r', 'gradually add sugar.\r', 'fold into batter.\r', 'brush cooking plates generously with melted butter.\r', 'place about 1/2 cup batter at a time.\r', 'close lid and cook until golden brown.\r', 'use spatulae to remove NOT A KNIFE.\r', 'serve with whatever topping you desire.']

name: Oven Caramel Corn
ingredients: ['12 cups popped popcorn', '1 1/2 cups pecan halves or 1 1/2 cups unblanched whole almonds', '1 cup packed brown sugar', '1/2 cup butter or 1/2 cup margarine', '1/4 cup light corn syrup', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 200ºF.', 'Divide popcorn and pecans between 2 ungreased rectangular pans (13x9x2-in).', 'Heat brown sugar, butter, corn syrup and salt in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until bubbly around edges.', 'Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Remove from heat, Stir in baking soda.', 'Pour mixture over popcorn and walnuts.', 'Stir until well coated.', 'Bake 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes.']

name: Hot Cheese and Turkey Baguette
ingredients: ['4 part-baked white sandwich French baguettes', '6 tablespoons mango chutney', '200 g lancashire cheese, sliced ', '100 g wafer-thin honey roasted turkey breast', '40 g rocket']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 200 degrees.', 'bake baguettes for 14-16 minutes until golden.', 'remove from oven, split open and spread bottom slices with chutney.', 'top with cheese and return to the oven for 2 minutes, until cheese has melted.', 'add the turkey and rocket, then serve.']

name: Pear and Walnut Salad
ingredients: ['75 g blue Stilton cheese, crumbled ', '142 ml single cream', '2 williams pears', '150 g mixed salad greens', '25 g walnut halves, taosted ']
instructions: ['gently heat the cheese and single cream in a pan until the cheese has melted.\r', 'peel the pears, core and cut into thick slices.\r', 'arrange on four plates with the salad leaves and the walnuts.\r', 'drizzle with the warm stilton dressing.\r', 'For A Change:.\r', 'Replace stilton with 75g dolcelatte.\r', 'and the walnuts with 25g toasted hazelnuts.']

name: My Bezzies Pancakes, ( Truly Remarkable)
ingredients: ['4 ounces plain flour or 4 ounces self raising flour', '1 pinch salt', '200 ml milk', '75 ml water', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 eggs']
instructions: ['sift flour into a bowl.', 'add salt.', 'make a hole in the midle and add eggs.', 'combine while adding small quantities of the milk and water at a time.', 'melt butter.', 'add to batch to complete your batter.', 'cook till golden brown on either side.']

name: Berry Stuffed Chicken Breast
ingredients: ['100 g Wensleydale cheese with cranberries, sliced (deli)', '8 slices streaky bacon', '4 chicken breasts']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 190 degrees.', 'make a cut in the side of each chicken breast to form a pocket and fill with the cheese.', 'wrap each breast with two rashers of bacon.', 'put in an ovenproof dish and cook for 30 minutes.', 'serve with seasonal vegtables, if you like.']

name: Gordon Ramsay's Chocolate Babycakes
ingredients: ['50 g soft unsalted butter, plus more for greasing ', '350 g best dark chocolate', '150 g caster sugar', '4 large eggs, beaten with ', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50 g plain flour']
instructions: ['you will need 6 individual pudding moulds and buttered baking parchment.', 'pre-heat oven to 200 degrees.', 'putting in a baking sheet at the same time.', 'lay 3 of the moulds on a sheet of doubled baking parchment.', 'draw around them, remove and then cut out the disks as marked.', 'press them into the base of tins.', 'melt the chocolate and let to cool slightly.', 'cream together the butter and sugar and gradually beat in the eggs and salt, then the vanilla.', 'now add the flour, and when all is smoothly combined scrape in the cooled chocolate, blending into a smooth batter.', 'divide the batter between 6 moulds.', 'quickly whip the baking sheet out of the oven, arrange the litle tins on it and replace it in the oven.', 'cook for 10-12 minutes, extra 2 minutes are needed if the mixture was fridge cold.', 'as soon as you take them out of the oven, tip them onto smal plates or shallow serving bowls.', 'serve with whipped double cream or double cream unwhipped, creme fraiche, creme anglaise or ice-cream.']

name: My Best Caramel Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['3 cups cooked white rice', '1/2 cup raisins', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '14 ounces sweetened condensed milk', '12 ounces evaporated milk', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
instructions: ['spray a pan.', 'mix all ingredients except sugar and cinnamon.', 'cover and cook on low heat setting 3-4 hours, or until liquid is absorbed, stir pudding.', 'sprinkle pudding with sugar and cinnamon.', 'serve warm.']

name: Passion Fruit Cheesecakes (Reduced Fat!!!)
ingredients: ['6 stem low-fat ginger snaps, crumbled ', '250 g ricotta cheese', '250 g soft low-fat cheese', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '50 g caster sugar', '1 lime, juice and zest of, grated ', '4 tablespoons passion fruit, coulis and mango coulis ', '1 passion fruit, pulp to decorate ']
instructions: ['pre-heat the oven to 180 degrees (fan oven).', 'scrunch foil around the base and sides of 4 10cm metal cooking rings to seal.', 'grease well.', 'divide the biscuit crumbs between the rings.', 'blend ricotta and soft cheeses, eggs cornflour, sugar lime rind and juice in a food processor until smooth.', 'spoon into the rings.', 'bake for 20 minutes until just set in the centre.', 'leave cheesecakes to cool in turned-off oven with door ajar.', 'top with coulis and passion fruit and serve.']

name: Tropical Fruit Crumble With No Added Sugar
ingredients: ['100 g dried dates or 100 g fresh dates, stoned and rougly chopped ', '1 mango, peeled stonned and chopped ', '1 small fresh pineapple, peeled and chopped ', '1 orange, juice and zest of, grated ', '5 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced ', '6 tablespoons rolled oats', '50 g sliced almonds', '100 g whole wheat flour', '400 g jello prepared sugar-free custard, to serve ']
instructions: ['Pre-heat oven to 200 degrees (fan oven).', 'pplace dates, mango, pineapple, orange rind and juice and vanilla in a pan.', 'cook for 5 minutes until tender.', 'strain the fruit, reserving the juices.', 'place fruit and kiwi fruit in a large ovenproof dish.', 'return the reserved juices to the pan.', 'simmer for 5 minutes until reduced by half.', 'pour over the fruit.', 'mix oats, almonds, flour and butter.', 'scatter over the fruit.', 'bake for 10-15 minutes until golden.', 'serve warm with custard.']

name: Frozen Pineapple on a Stick
ingredients: ['8 pieces fresh pineapple', '1/4 cup pineapple juice or 1/4 cup orange juice', '3/4 cup shredded coconut, toasted ']
instructions: ['line cookie sheet with waxed paper.', 'insert wooden skewer or toothpick into one end of the pineapple.', 'dip in juice.', 'then roll in coconut, coating completely.', 'place on cookie sheet.', 'freeze for 1-2 hours or until firm.', 'let stand for 5-10 minutes before serving.']

name: Microwave Ravioli Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb lean ground beef', '1 small onion, chopped (1/4 cup)', '2 (15 ounce) cans beef ravioli', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese or 1 cup cheddar cheese']
instructions: ['Crumble beef into 2-quart microwavable casserole.\r', 'Add onion.\r', 'Cover loosely and microwave on High 5 to 6 minutes, stirring after 3 minutes, until beef is no longer pink.\r', 'drain.\r', 'Stir in ravioli.\r', 'Cover tightly and microwave 5 to 7 minutes, stirring after 3 minutes, until hot.\r', 'Sprinkle with cheese.\r', 'Cover and let stand until cheese is melted.']

name: Frozen Chocolate Mousse
ingredients: ['1/2 cup whipping cream (heavy)', '1 tablespoon almond flavored liqueur', '2 tablespoons chocolate flavored syrup', '1 tablespoon cocoa, if desired ']
instructions: ['beat whipping cream in chilled small bowl on high with an electric mixer until stiff.', 'fold in liqueur and chocolate syrup.', 'spoon into 2 paper lined foil cupcake liners.', 'cover and freeze at least 4 hours but no longer than 48 hours.', 'place in fridge 15 minutes before serving.', 'sprinkle with cocoa.', 'serve.']

name: Low-Cal Buttermilk Pancakes
ingredients: ['210 ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '75 ml water', '1 medium egg', '100 g self-raising flour', '225 g frozen berries, thawed ', '2 teaspoons arrowroot', '100 g Greek yogurt, to serve ']
instructions: ['Whisk buttermilk, maple syrup, egg and water in a bowl until combined.\r', 'whisk in flour, cover and set aside for 20 minutes.\r', 'heat frying pan over a high heat, spray with oil spray.\r', 'add 2 or 3 heaped spoonfuls of batter, allow to spread.\r', 'cook for 2-3 minutes until golden.\r', 'turn, cook for 1 minute.\r', 'transfer to a plate, keep warm.\r', 'repeat to make 8 pancakes.\r', 'drain the berries, reserve juice.\r', 'heat juice in pan with the arrowroot until slightly thickned.\r', 'serve the pancakes with berries warmed juices and greek yoghurt.']

name: Frozen Yogonanas
ingredients: ['6 ounces strawberry yogurt', '7 large bananas, peeled and cut crosswise in half ', '2 cups Golden Grahams cereal, finely crushed ']
instructions: ['you need 14 wooden sticks with rounded ends.', 'cover cookie sheet with waxed paper.', 'place yoghurt in shallow bowl.', 'carefully insert wooden stick into cut end of each banana half.', 'roll each banana in yoghurt.', 'then sprinkle with cereal.', 'place on cookie sheet.', 'freeze about 2 hours, or until firm.', 'cover tightly and keep frozen.']

name: The Easiest Garlic Bread Ever
ingredients: ['250 g butter', '2 garlic cloves, crushed ', '1 bunch fresh parsley, stalks removed and leaves finely chopped ', '1 -2 French bread, stick ']
instructions: ['pre-heat oven to 190 degrees.', 'mash the butter, garlic and parsley together in a bowl.', 'slash the bread, not all the way though, but over halfway, leaving 2-3cm between each slash.', 'spread the garlic butter on both sides where you have cut.', 'wrap in foil and bake in oven for 10-15 minutes and you have the easiest garlic bread ever.']

name: New Zealand Gold Kumara, Leek & Bacon Soup
ingredients: ['1 kg gold kumara', '1 large leek', '300 g bacon bits', '1 grated carrot', '1 liter chicken stock (or 2 stock cubes and water)', '1 teaspoon mild indian curry powder', '25 g butter', ' salt']
instructions: ['Peel, cut in chunks kumara and boil until soft in stock liquid, along with grated carrot, curry powder and salt.', 'Do not discard the cooking liquid.', "In the meantime gently cook leek in the butter. Do not brown or it will lose it's sweetness.", 'Put to one side and slightly brown off bacon.', 'Once kumara is cooked, mash in the liquid, or use a food processor to puree.', 'Add bacon and leek and cook gently for 15 minutes for flavours to meld.']

name: Yummy, Scrummy Banana Shake
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '2 ripe bananas', '1 teaspoon honey', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 scoops vanilla ice cream']
instructions: ['put milk in blender.\r', 'peel bananas and chop.\r', 'add to blender.\r', 'add honey and nutmeg.\r', 'add ice cream.\r', 'blend fast until smooth.\r', 'pour into tall glasses.\r', 'pop in a straw and serve.']

name: Very Low Fat Warm Winter Fruit Salad
ingredients: ['3 large oranges, peeled ', '1 pink grapefruit, peeled ', '2 mandarin oranges, peeled and sliced ', '100 g ready-to-eat dried apricots, sliced ', '75 g dried figs, sliced ', '50 g dried peaches, sliced ', '75 g dried cranberries', '50 g currants', '100 ml fresh orange juice', '25 g demerara sugar', '100 g low-fat Greek yogurt, dusted with ', ' ground cinnamon, to serve ']
instructions: ['Pre-heat the oven to 140 degrees (fan oven).', 'Cut oranges and grapefruit into segments.', 'place in large ovenproof dish together with the mandarin slices.', 'add the dried fruit in layers.', 'pour over the orange juice', 'cover with foil.', 'bake for 30 minutes.', 'serve warm with greek yoghurt.']

name: Baked It My Way Potatoes
ingredients: ['2 medium potatoes, washed well and dried ', '1 teaspoon oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sour cream', '2 teaspoons chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon grated cheese']
instructions: ['prick potatoes all over with a fork.', 'rub all over with oil and then with salt.', 'put on plate, cook in microwave on high for 6 minutes, stand for 10 minutes.', 'slice top neatly off.', 'scoop out potatoe with teaspoon, leave shell intact.', 'mash it with sour cream and parsley.', 'spoon it back into shell.', 'put cheese on top.', 'cook on high for 90 seconds.']

name: Wiener Schnitzel
ingredients: ['400 g veal', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 cup dry breadcrumbs', ' oil (for frying)']
instructions: ['trim fat from schnitzel, cut into serving size pieces.\r', 'pound meat with a mallet or a rolling pin.\r', 'whisk egg and milk in a dish.\r', 'put crumbs in another dish.\r', 'dip each piece of veal in egg to coat.\r', 'press each piece in crumbs until coated both sides.\r', 'put on a plate, put in fridge for about 1 hour.\r', 'put oil in frypan - enough to generously cover base, heat.\r', 'fry 3-4 minutes each side until golden.\r', 'drain on paper towels.']

name: The Best Tortillas You Will Ever Have
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons peanut butter', '4 tablespoons honey', '4 flour tortillas', '4 bananas', '100 g chocolate chips']
instructions: ['Spread 1 tbsp peanut butter over 1 wrap.', 'Add chopped banana all over the place.', 'Sprinkle with 1 tbsp honey.', 'Sprinkle with a handful of chocolate chips.', 'Roll it up.', 'Place toothpicks in to keep in place.', 'Cut up if desired.', 'Best made just before eating, but can sprinkle lemon or lime over if you need to keep.']

name: Egg in a Roll
ingredients: ['1 roll, about 8cm in diameter ', '1 slice bacon, cooked ', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon grated cheese', '1 teaspoon melted butter']
instructions: ['turn oven to 180 degrees.', 'slice top thinly of the roll.', 'pull centre out of roll, leave bread case intact.', 'cut rind off bacon, chop it up and put inside roll.', 'break egg into roll, pierce yolk with the tip of a knife.', 'sprinkle grated cheese on.', 'put in shallow baking dish.', 'brush outside of roll with melted butter.', "bake for 20 minutes or until the egg white is set, watch roll doesn't burn."]

name: Pizza Sticks
ingredients: ['1 French baguette, 15cm long ', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 tomatoes', '8 slices salami or 8 slices smoked sausage', '3/4 cup grated cheese']
instructions: ['cut bread in half length ways.', 'spread each half with tomato paste.', 'sprinkle with oregano.', 'slice tomato thinly, put on bread.', 'put salami slices on.', 'sprinkle with cheese.', 'put on paper towel on a plate.', 'cook on high for 80 seconds.', 'serve.']

name: Nachos
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 garlic clove (peeled and chopped)', '1 small onion (peeled and chopped)', '1 (440 g) can chili beans', '1 (410 g) can tomatoes', '1/2 teaspoon brown sugar', '200 g corn chips', '3/4 cup grated cheese', '1/2 cup sour cream']
instructions: ['heat oil in a pan.\r', 'fry garlic and onion until soft.\r', 'put beans in a bowl, mash them a bit with a fork.\r', 'drain tomatoes, add to bowl mash them a litle.\r', 'add to onion in pan.\r', 'stir till boiling.\r', 'add sugar.\r', '*****pre-heat oven to 190 degrees*****.\r', 'turn pan to low, simmer for 25 minutes, stir occasionally.\r', 'pour into a baking dish.\r', 'arrange chips around edge.\r', 'sprinkle cheese over.\r', 'bake for 5 minutes at 190 degrees.\r', 'take out of over, put sour cream in centre and serve.']

name: Wheat Free Chocolate and Chestnut Cake
ingredients: ['150 g good quality chocolate', '4 eggs, seperated ', '100 g caster sugar', '250 g canned chestnut puree', '1 tablespoon dark rum', '100 g pecan nuts or 100 g brazil nuts, chopped to decorate ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C (fan oven).', 'Grease a 20cm round cake tin.', 'Line base with baking parchment.', 'Melt half the chocolate in a heatproof bowl set over a pan of boiling water.', 'Remove from heat and allow to cool.', 'Whisk together the yolks and sugar until pale and creamy.', 'Add chestnut puree, mix well until combined.', 'Stir in melted chocolate and rum.', 'Whisk egg whites until soft peaks form.', 'Mix 1/3 of whites into the chestnut mixture.', 'Fold in remaining whites.', 'Spoon into tin.', 'Bake for 3 5-40 minutes until risen and firm to the touch.', 'Cool.', 'Melt remaining chocolate with 3 tbsp water.', 'Serve cake with nuts and chocolate sauce.']

name: Savoury Fish Steaks
ingredients: ['4 fish steaks (hapuka, tuna, kingfish)', '4 tomatoes, blanched and sliced ', '4 teaspoons malt vinegar', '1 cup soft breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons finely chopped onions', '2 tablespoons melted butter']
instructions: ['Wash and pat fish steaks dry. \r', 'Place in a baking pan. \r', 'Arrange tomato slices on top. \r', 'Sprinkle with vinegar. \r', 'In a bowl combine breadcrumbs, onion and butter. \r', 'Spoon this mixture on top of tomatoes. \r', 'Cook at 350 F (180 C) for approximately 20 minutes or until fish is cooked through.']

name: New Zealand Lamb Sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 cup chopped mint leaf', ' boiling water', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/2 cup malt vinegar', ' salt']
instructions: ['Put mint into a jug. Cover with boiling water and add sugar and vinegar. Add salt to taste.', 'Makes 1/2 cup.']

name: Sam's Ambrosia
ingredients: ['300 ml cream', '600 g low-fat berry yogurt (4 x 150 gram pots)', '1 (425 g) can blueberries in heavy syrup (or boysenberries)', '180 g marshmallows', '200 g chocolate chips']
instructions: ['Drain blueberries (or boysenberries) but make sure that there is stil some syrup left (enough so that they are still dripping) and set aside.\r', 'Chop marshmallows in half and set aside.\r', 'Whip cream in large bowl till it makes soft peaks.\r', 'Add yohurt, drained blueberries (or boysenberries), marshmallows and all but one heaped tablespoon of chocolate chips and stir gently until mixed.\r', 'Sprinkle the remaining chocolate chips over the top for decoration.\r', 'Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. This tastes best if left for about 8-12 hours before serving.\r', 'Can also be transferred to parfait glasses (and layered with extra berries if you like) for a classy touch!']

name: Easy Truffles
ingredients: ['2 (200 g) packets biscuits (cookies to those in the USA, of your choice.....Toffee Pops or Tim Tams for those in NZ or Australia)', '250 g cream cheese', ' chopped nuts or coconut, for coating the finished balls ']
instructions: ["Using a food processor crumb the biscuits/cookies. If you don't have a food processor just put biscuits into a plastic bag and roll with a rolling pin until crumbed.", 'Mix crumbs well with the cream cheese.', 'Roll into small balls.', 'Either dip into melted chocolate and place on baking paper to set or roll in coating of your choice.', 'Store in fridge until required.']

name: Toffee Apples
ingredients: ['3 cups sugar', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 tablespoon butter', '1/4 cup cold water', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 drop red food coloring']
instructions: ['Boil together without stirring until a drop snaps in cold water.\r', 'Remove from heat and dip in apples on skewers. Stand apples on greaseproof paper until dry.']

name: Classic Sugar Sponge Loaf, 270cals Per Serve
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sugar, to line the loaf pan ', '4 eggs', '1 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180c. Grease well or spray a 12x23cm loaf pan with non-stick baking spray. Sprinkle the sides and base with the 2 tbsp of sugar, shaking out the excess.', 'Beat eggs until pale and fluffy. Slowly, a spoon at a time, add the sugar. Add the vanilla and fold in the flour and baking powder.', 'Pour into the prepared tin and sprinkle a little extra sugar over the top and bake for 35-40 minutes until the top is golden brown and crunchy.', 'Cool loaf on a wire rack. Slice with a serrated knife when cold.']

name: Paprika Spiced Lamb (New Zealand)
ingredients: ['3 lbs lamb (fully-trimmed loin, rump or cutlets)', ' salt & pepper (to taste)', ' cooking oil (to sear lamb meat)', '2 1/2 tablespoons cooking oil', '8 slices bacon', '3 medium onions (thinly sliced)', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '3 garlic cloves (finely chopped)', '1 teaspoon fresh thyme', '2 -3 teaspoons paprika', '2 lemons, juice of', '2 cups veal stock or 2 cups vegetable stock', '10 ounces cream', '1 1/2 lbs potatoes (diced & par-boiled)', ' sea salt (to taste)', ' fresh ground black pepper (to taste)']
instructions: ['Potatoes - Par-boil, drain & set aside. Do not overcook.', "Paprika Sauce - Heat oil in a lrg saucepan over mod heat. Add bacon & onion & sauté till golden brown. Add tomato paste & cont to fry for 2 min, stirring well. Add garlic, thyme & paprika & combine well. Fry for 30 seconds, then add lemon juice & stock. Bring to a boil & reduce heat to a slow simmer for 15 min (don't simmer too hard or the sauce will reduce too much). Remove from heat & adjust seasoning to taste. The sauce should be a thick coating consistency. If too thick, add a little extra stock to dilute.", 'Lamb - Season lamb & sear in hot oil till cooked to your liking. Set aside, covered & in a warm place to rest before carving.', 'To Serve - Just before serving, add the cream & bring the sauce back to a simmer. Add the potatoes to complete their cooking (be careful not to overcook the potatoes or allow them to break up - they will heat through & finish cooking very quickly). Place 6 portions of sauce & potatoes on dinner plates & arrange sliced lamb over the top.', 'Notes: Sautéed onion w/pitted chopped olives was suggested as an optional garnish, but the picture of sautéed fresh mushrooms on the side kept flashing before my eyes. :-).', 'Recipe Tips: (found at the end of the recipe) 1) If using lamb loin or rump, sear the pieces whole & then slice to serve. For cutlets, sear & put aside till required. 2) Paprika varies widely in quality & freshness. Good paprika will thicken the sauce in a similar way to flour & will require time to cook out the raw, grainy texture.']

name: New Zealand Lemon Ginger Beer
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons warm water', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1/4 teaspoon dried yeast granules', '1 cup sugar', '2 lemons, juice of', '2 lemons, rind of', '1 -3 teaspoon dried ginger']
instructions: ['Put first measure of sugar in warm water to dissolve, add yeast and stir.', 'Place in warm place to start working.', 'Finely grate or slice rind from 2 lemons and place in a heatproof container with the 1 cup of sugar and the dried ginger.', 'Pour over 1 cup of boiling water and leave to steep for 10 minutes.', 'Strain into 1.5 L plastic bottle in which the ginger beer will be made.', 'Top up bottle with cool water to near top so that final temp is approximately body temperature.', 'Add yeast to bottle as soon as it shows signs of working, ie. it foams.', 'Cap bottle tightly.', 'Mix thoroughly and put in a warm place.', 'Leave until bottle becomes undentable. Depending on the yeast this can take anything from 12 hours to 3 days, but best to check regularly, as there is a risk of explosion with this!', 'Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled and open with great care!']

name: Baked Creamy Cinnamon Pumpkin
ingredients: ['400 -500 g pumpkin (peeled, dry floury pumpkin is best, cut into slices or cubes)', '1/2 cup cream', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon (can use ginger for a change)', ' salt & pepper']
instructions: ['Lay the slices or pieces of pumpkin tightly in an ovenproof dish.', 'Sprinkle with salt & pepper.', 'Pour cream over and around the pumpkin.', 'Mix together the brown sugar & cinnamon and sprinkle over the top.', "Cover with foil & bake for about an hour at 180'C or until pumpkin is tender, or microwave on high for approx 6-10mins."]

name: Basic Kiwi Marinade
ingredients: ['1 cup chopped kiwi', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons tomato sauce', '2 garlic cloves, minced ', '4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce']
instructions: ['Mix all ingredients together in a bowl. Add meat of choice(of course, New Zealanders most always use lamb!) and marinate for at least 2 hours, but not more than 6.\r', 'Cook meat as desired.']

name: Broccoli & Cauliflower Baked Potatoes, 576cals Per Serve.
ingredients: ['200 g broccoli', '200 g cauliflower', '5 fluid ounces white sauce (White Sauce)', '1 ounce cheddar cheese, grated ', '1 medium baking potato']
instructions: ['Place broccoli & cauliflower in a microwaveable container with 3 tbsp of water. Cover and vent. Cook on full power for 7-8 minutes. Leave to stand for 1 minutes.', 'Place baking potato on a plate and prick all over with a fork. Put in microwave and cook for 10 minutes on full power.', 'Make sauce as per recipe, Recipe #161288.', 'If you like to oven cook your baking potato (like me) 2 hours at 170c.']

name: Chicken, Courgette and Mushroom Curry
ingredients: ['2 chicken breasts, cubed ', '1 (14 ounce) can chopped tomatoes', '1 large courgette, sliced and cut in to quarters ', '1 -2 onion, chopped ', '6 -8 ounces mushrooms, sliced ', '2 tablespoons double cream', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 -2 tablespoon oil']
instructions: ['Fry in ghee (or oil) the onions, when soft add the tomatoes, turn up the heat and stir/break down the mix. Use a hand blender if you want a smooth consistency.', 'Add the spices, salt and contine to stir.', 'Add the chicken, stir until chicken turns white, then add the courgettes.', 'Keep cooking until the chicken is almost cooked.', 'Add the mushrooms. Then check taste first, (may be a slight bitter taste, if so add sugar to taste).', 'Add cream-check consistency and taste.', 'Serve with basmati rice and/or nan bread.']

name: Chilled Chicken Salad With Paprika
ingredients: ['2 boneless skinless chicken breasts', ' vegetable stock or water, to cover ', '1 teaspoon vinegar or 1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 bay leaf', '2 red bell peppers', '75 g cucumbers, sliced ', '140 g mixed salad greens', '2 -3 tablespoons fresh parsley leaves', '125 g plain low-fat yogurt', '2 teaspoons sun-dried tomato paste', '1 1/2-2 tablespoons fresh herbs, finely chopped (basil, chives or parsley)', '1 small garlic clove, crushed ', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/8-1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika (to taste)', ' salt and pepper, to taste ']
instructions: ['Place the chicken breasts in a frying pan with the vinegar, white wine or water and bring to the boil.', 'Lower the heat to a very gentle simmer and cook for 25 minutes until the chicken is done.', 'Meanwhile, to start the salad, heat the grill to the highest setting and grill the whole red peppers until they are blistered and blackened all over.', 'Remove from the heat, place in a bowl and cover with food wrap. Leave to stand for 10 minutes to make the skins easier to remove.', 'When the chicken is cooked, remove it from the pan and set aside to cool on paper towels.', 'Peel the black skins from the peppers, discard the core and seeds and cut the flesh into strips. Combine in a salad bowl with the cucumber, salad leaves and parsley leaves.', 'In a small mixing bowl, combine all the ingredients for the sauce. Cube the cooled chicken and stir in to the sauce. Arrange the salad on serving plates and top with the dressed chicken and serve.', 'Note: You may want to add a dash of Balsamic vineger to the sauce if you find it too tart.']

name: Pasta Carbonara, 589cals Per Serve
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, sliced ', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '4 slices rindless bacon, sliced (ham may be used in place of bacon or use half and half)', '250 g fresh mushrooms, sliced ', '1/2 cup white wine', '300 ml cream or 300 ml light cream', '1 egg, beaten ', ' pepper, to taste ', '250 g pasta, of choice, cooked ', '2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, grated ']
instructions: ['Heat oil in a large frying pan, Saute onion and garlic until onion is tender.', 'Add bacon. Cook until beginning to brown. Stir in mushrooms. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Blend in wine and cream. Bring to the boil and reduce heat. Simmer until beginning to thicken.', 'Blend in egg and pepper. Stirring constantly, simmer for 30 seconds.', 'Toss pasta through sauce.', 'Serve topped with a little parmesan cheese. Salad and crusty bread make ideal accompaniments.']

name: Roast Racks of Lamb With Root Vegetables
ingredients: ['2 (200 g) racks of lamb, about 4 cutlets on each ', '3 tablespoons mango chutney', '3 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped ', '100 g shallots, small ', '100 g pumpkin', '100 g parsnips', '100 g carrots', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 garlic cloves', '2 sprigs rosemary', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper']
instructions: ['Heat the oven to 200c/400f/gas 6.', 'To prepare the vegetables, peel and trim the shallots, allowing them to fall into their natural segments, if they have any.', 'Peel the pumpkin, parsnips and carrots and cut them into cubes of equel size, about 2.5cm across, large pieces.', 'Place the olive oil in a roasting tin and heat in the oven for a few minutes. When hot, remove from the oven and add the prepared vegetables and garlic cloves. Stir to combine and coat evenly in the oil. Lay the sprigs of rosemary amongst the vegetables, season with salt and pepper and roast for 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, smear the mango chutney over the exposed meat on the racks of lamb. Press the chopped parsley onto the chutney coating and place the racks of lamb on a metal rack in a roastng tin.', 'When the vegetables have been cooking for 30 minutes, give them a stir and return to the oven, placing the sepatate roasting tin of lamb in the oven at the same time.', 'Roast for 15-20 minutes (15 minutes will give lamb pink lamb, if you want it well done roast for 25 minutes).', 'Remove the vegetables from the oven after 15 minutes or when they are done to your liking.', 'Discard the rosemary before serving the vegetables hot with the roast lamb.']

name: Grilled Chicken Breast With Oriental Marinade
ingredients: ['100 ml light soy sauce', '1 tablespoon mustard powder', '1 tablespoon clear honey', '5 cm piece fresh ginger, Peeled and grated ', '1 medium onion, Peeled and grated ', '2 garlic cloves, Peeled and crushed ', '1 star anise, crushed ', '1 chicken, cut into 8 pieces ', ' salt and pepper, to taste ']
instructions: ['Mix the soy sauce and dry mustard powder together in a china or glass container to form a marinade. Add the honey, ginger, onion, garlic and star anise to the soy sauce mixture and leave to stand for at least 8 hours.\r', 'When complate, coat the chicken with the mariande and leave for at least 1 hour, turning occasionally and basting.\r', 'When ready to cook, sprinkle salt and pepper to taste over the chicken and grill or barbeque for 5-6 minutes. \r', 'While the chicken is cooking, put the rest of the marinade in a saucepan and bring to the boil. \r', 'Turn the chicken over and cook for a further 5-6 minutes, basting with the marinade occasionally during the cooking. \r', 'Note: Makes an excellent all-round low-fat marinade for lamb, pork and fish steaks.']

name: Alison Holst's Hot Cross Buns
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons active dry yeast, e.g. Surebake active yeast mixture ', '2 cups flour', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 cup milk, cold ', '1 cup boiling water', '50 g butter, melted ', '1 egg', '1 cup mixed fruit', '1 tablespoon mixed spice', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '3 -4 cups flour', '1/2 cup flour', '2 tablespoons oil', ' water, to taste ', '2 tablespoons water', '1/4 cup sugar']
instructions: ['Measure the yeast mixture, flour, brown sugar and salt into a large bowl. Stir to mix and then add the cold milk followed by the boiling water. Stir thoroughly to mix.', 'Leave to stand for 3 minutes. Melt the butter and assemble the rest of the ingredients.', 'Once the 3 minutes is up, stir in the rest of the ingredients except for the flour.', 'Now add as much flour as need to make a dough just firm enough to turn out on a board and knead. [The original recipe suggests 3 cups. I needed 4.].', 'Knead the dough for 5-10 minutes until smooth and satiny and it springs back when you press it with a finger.', 'Oil a large bowl and turn the dough ball in this until it is all coated. Cover the mixture with plastic wrap and leave to stand until it doubles it original bulk.', 'Turn out on a floured board, knead lightly and cut into 30 evenly sized pieces.', 'Form each piece into a ball and arrange the buns in rows in a dish or pan with at least 1 cm between them. A roasting dish works well and takes about 15 buns.', 'Preheat the oven to 220°C/425°F and when ready turn the heat down to 200°C/400°F.', 'Put crosses on the buns.Make a paste of the flour and oil and then add enough water to make a dough that can be forced out of an icing bag. Pipe the crosses on the buns.', 'Put the buns in the oven and bake for about 15 minutes until they brown slightly and feel firm. Remove from oven and glaze with a hot syrup made by heating sugar and water.', 'Cool buns on a rack. Store in airtight containers when cold.', 'If you want to make a smaller quantity, halve the ingredients except for the egg. You may need more flour.']

name: Kiwifruit Jam
ingredients: ['2 lbs kiwi fruits', '1 lb granulated sugar', '2 ounces lemon juice']
instructions: ['Cooked kiwifruit can have a metallic taste, removing the seeds fixes the problem. \r', 'Halve kiwifruit lengthwise, with a sharp spoon scoop out the seedy pulp and discard. Scoop out the remaining pulp until you have 1 lb. Mash the pulp in a big heat-proof jug, add the lemon juice and microwave until it boils vigorously (5 minutes). \r', 'Stir in the sugar until it is mostly dissolved. Cook on a low power setting for about 8 minutes until a little jam sets. Add a little green food colouring to enhance the appearance.\r', 'Gold kiwifruit makes a beautiful golden jam without added colour.']

name: Tararua Biscuits
ingredients: ['250 g butter', '1 1/2 cups brown sugar', '0.5 (200 g) can condensed milk', '2 cups soy flour', '2 cups rolled oats', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 cup desiccated coconut', '30 g sesame seed paste']
instructions: ['Melt butter, sugar and condensed milk together in large pot.', 'Add flour, rolled oats and baking powder.', 'Divide mixture in half.', 'Spread each half onto a greased tray - spread with a knife until it forms a 30cm x30cm square, keeping edges neat and straight.', 'Repeat with other half of mixture.', 'Cook at 150°C for 10-15 minutes till light to golden brown.', 'Cut each tray into 25 biscuits - 5 x 5.', 'To harden biscuits a little more return to oven which has been turned off - leave for another 5 - 10 minutes.', 'When completely cold, pack biscuits in plastic bags. Seal and label.']

name: My Gingernut Biscuits/Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup self raising flour (5)', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 tablespoons low-fat margarine (6)', '1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar (1 1/2)', '3 teaspoons clear honey (3)']
instructions: ['Sieve the flour, baking soda, ginger, and cinnamon into a bowl.', 'Combine the margarine, brown sugar and honey in a microwave proof bowl and heat until sugar is dissolved.', 'Add the margarine mix to the flour mixture & combine well.', 'Divide into 16 pieces and roll into balls with the palms of your hands.', 'Place on a baking paper lined tray and flatten slightly with a fork.', "Bake at 180'C/350'F for approx 15minutes.", 'Remove from tray and cool on a rack.']

name: Hangi in a Crock Pot
ingredients: ['4 medium potatoes, cut in half ', '4 small sweet potatoes, cut in half ', '1 head cabbage, leaves ', '1 fresh pumpkin, cut into 8 small pieces ', '4 chicken thighs, cut in half ', '8 small lamb chops or 8 small pork chops', '4 slices smoked pork', ' prepared stuffing (optional)', '60 ml water']
instructions: ['To make individual servings use banana leaves or tin foil.', 'Put cabbage leaves down first, then veges, meat and stuffing (if using) together on top of the cabbage.', 'Put another couple of cabbages leaves over the top of veges.', 'Wrap everything up in the tinfoil or banana leaves, preferably encasing everything with the cabbage.', 'Put into crock pot.', 'Add water to bottom of crock pot.', 'Cook on high for approx 6-8 hours or until cooked through.', 'Note: Only add salt once cooked.']

name: Cheaters Vanilla Slices (Australian)
ingredients: ['1 (250 g) packet SAO biscuits', '1 (85 g) packet vanilla instant pudding mix', '500 -600 ml thickened cream', '1 cup icing sugar', '1 teaspoon margarine', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', ' aluminum foil']
instructions: ['line a lamington tin or even a roasting pan with foil with enough extra to fold back over the top. Dimensions must be in multiples of SAO biscuits; either 3x4 or 4x3.', "place SAO Biscuits in a 3x4 or 4x3 pattern on bottom (if need be use rolled paper to make a 'wall' to hold the edge.", 'Pour thickened cream into bowl and pour pack of vanilla instant pudding mix over the top (can add a few drops of vanilla extract or essence for added flavour). Whisk quickly and make sure all powder is dissolved, it thickens quickly.', 'pour mix over base of biscuits, spread as evenly as you can.', 'place an equal number of SAO biscuits over the filling, pressing down to even it out if need be.', 'make a tangy lemon icing with icing sugar, melted marg (about 1 teaspoonful) and enough lemon juice and maybe a little boiling water - spread over the top of the top layer of SAO biscuits then seal with the extra foil left over.', 'Leave in fridge overnight.', 'take all out of foil and cut each SAO in half plus cut between each biscuit square. Makes 24.', 'Tip: must be left overnight, but 24 hours is better.']

name: Cheese & Vegemite Mini Quiches
ingredients: ['12 slices bread, crusts removed ', ' butter, for spreading ', ' vegemite, for spreading ', '60 g bacon, finely chopped ', '80 g sliced mushrooms', '60 g grated tasty cheese', '2 eggs, lightly beaten ', '80 ml cream', '2 tablespoons chopped chives']
instructions: ['SPREAD each slice of bread with butter then very thinly with Vegemite. Press bread into non-stick muffin pans, Vegemite sides facing up.\r', 'COOK bacon and mushrooms in a frying pan for 2 minutes. Combine bacon, mushrooms, cheese, eggs, cream and chives.\r', 'SPOON savoury egg mixture into bread cases and bake at 210ºC for 15 minutes or until set. Serve hot or cold.']

name: Egg and Bacon Pizzas
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons tomato paste', '100 ml tomato passata', ' salt and pepper', '20 cherry tomatoes, halved ', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '12 slices pancetta (thick slices) or 12 slices bacon (thick slices)', '4 eggs', ' rocket, to serve ']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 200°C.', 'Combine tomato paste and passata, season with salt and pepper, then spread over the pizza bases.', 'Coat tomatoes in 1 tablespoon of oil.', 'Lay the pancetta and tomato on top, leaving a space in the middle for the egg, bake for 10 minutes.', 'Heat the remaining 1/2 tablespoon of oil in a non-stick fry pan.', 'When hot, crack in 4 eggs.', 'Cover and cook over low heat for 3 minutes until the white is just cooked and yolk is still runny.', 'Trim the whites using an egg ring and, using a fish slice, gently transfer to the top of each pizza.', 'Return pizzas to oven for 4 minutes or until tomato is squidgy, pancetta is crisp and eggs are just set.', 'Season and serve topped with rocket.']

name: Lamb Cutlets With Arugula (Rocket), Bean, Strawberry and Feta
ingredients: ['12 french-trimmed lamb cutlets', '125 ml olive oil', '2 lemons, very thinly sliced ', '1 cup mint leaf, loosely packed ', ' salt and pepper', '2 tablespoons raspberry vinegar or 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '300 -400 g green beans, blanched ', '100 g arugula (rocket)', '400 g strawberries, sliced ', '400 g feta, crumbled ']
instructions: ['Place lamb in a shallow dish and drizzle with 100ml oil.', 'Add the lemon slices, half the mint and season.', 'Toss to coat, cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.', 'Whisk remaining oil, vinegar, sugar, mustard, salt and pepper.', 'Toss together beans, berries, rocket, feta and remaining mint.', 'Heat a barbecue or chargrill to high and cook lamb, in batches if necessary, 2-3 minutes each side, or until cooked to your liking.', 'Discard marinade.', 'Cook lemon slices for 1 minute.', 'Toss salad with dressing and top with lamb and lemon.']

name: Budget Biscuits
ingredients: ['50 g butter, melted ', '1/2 cup sugar', '1/2 cup flour', '1 cup rolled oats', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda (Bicarbonate of Soda)', '1 tablespoon water']
instructions: ['Melt the butter in a pot.\r', 'Take off the heat and add golden syrup. Stir until golden syrup is dissolved.\r', 'Stir in sugar, rolled oats and flour.\r', 'In a small bowl or cup, dissolve baking soda in water and add to mixture.\r', 'Mix evenly.\r', 'Put teaspoon lots onto a greased oven tray (leave room for spreading).\r', 'Bake at 170 degrees celcius for 8-15 minutes or until golden.\r', 'Store in an airtight container.']

name: Chocolate Chip Pavlova
ingredients: ['4 egg whites', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '1 cup superfine sugar or 1 cup granulated sugar', '1 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '2 teaspoons chopped fine pistachios or 2 teaspoons chopped fine toasted almonds', '1 cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips', '1/2 cup heavy whipping cream', '1/4 cup butter or 1/4 cup margarine', '1 cup heavy whipping cream', '1 tablespoon powdered sugar', '4 cups fresh fruit, cut up (kiwi, strawberries, pineapple, mangoes, raspberries, blueberries, etc.)']
instructions: ['PAVLOVAS:.', 'Heat oven to 250°F.', 'Line baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Beat egg whites in large bowl at medium speed until foamy, about 1-2 minutes.', 'Add cream of tartar; continue beating until egg whites form soft peaks, about 1-2 minutes.', 'Increase speed to high.', 'Beat gradually adding 3/4 cup superfine or granulated sugar, until glossy and stiff peaks form, about 2-3 minutes.', 'Gently stir in remaining superfine or granulated sugar, 1 cup chocolate chips and vanilla.', 'Spread egg white mixture into 8 (4") circles (1/2 cup each) on prepared baking sheet, mounding slightly around edges.', 'Bake for 30-35 mins or until edges are crisp.', 'Remove from oven; cool 15 minutes.', 'Remove from parchment.', 'TOPPING:.', 'Meanwhile, combine 1 cup chocolate chips, 1/2 cup whipping cream and butter or margarine in 1qt saucepan.', 'Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and sauce is smooth, about 2-4 minutes.', 'Drizzle 1-1/2 teaspoons chocolate sauce onto each individual dessert plate.', 'TOPPING:.', 'Beat 1 cup whipping cream in medium bowl at high speed, scraping bowl often, until stiff peaks form.', 'Gently stir in powdered sugar.', 'Place each pavlova on chocolate-coated plate.', 'Spread 1/4 cup whipped cream mixture in center of each pavlova; top with 1/2 cup fruit.', 'Drizzle with remaining chacolate sauce.', 'Place some of the fruit alongside the pavlovas.', 'Enjoy, you deserve it!', 'TIP:(1) Use remaining chocolate sauce over ice cream, cake or fresh fruit. (2) 1 pkg (12oz) mini real semi-sweet chocolate chips = 2 cups. (3) When using for Passover, look for real chocolate chips and powdered sugar, which are avilable at specialty food markets.']

name: Country Jen's Anzac Biscuits (Cookies)
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons boiling water', '4 ounces butter', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 cup sugar', '1 cup coconut', '1 cup rolled oats', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
instructions: ['Melt together the butter, golden syrup and water.\r', 'Put all dry ingredients in a bowl.\r', 'Pour over the melted mixture and add the vanilla.\r', 'Mix well.\r', 'Put on cold tray in teaspoonfuls and press down lightly with a fork.\r', "Bake for 10 minutes at 350'F.\r", 'Remove from oven but leave on tray for 5mins approximately before removing to a wire rack to finish cooling.']

name: Chicken and Apricot Tagine
ingredients: ['8 skinless chicken thighs', '150 g dried apricots, chopped ', '225 g onions, chopped ', '225 g mushrooms, sliced ', '725 ml chicken stock or 725 ml vegetable stock', '1 pinch saffron', '1 pinch ground ginger', '1 pinch cumin', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['Place all the ingredients in a large, heavy based saucepan or casserole and bring to the boil.', 'Cover, lower the heat right down and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'When cooked, remove the lid and simmer uncovered until most of the liquid has gone and you have a thick stew.', 'Adjust the seasoning to taste and serve.']

name: Tuna and Pipi Pilaf
ingredients: [' pipis (2 Handfuls)', '1/2 cup rice', '4 cloves garlic, chopped ', '1 red onion, cubed ', '2 ripe tomatoes, , cubed ', '2 eggs, made into omelet and chopped up small ', ' sambal oelek (or any other chilli)', '1 dash soy sauce', '1 dash oyster sauce', '1 lemon, juice of', '1 cup water', '1 can good tuna']
instructions: ['Steam pipis to open, scrub out sand and remove from shells.', 'Set aside.', 'Brown rice in oil, (until opaque), add onion, garlic, soy and chilli and stir in.', 'Add water and put the lid on, let it bubble away until the rice soaks up the water.', 'Taste the rice then and if it is not tender or to your liking, add more water as before until rice is"Al dente".', 'When rice is cooked, turn heat down and stir in tomato, pipis, tuna, lemon juice and oyster sauce.']

name: Parmesan Baby Carrots
ingredients: ['500 g baby carrots, peeled ', '250 g fresh white breadcrumbs', '2 teaspoons lemon zest, grated ', '1/4 teaspoon dried chili pepper flakes', '2 tablespoons Italian parsley, finely chopped ', '2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, finely grated ', ' salt and pepper', '6 tablespoons plain flour', '2 eggs, beaten ', '500 ml vegetable oil, for frying ']
instructions: ['Remove the carrot tops, leaving a little stalk.', 'Bring a large saucepan of salted water to the boil, add the carrots and cook for 3 minutes.', 'Drain and dry on a paper towel.', 'Combine crumbs, zest, chili, parsley and Parmesan and seasonings.', 'Place flour and eggs in separate bowls.', 'Roll the carrots first in flour, then in egg and cover in crumbs.', 'Fry the carrots in hot oil for 1-2 minutes until crisp.', 'Drain on paper towel.']

name: Tomato Salad With Tarragon Dressing
ingredients: ['500 g tomatoes, thinly sliced ', '2 shallots, chopped ', '2/3 cup oil', '1/3 cup tarragon vinegar', '2 tablespoons sour cream', '1 teaspoon French mustard', '1 garlic clove, crushed ', '1 tablespoon parsley, chopped ', '1 tablespoon basil, chopped ']
instructions: ['Arrange tomatoes on serving dish.\r', 'To make tarragon dressing, mix all ingredients (except shallots) in a jar and shake well,.\r', 'Pour over arrange tomatoes and sprinkle with chopped shallots.']

name: Chocolate Banana Pavlovas
ingredients: ['3 egg whites', '3/4 cup caster sugar', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '220 g extra light cream cheese', '1/3 cup thickened light cream', '1 tablespoon icing sugar', '2 small bananas, sliced thinly ', '1/3 cup caster sugar, extra ', '2 tablespoons water']
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to very slow (120°C/100°F fan forced). Grease an oven tray. Trace four 10cm circles onto baking powder; place the paper, marked side down on a tray.\r', 'Beat the egg whites in a small bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form; gradually add the sugar, beating between each addition; then gently fold in the cocoa. Once you have prepared the meringue mixture, it is essential that you bake it immediately, otherwise it is prone to collapsing.\r', 'Spread the meringue mixture inside the circles on the prepared tray, and bake in the oven for about 45 minutes or until the meringues are firm; cool the meringues in the oven with the door ajar. \r', 'Meanwhile whisk the cream cheese, cream and sifted icing sugar in a small bowl, until combined.\r', 'Top the meringues with the cream cheese mixture and banana slices.\r', 'Combine the extra sugar and the water in a small, heavy-based pan and stir over a low heat, without boiling, until the sugar dissolves, then bring to the boil.\r', 'Reduce the heat and simmer, uncovered, without stirring, until the mixture is golden brown. Remove from the heat; and stand until the bubbles subside and the toffee runs evenly from the back of a spoon.\r', 'Drizzle the meringues with the toffee close to serving.']

name: Wasabi Salmon Fingers in Phyllo With Kiwi Dipping Sauce
ingredients: ['1 1/3 lbs salmon fillets', '1/4 cup olive oil or 1/4 cup melted butter', '1 1/2 teaspoons wasabi', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '8 sheets phyllo pastry', '4 kiwi fruits', '1/2 teaspoon finely grated ginger', '1 teaspoon mild chili', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['Prepare the salmon:.\r', 'Cook the salmon fillet in the oil or butter in a skillet for about two minutes on each side; the interior should still be rare since the salmon will continue to cook in the oven. \r', 'Remove the skin.\r', 'Place the fillet on a work surface and spread with the wasabi.\r', 'Cut into strips about the size of a finger.\r', 'Preheat oven to 400°F \r', 'Lay out a sheet of phyllo pastry flat and brush it with melted butter or oil, cover with another sheet of pastry and brush again, cut into thirds.\r', 'Place a strip of salmon on the edge of one of the pastry strips, fold over the two sides and roll up, repeat the process for the remaining pieces of salmon. \r', 'Brush each roll with a little oil or butter, sprinkle with sesame seeds.\r', 'Bake for 8 to 12 or until the pastry is nicely browned.\r', 'Serve while warm.\r', 'Making the sauce:.\r', 'Peel the kiwis.\r', 'Place all the ingredients in a blender and puree. \r', 'Pour into a bowl and serve with the salmon fingers.']

name: Anzac Biscuits
ingredients: ['1/2 cup plain flour', '1/3 cup sugar', '2/3 cup coconut', '3/4 cup rolled oats', '50 g butter, melted ', '3 -4 tablespoons golden syrup', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda', '2 tablespoons boiling water']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180º (350º).\r', 'Mix together flour, sugar, coconut and rolled oats.\r', 'Stir in melted butter and 2 tablespoons of syrup.\r', 'Dissolve baking soda in the boiling water and add.\r', 'Mix in the rest of the golden syrup.\r', 'Place spoonfuls of mixture onto greased or lined trays. \r', 'Bake for 15 minutes or until golden.\r', 'To make the biscuits crispy, remove from oven after 4 minutes and flatten them down gently with the back of a spoon. Return to oven for another 11 minutes, or until golden.']

name: Chocolate Raspberry Slice
ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '4 tablespoons cocoa', '1/4 cup icing sugar', '250 g butter', '1 cup raspberry jam']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C.', 'Melt butter and add to sifted flour, cocoa and icing sugar.', 'Keep 1/3 of mix aside, press the rest into a greased tray.', 'Top with jam.', 'Crumble the rest of the mix over the top, press lightly.', 'Bake 20-30 mins till golden.', 'Cut into fingers while warm.']

name: Mango Spread
ingredients: ['900 g mango pulp', '115 ml lemon juice', '115 ml orange juice', '800 g caster sugar']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 100°C.\r', 'Place mango pulp and juices into a large pan over low heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until most of the liquid has evaporated.\r', 'Meanwhile spread the sugar on a large baking tray, place in the oven and warm for 5 minutes.\r', 'Blend or sieve the mango mixture, then return to the pan.\r', 'Stir in the warmed sugar and cook gently over low heat until the sugar has dissolved.\r', 'Increase the heat to medium and cook, stirring occasionally to prevent catching, for up to 30 minutes or until mixture is thick.\r', 'Spoon the mixture into clean, sterilised jars. Cover and seal.\r', 'Mango mixture will keep in the fridge for up to 3 weeks.']

name: Roast Tomato and Balsamic Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['600 g tomatoes, ripe, cored and cut into quarters ', '1 cup olive oil, plus ', '2 tablespoons extra olive oil', '3 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '2 egg yolks', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', ' salt and pepper']
instructions: ['Preheat oven to 180°C.', 'Place tomatoes in a small roasting dish in single layer.', 'Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil and 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, then sprinkle with sugar.', 'Roast tomatoes for 1 1/2 hours, or until slightly shrivelled and starting to char around the edges, then remove from oven and cool.', 'Combine egg yolks, mustard and remaining vinegar in a food processor and process until combined.', 'With the motor running, add remaining olive oil a little at a time (the mixture should be emulsified and quite thick).', 'Add roasted tomatoes and any juices, and process until smooth, then season to taste with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.', 'The mayonnaise will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 1 week.']

name: Exotic Fruit Kebabs With Wine Creme
ingredients: ['60 g kumquats', '1 star fruit (carambola)', '2 kiwi fruits', '1 mango', '1 pink grapefruit', '1/2 liter milk', '50 g sugar', ' salt', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '25 g cornflour (to thicken)', '1/8 liter white wine', '1 egg white, whisked ', '1 egg yolk']
